speaker: Cheerilee
text: I want to start our field trip here, in the world-famous Canterlot sculpture garden. That one over there represents "Friendship". All right, my little ponies, this one represents "Victory".

speaker: Scootaloo
text: How cool would it be to have that for a cutie mark?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Cool, if you were actually victoryful at somethin'.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: That's not a word!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: What are you, a dictionary?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Girls! Now *this* is a really interesting statue. What do you notice about it?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: It's got an eagle claw!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: And a lion paw!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: And a snake tail!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: This creature is called a draconequus. He has the head of a pony and a body made up of all sorts of things. What do you suppose that represents?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Confusion!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Evil!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Chaos!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: It's not chaos, you dodo!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Don't call me things I don't know the meaning of! And it is *too* chaos!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Is not!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: You're both wrong!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Actually, in a way, you're all right. This statue represents "Discord", which means a lack of harmony between ponies. In fact, you three have demonstrated discord so well that you're each going to write me an essay explaining it.

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Now let's go, and I don't want anymore fighting.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: It's confusion!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Evil!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Chaos!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Come back here, you! Gotcha! Eww, what is this? Cotton candy?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait a second! It's not supposed to rain until tomorrow. You can't just–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You did.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, I didn't tell you to go anywhere!

speaker: Applejack
text: Rainbow Dash, what's going on with this rain? I mean chocolate milk? I mean chocolate milk rain?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: There's crazy weather all over Equestria! Cloudsdale is getting soaked by a major cola storm right now! But don't worry. I'm not leaving you until I get control of Ponyville!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Why would you wanna stop *this*? [slurp]

speaker: Rarity
text: Ahem. I heard about your troubles, Applejack, and I came to see if there's anything I can do without getting wet. Or dirty. Or out from under my umbrella.

speaker: Applejack
text: Fluttershy! Do somethin'!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now, Angel, you really shouldn't– No! It's not possible! I must be seeing things!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't worry, everyone. I've learned a new spell that'll fix *everything*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My fail-safe spell... *failed*. What do we do?

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, give up?

speaker: Rarity
text: Spike, Twilight will come up with something.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hmm, time for plan B. Rainbow, can you corral all those clouds in one corner of the sky?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, I need you to bring those high-strung storm clouds down to Earth.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, what happened?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Oh dear. I hope none of the animals see these*delicious*chocolate-filled cotton candy clouds. I'd hate to have to share them.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You and me both, sister! Hey!

speaker: Applejack
text: And when y'all are done with that, feel free to have some popcorn for dessert.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You see, Spike? You should never give up. There's nothing we can't overcome if we all work together.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasp] Come on, girls. Princess Celestia wants to see us all in Canterlot immediately!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Celestia, we came as fast as we could!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Thank you, Twilight. Thank you, all.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is this about the weather? And the animals' weird behavior? What's happening out there? Why isn't my magic working? Is there–

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Follow me.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I've called you here for a matter of great importance. It seems an old foe of mine, someone I thought I had defeated long ago, has returned. His name... is Discord.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Discord is the mischievous spirit of disharmony. Before my sister and I stood up to him, he ruled Equestria in an eternal state of unrest and unhappiness. Luna and I saw how miserable life was for Earth ponies, Pegasi, and unicorns alike, so after discovering the Elements of Harmony, we combined our powers and rose up against him, turning him to stone.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: All right, Princess!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I thought the spell we cast would keep him contained forever, but since Luna and I are no longer connected to the Elements, the spell has been broken.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No longer connected?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: This is Canterlot Tower, where the Elements are kept inside since all of you recovered them. I need you to wield the Elements of Harmony once again and stop Discord before he thrusts all of Equestria into eternal chaos.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But why us? Why don't you-

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, look! We're famous!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You six showed the full potential of the Elements by harnessing the magic of your friendship to beat a mighty foe. Although Luna and I once wielded the Elements, it is you who now control their power, and it is you who must defeat Discord!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Celestia, you can count on–

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hold on a second! Eternal chaos comes with *chocolate rain*, you guys. *Chocolate rain*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't listen to her, Princess. We'd be honored to use the Elements of Harmony again.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh. You can keep the Elements. I'll take that case!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Have no fear, ponies. I have total confidence that you will be able to defeat Discord with these!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, well. If anyone needs me, I'll be outside in the chocolate puddles with a *giant* swizzle straw.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The Elements! They're gone!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: That chamber is protected by a powerful spell that only I can break! This doesn't make sense!

speaker: Discord
text: [laughter] Make sense? Oh, what fun is there in making sense?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Discord... Show yourself!

speaker: Discord
text: [chuckling] Did you miss me, Celestia? I missed you. It's quite lonely being encased in stone, but you wouldn't know that, would you, because *I don't turn ponies into stone*.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Enough! What have you done with the Elements of Harmony?

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, I just borrowed them for a teensy little while. [snap]

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You'll never get away with this, Discord!

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, I'd forgotten how grim you can be, Celestia. It's really quite *boring*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey! Nopony insults the Princess!

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, you must be Rainbow Dash, famed for her loyalty, the Element of Harmony you represent.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's right! I'll *always* be loyal to the Princess!

speaker: Discord
text: We'll see about that.

speaker: Rarity
text: I can't believe we're wasting our time talking to a tacky window.

speaker: Discord
text: The beautiful Rarity, representing the element of generosity, if I'm not mistaken?

speaker: Applejack
text: So you know who we are, big deal.

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, I know much more than that, honest Applejack.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You seem to know our strengths too.

speaker: Discord
text: Yes, Twilight Sparkle, and yours is the most powerful and elusive element, magic. Fluttershy's is kindness and Pinkie Pie's is a personal favorite of mine - laughter. [laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Pinkie!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [laughing] He's standing on your head!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Stop stalling, Discord! What have you done with the Elements of Harmony?

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, so boring, Celestia. Really? Fine, I'll tell you, but I'll only tell you *my way*. *To retrieve your missing Elements, just make sense of this change of events. Twists and turns are my master plan. Then find the Elements back where you began.* [laughing]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Can we go home now?

speaker: Applejack
text: What do you reckon he meant? Twists and turns and ending back where we started?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Twists and turns... twists and turns... twists and turns! That's it! I bet Discord hid the Elements in the palace labyrinth!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Good luck, my little ponies. The fate of Equestria is in your hooves.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks, Princess. We won't let you down.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: W-We have to go in there?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nope! Dopey Discord forgot about *these* babies! I'll just do a quick flyover and we'll have the Elements in no time. My wings!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Rarity
text: Your horn! *My* horn! Ahhh!

speaker: Discord
text: [laughing] You–You should see the looks on your faces. Priceless! [laughing]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Give us our wings and horns *back*!

speaker: Discord
text: You'll get them back in good time. I simply took them to ensure there's no cheating. You see, *this* is the first rule of our game: no flying, and no magic.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The *first* rule?

speaker: Discord
text: The second rule is everypony has to play or the game is over, and I win. Good luck, everypony! [laughing]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Never fear, girls. We have each other!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah! Like Twilight said, there's nothing we can't overcome if we all stick together!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right, girls, let's do this!

speaker: All
text: Together! [screaming]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Stay calm, girls! Everypony head to the middle as fast as you can, and we'll regroup there!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Moving out!

speaker: Rarity
text: See you in the center.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yee-haw!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: See you guys there!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasping] What's that? Who's there? Girls!

speaker: Applejack
text: What in tarnation? Where am I?

speaker: Applejack
text: Who are y'all?

speaker: Red apples
text: The keepers of the grove of truth. You may ask us...

speaker: Light-red apples
text: ...one question...

speaker: Green apples
text: ...past, future or present.

speaker: Red apples
text: But be warned...

speaker: Light-red apples
text: ...that the truth...

speaker: Green apples
text: ...may not always be pleasant.

speaker: Applejack
text: All right then. I don't trust this place worth a hill of beans, but I've got a really bad feelin' about this feller Discord. What's gonna come of this mission we're on?

speaker: Red apples
text: For the answer you seek...

speaker: Light-red apples
text: ...go ahead, take a peek.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I hope I never see you again!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Me too!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Fine!

speaker: Rarity
text: Fine!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's settled then.

speaker: Applejack
text: No! Our friendship? Over?!

speaker: Applejack
text: It can't be true. It just can't!

speaker: Applejack
text: That just can't be the truth.

speaker: Light-red apples
text: When all the truth does...

speaker: Green apples
text: ...is make your heart ache, sometimes a lie is easier to take. [laughing]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack! Thank goodness! I thought I heard voices over here. Who were you talking to?

speaker: Applejack
text: I was talking to... uh... nopony! Nopony whatsoever!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What?

speaker: Applejack
text: Nothing. Come on, uh, we best be going.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Did Applejack just...? Come on, Twilight! Applejack wouldn't lie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [chuckling] Whee! This is the greatest balloon garden I've ever seen! It's the *first* balloon garden I've ever seen, but still! Wah! [splash]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, what gives?

speaker: Discord
text: What's the matter, Pinkie Pie? I thought you appreciated a good laugh?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's different. They're laughing *at* me.

speaker: Discord
text: It's hardly different. Your friends laugh at you all the time.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: My friends laugh *with* me, not *at* me.

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, really? [laughing]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No! Stop it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Stop laughing at me!

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, poor Pinkie Pie. And here I thought laughter made you happy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gravelly] Happy? I don't think so.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie! Are we glad to see you!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh you are, huh? Why? Need a good laugh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie? What do you suppose has her so upset? It's not like her.

speaker: Applejack
text: I didn't notice anything strange about Pinkie.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Weird. Better pick up the pace before the stress of this gets the better of all of us.

speaker: Rarity
text: I was expecting an audience with the Princess, not outdoor sports. Agh. Oh my...

speaker: Discord
text: [laughing] Welcome to your lucky day, Rarity. You've found the one thing in Equestria that could rival my face for sheer beauty. What do you think? You like?

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes... I like very much... No! No, I shan't succumb to such fabulousness. Must... get to the center... to meet... the others. [grunt] Mine!

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, Rarity. It took forever, but it was worth it. Who knew three little gemstones would turn out to be this handsome *hunk* of a diamond? Now to get you home. [grunts]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity! Are we glad to see... Why are you carrying a humongous boulder?

speaker: Rarity
text: What do you mean, "boulder"? This big beautiful bedazzling rock is a diamond! And it's all mine. Keep your envious little eyes off it! I found it and it's mine fair and square! [grunting]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [teeth chatter] Okay, I can do this. I can... [scream] Oh, wait a minute... Butterflies? Wait! Don't leave me here!

speaker: Butterflies
text: Fluttershy, looks like you've been left behind by your so-called friends, huh?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no. I'm certain they're doing their best to find me.

speaker: Butterflies
text: Well, it must be so upsetting to know how weak and helpless they think you are.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Not at all. I *am* weak and helpless and I appreciate their understanding.

speaker: Butterflies
text: Yes... Well, surely it *burns* you up... I mean, that they're always pointing out your flaws, right?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Not really. In fact, I think I'm awfully lucky to have friends who want me to be the best I can be.

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, for goodness sake! You've been kind for far too long, my dear. Time to be *cruel*. Arrivederci!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy! I'm so glad to see a friendly face. This awful labyrinth is getting to everypony.

speaker: Applejack
text: Grrr...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Aw, boo-hoo-hoo! Why don't you wave your magic little horn and make everything all right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, that's right, you can't. You don't have one.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What is happening to my friends?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And what are *you* laughing at?

speaker: Applejack
text: Chocolate milk.

speaker: Rarity
text: Little help here! Thanks, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're welcome–

speaker: Rarity
text: But don't get any ideas about my gem! I know where you live.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I've got you now, element.

speaker: Discord
text: Oh. I can see why you like these clouds so much. Very plush.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Get off there and put 'em up! Come on! Let's go!

speaker: Discord
text: Hey, I'm here to deliver a message.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I've got a message for you too!

speaker: Discord
text: Listen closely, this is important. *A weighty choice is yours to make: a right selection or a big mistake. If a wrong choice you choose to pursue, the foundations of home will crumble without you.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Cloudsdale? Crumble... without me? No!

speaker: Discord
text: That box contains your wings. You can take them and leave the game, or you can carry on aimlessly wandering this maze. Your choice.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Must... find... Rainbow Dash. As a team... we're unstoppable. Rainbow Dash won't let us down.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, looky there. Rainbow Dash is flying away. She's abandonin' us.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now I know that's a lie. [gasp] How can it be?

speaker: Discord
text: Well, well, well. *Some*pony broke the "no wings; no magic" rule. [snap] Game's over, my little ponies. You *didn't* find your precious elements. [mewl] Looks like we might be due for a big old storm of chaos! [laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Celestia, we came as fast as we could.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I need you to wield the Elements of Harmony once again and stop Discord.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The Elements! They're gone!

speaker: Discord
text: [laughter] Everypony has to play, or the game is over and I win.

speaker: Applejack
text: Our friendship...over?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Who are you talking to?

speaker: Applejack
text: Nopony! Nopony whatsoever.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie! Are we glad to see you!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Why? Need a good laugh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What is happening to my friends?

speaker: Discord
text: Looks like we might be due for a big old storm of chaos. [laughter]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And what are *you* laughing at!?

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, you ponies are just the most fun I've had in aeons.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, quit it! You'd better think before you laugh at the Pink...ie Pie!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, yeah? Well ha, ha.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Quit it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No. Ha, ha.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Quit it!*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No. Ha ha-ha ha ha.

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh... Rarity? This here diamond of yours? Twilight said we should split it six ways since we, uh, found it together.

speaker: Rarity
text: HI-YAH! Try it, punk. He's mine. All mine! Ya! Ya! Ya!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Girls, why are you all acting like this?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Quit it! Stop it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We need to stick together.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ha, ha.

speaker: Discord
text: [laughter] It's just too entertaining.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Stop it, Discord. You're not playing fair.

speaker: Discord
text: *I'm* not playing fair? Perhaps we haven't met. I'm Discord, spirit of chaos and disharmony. Hello?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How are we supposed to find the Elements of Harmony when you took away the labyrinth before we could get to the end?

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, wait, did you...? [laughter] How funny! You thought the Elements were *in* the labyrinth?

speaker: Flashback Discord
text: *Twists and turns are my master plan. Then find the Elements back where you began.*

speaker: Discord
text: I never said they were in the labyrinth.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But...but...

speaker: Discord
text: Keep trying, Twilight Sparkle. [mockingly] Maybe the magic of friendship can help you. Now if you'll excuse me, I have some chaos to wreak.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Chocolate milk? I hate chocolate milk!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [grunt] Think, Twilight, think! "Find the Elements back where you began." Back where you began.

speaker: Rarity
text: Don't touch my gem!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm touching your gem, Rarity. Ha, ha.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What 'chu laughin' at?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh. I just want to go home... Wait a minute... Home! "Back where you began!" The Elements must be in... Ponyville! Come on, girls. I'm certain this is what Discord's riddle really meant. If we get back to the library, I have a book that I just know can give us a clue. Ah!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Good boy, Angel. Mama's so proud.

speaker: Applejack
text: Wow, I can see *so* much better now. Whoa! I meant to do that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wah! Ahh! Whoa! Discord's turned our dirt roads into soap!

speaker: Discord
text: Beautiful, isn't it? This is the new and improved Ponyville, and these are only my first of changes.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This may look like fun, but it's not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh.

speaker: Discord
text: Picture it. The chaos capital of the world.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can't picture anything. It's too dark. [splash]

speaker: Discord
text: Well, wait a few minutes and you'll see it in the beautiful light of day. Or not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ponyville, the chaos capital of the world? Not if I have anything to say about it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Don't worry, you won't. [laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] Okay, we're here. Everyone please, please, please just go inside, *please*?

speaker: Applejack
text: I absolutely refuse.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: With pleasure.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I hate libraries!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pleeeease, we gotta hurry!

speaker: Rarity
text: Forget it, Twilight. I know what you're up to. The second I go in, you'll have your little minion Spike come and take Tom!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Tom?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, it's not going to work.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're not going in without him, are you?

speaker: Rarity
text: Mm-mm.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [grunting] Fine!

speaker: Spike
text: Ah! Brrr! What did you do that for, Fluttershy?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: 'Cause you just looked so peaceful.

speaker: Spike
text: I...uh...huh?

speaker: Rarity
text: Careful, Twilight! You'll ruin his beautiful finish.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, for the love of...

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, what's going on? Why does everybody look so...gray?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't ask. I need you to help me find something.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hey, Twilight, what's soaking wet and clueless?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy, I've had just about enough– [splash]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Your face! [bang]

speaker: Spike
text: What's happened to everypony?

speaker: Applejack
text: I guess you just bring out the worst in us, Spike.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh. No time to explain. We've got to find the reference guide to the Elements of Harmony before *somepony* does something she'll *regret*!

speaker: Spike
text: The Elements of Harmony? Oh, I know exactly where that book is. Found it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hah!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy, you'd better give me that book!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sing-song voice] Keep away!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey! Applejack, give me that book!

speaker: Applejack
text: I don't have any book.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie! You guys! Stop it right now!

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh!

speaker: Rarity
text: Mine!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey, do you even know what you just stole?

speaker: Rarity
text: No, but if you want it, I want it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [strained groan] GIVE ME THAT BOOK!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Where is she? Where's Rarity?

speaker: Applejack
text: Beats me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Lies!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Get back! All of you! This is *my* book, and I'm going to READ IT! [gasp] The Elements!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The Elements! They were here all along!

speaker: Spike
text: This is great! Now you guys can defeat Discord and put everything back to normal!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See, girls? We did it! We found the Elements of Harmony! Together!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You don't even care, do you?

speaker: All
text: No!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] I never thought it would happen. My friends... have turned into complete *JERKS*! Necklace! Necklace! Necklace! Necklace! And... big crown thingy! Come on, everypony, let's go!

speaker: Spike
text: But Twilight, aren't you missing somepony?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nope. We've got the liar, the grump, the hoarder, and the brute. That just about covers it.

speaker: Spike
text: But what about Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Congratulations, Spike, you're the new Rainbow Dash. Now let's go!

speaker: Spike
text: [gasp] Me? B-b-but what if she finds out I've been impersonating her? [moan] That won't end well.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Too bad, you're Rainbow Dash. Now let's go defeat Discord so we don't ever have to talk to each other again!

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah! Woo-hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Move! Look out, here comes Tom!

speaker: Discord
text: Well, well, well, I see you've found the Elements of Harmony. How terrifying!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Discord! I've figured out your lame riddle. You're in for it now!

speaker: Discord
text: I certainly am. You've *clearly* out-dueled me, and now it's time to meet my fate. I'm prepared to be defeated now, ladies. Fire when ready.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Formation, now!

speaker: All
text: Eh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "Rainbow Dash", get over here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right, let's get this over with.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's going on?

speaker: Applejack
text: Mine's workin'. There must be somethin' wrong with *yours*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I HATE the Elements of Harmony!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hmph! Garbage.

speaker: Rarity
text: MINE!

speaker: Spike
text: Sorry, Twilight. I guess I'd better get back upstairs and clean up the library. Good luck with all this– whoa!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [mockingly] Oops, sorry, Rainbow *Crash*. [chuckle]

speaker: Discord
text: Bravo, ponies, bravo! [clapping, random noises] Harmony in Equestria is officially dead. Discord rules, Celestia drools. [laughter]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's *your* fault it didn't work.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Who are you talking to?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Any of you! ALL OF YOU! I'm outta here!

speaker: Applejack
text: I better go, too. I've got new *better* friends waiting for me at the farm.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yeah! I'm sick of you *losers*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: FINE! Leave! See if I care! I don't need you guys either! With friends like you, who needs...enemies...?

speaker: Discord
text: [laughing] Oh, my stomach! Twilight, you've got to see what I just did.

speaker: Discord
text: It's priceless! [laughing] Come now, Twilight Sparkle. You've got to get into the spirit of things! After all, this is your new home.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not anymore...

speaker: Discord
text: YES! [triumphant laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pack your things, Spike, we're leaving.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't ask where we're going, 'cause I don't know yet. Just not here.

speaker: Spike
text: Can't...move. The princess...has been sending these...since I came back upstairs. [belch] Make it stop!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: These are all the letters I've written to the princess since I've lived in Ponyville. But why would she send them back?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *"Real friends don't care what your cover is."*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *"Friendship is a wondrous and powerful thing."*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *"And like the path cut through the orchard, there will always be a way through."*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *"The best thing to do is stay true to yourself."*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *"Everypony has a special magical connection with her friends. Maybe even before she's met them."*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! Spike, it's all so clear! Can't you see? Discord's trying to distract us from what's important. He knows how powerful our friendships are, and he's trying to keep us from seeing it. Do you remember what I said the first day we arrived in Ponyville? I told you that the future of Equestria didn't rest on me making friends. But the *opposite* is true! The friendships I've made since I've been here are what saved Equestria from Nightmare Moon. And now they need to save it from Discord!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're right, Spike. I've got to fight for my friendships. For them. For me. For Equestria!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh...uh...why don't you just stay here and rest? I'll take care of the whole fighting for friendship thing myself.

speaker: Applejack
text: And so I tried to defeat Discord, but none of my so-called "friends" would lift a hoof to help me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, I'm here to fight for our friendship.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, *now* you want to fight. Where you went when I was battlin' Discord?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Snap out of it. This isn't you! You're *not* a liar.

speaker: Applejack
text: Wh-what happened? Twilight! [sigh] I saw a vision of us feudin' and fightin'. I couldn't face the truth, so I started tellin' lies. Can you ever forgive me?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I already have. Come on!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh no! Twilight, Applejack, I just had the worst dream!

speaker: Rarity
text: [off-screen] What do you think you're doing? Get away from my gem! Get away--!

speaker: Rarity
text: [grunting] Let us never speak of this again.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [laughter] And I-I turned gray! [giggle] Can you believe it?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh? She's not here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Without Rainbow Dash, we can't use the Elements.

speaker: Applejack
text: She could be anywhere by now! We're never gonna find her.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah, we will, 'cause she's right there!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, guys!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We've been looking everywhere for you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's nice.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Discord's still on the loose! We need you to help us defeat him with your element, Loyalty!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pfft. Loyalty, schmoyalty! Have you guys seen Ponyville? It's a disaster! I'm staying here in Cloudsdale where everything's awesome.

speaker: Rarity
text: How in Equestria can she think that tiny patch of clouds is Cloudsdale?

speaker: Applejack
text: The same way he got you to think that cheap rock was a bona fide diamond.

speaker: Rarity
text: I thought we agreed never to speak of that again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Time for Plan B.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [whispering] Okay, Fluttershy, you grab Rainbow Dash and hold her down. Applejack will lower me down from this rope so I can cast the memory spell on her.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Got it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um...I'm just wondering if it's okay if I hold you down against your will for a little bit?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nice try! Ponyville's *your* problem, not mine.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come on, Fluttershy, we've got to catch her. Hyah! Applejack!

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: WHOA!

speaker: Rarity
text: PINKIE! You were supposed to secure the ROPE!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oops.

speaker: Applejack
text: Rarity, Pinkie, hold on! Y'all are slowing her down!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, Fluttershy, would you be a dear and FLY FASTER, please?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [whimper/crying] I can't!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If you can't catch her, Discord wins!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: That big... dumb... MEANIE!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, Applejack, last rope! Make it count!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Lemme go! I don't need you guys! Leave me alone!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wh-what happened? [gasp] How's Ponyville? Where are the Elements?! Did we stop Discord?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe it's a little early for a group hug.

speaker: Discord
text: [laughter] Chaos is a wonderful, wonderful thing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not as wonderful as friendship.

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, this again?

speaker: Applejack
text: That's right. You couldn't break apart our friendship for long.

speaker: Discord
text: Oh, Applejack, don't lie to me. I'm the one who made you a liar. Will you ever learn? [gasp]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'll tell you what we've learned, Discord: we've learned that friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt it's worth fighting for!

speaker: Discord
text: Ugh, gag. Fine, go ahead, try and use your little Elements. *Friend* me. Just make it quick. I'm missing some excellent chaos here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All right, ladies, let's show him what friendship can do!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait-wait-wait! [slurp] [growl]

speaker: Discord
text: Huh. What's this? No. NO!!!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: We are gathered here today to once again honor the heroism of these six friends who stood up to the villain Discord and saved Equestria from eternal chaos.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Quill.

speaker: Spike
text: Check.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Parchment.

speaker: Spike
text: Check.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Extra ink.

speaker: Spike
text: Check.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Extra* extra ink.

speaker: Spike
text: Check.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is that everything on the checklist?

speaker: Spike
text: Yep.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Great. Now that we've completed the checklist of things we need to create a checklist, we can make my checklist of the things I have to get done by the end of the day. Ready?

speaker: Spike
text: Ready!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Item 1: Create checklist of the things I have to accomplish by the end of the day.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How are we doing, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: Let's see... We've already dropped off your cape at the cleaners, returned the blackboard you borrowed from Cheerilee, ordered new parchment and quills from the stationery shop...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hmm... Seems like we just placed an order for those a few days ago.

speaker: Spike
text: Can't imagine why we go through so many of them.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sounds like we're ahead of schedule. What's next?

speaker: Spike
text: Cupcakes!

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, I only ordered twelve.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Oh, I know, dear, but I had an extra. So I thought I'd make it a baker's dozen.

speaker: Spike
text: Uhhh-no!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, that was very thoughtful of you. It's just some of the icing from the extra cupcake is getting all over the one next to it. See?

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Ohh... sure...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's just that I'm planning on sharing these at a picnic later and I don't want anypony to feel like somepony else is getting more icing.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Oh, no... of course not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not to worry, I'll just move some of this one to... hmm... I think I may have scooped too much... oops! Now those two have more. Let's just try this again... Hmm, no, that won't do. Let me just... hmm... put some here, and... no, that's not right. A little more on this one, a little bit... and wait... I'll just... ooh, a little bit here, and here, and... perfect!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Hmm, oh yes... much better...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, time to tackle the next item on our-- oops! Looks like we're going to have to add 'give a baby dragon a bath' to our list.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Very efficient! And a little bit gross.

speaker: Spike
text: Eh.

speaker: Spike
text: Looks like that's everything!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Almost everything.

speaker: Spike
text: "*Triple*-check checklist to make sure we didn't miss anything when we double checked the checklist!" Uh... check! Ugh... I've been holding that quill so long, I've got a claw cramp! Well, good thing we don't have anything to report to Princess Celestia this week... I don't think I could write another word!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We haven't sent a letter to Princess Celestia this week?!

speaker: Spike
text: Why? Is that bad?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Bad?* *BAD?* Of course it's *bad*! I'm supposed to send Princess Celestia a letter every week, telling her about a lesson I've learned about friendship! Not every other week, not every ten days, *every... single... week!*

speaker: Spike
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ohh... Where's my calendar, where's my calendar?!

speaker: Spike
text: Where it.. always is?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: When did we send the last one?

speaker: Spike
text: Last... Tuesday?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And today is...

speaker: Spike
text: Tuesday?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Argh! Nononononononono! If I don't send her a letter by sundown, I'll be... *tardy*!

speaker: Spike
text: What's that now?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Tar-dy, Spike! Late, I'll be late! Oh, how could I let this happen? I'm usually so organized. I've never been late with an assignment.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, please! You're the most studious student ever! I'm sure the Princess will forgive you if you miss one little deadline.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm afraid to take that chance, Spike. This is the ruler of all of Equestria we're talking about. The pony who holds my fate in her hooves! What if she doesn't forgive me?

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah... I don't think she--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What if instead she starts thinking I'm not taking my studies on friendship seriously?

speaker: Spike
text: Why would she--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What if she makes me come back to Canterlot and puts me back in school and makes me *prove* I've been taking them seriously by giving me a test?! What if I don't pass?!

speaker: Spike
text: Well, why wouldn't you pass--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She's my teacher. Do you know what teachers do to students who don't pass? They send them back a grade! But she won't just send me back a grade. She'll send me back to... *magic kindergarten*.

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight? Twilight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Spike
text: That is the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard! You're not going to be sent back to magic kindergarten.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're right. I have no reason to worry. Because I'm going to solve a friend's problem and get that letter to Princess Celestia before sundown!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So... got any problems, troubles, conundrums, or any other sort of issues, major or minor, that I as a *good* friend could help you solve?

speaker: Spike
text: Huh. Hmm. Huunh. Huh... I got nothin'.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] Then it looks like I'm going to have to find somepony who does.

speaker: Spike
text: [sigh] This won't end well.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You've got this, Twilight. You still have plenty of time to get that letter to Princess Celestia! Has to be *somepony* who needs the help of a good friend!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't worry, Rarity! I'm here!

speaker: Rarity
text: [sobbing] Why me-e-e-e-e-ee... [gasp] WHYYYY?! Why? Why-y?! And of all the worst things that could happen, this is *THE. WORST. POSSIBLE. THING!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's happened? Are you alright?

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] I've lost my diamond-encrusted purple ribbon! I have searched high, and I have searched low. Low and high! High and low! But I can't find it anywhere! Anywhe-e-e-e-ere! How can I possibly finish my latest creation if I can't find it?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Never fear, Rarity. As your friend I'll do my best to help you fi--

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, there it is. Isn't it always just the last place you look?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So... you just lost your ribbon?

speaker: Rarity
text: Mm-hm!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But now you've found it?

speaker: Rarity
text: Yuh-huh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And nothing else is bothering you? Nothing that I, as a good friend could help you with?

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmm... there is one thing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes?

speaker: Rarity
text: I think I left my measuring tape under the fabric over there. Could you get that for me?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sighs] Measuring tape? Sure.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight? Is there something bother-- Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No need to panic. Rarity is just one pony. I'm sure one of my other friends will need me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What in the world...? Rainbow must be angry with Applejack! She must hate her guts! How wonderful! Rainbow Dash! Stop! Listen, Rainbow. I know you're upset with Applejack, but don't worry. Whatever it is that has come between you two, I'm sure that I, as a good friend, can help you resolve your problems.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, what are you talking about?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Rainbow Dash, you don't have to hide your feelings from me! I can tell you two must've had a terrible fight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now, why don't you tell me all about your issues with Applejack.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I don't have any issues with Applejack.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You don't? Then why are you destroying her property?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Because she asked me to. Right, Applejack?

speaker: Applejack
text: Yes, ma'am. I wanted to put up a new barn, but this one's gotta come down first. Hehe. Now get back to it, R.D.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You got it, boss!

speaker: Applejack
text: I'd take cover if I were you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] I can't believe I wasted all that time. I should have just come here first. Fluttershy always has some fear she's trying to get over. As a good friend, I'll be able to help her.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How can this be happening? Of all the days she had to stop being such a scaredy-pony, she had to pick today?! What am I going to do?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You really should have come to me sooner. You were carrying so much tension in that shoulder.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's fine. It'll all be fine. The day isn't over yet. But it will be over soon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [groans] It'll be all over! My time in Ponyville! My advanced studies! Nono. You're a good student. You can do this. Ooh! But what if I can't? You can! You just have to keep it together. Keep. It. Together!

speaker: Spike
text: Are you talking to... yourself? Twilight?

speaker: Spike
text: *Snap out of it*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Spike
text: Are you okay?

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, I'm really worried. I mean this letter thing is really getting to you. Here. You've been so anxious all day that you completely forgot about the picnic. Why don't you just relax and go hang out with--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The picnic! I should go see my friends!

speaker: Spike
text: I'm glad you've come to your senses.

speaker: Rarity
text: Please tell me I did not forget the plates. [gasp] I did. I totally forgot them. Of all the worst things that could happen, this is *THE. WORST. POSSIBLE. THING!* [cries] Why, why, why... Uh... What? You didn't expect me to lay on the grass, did you?

speaker: Applejack
text: You alright, hun?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No! I am not alright.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's just terrible.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Rarity
text: Yes?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Simply awful.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Rarity
text: Yes!?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's the most horrific trouble I've ever been in and I really really *really* need your help!

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Rarity
text: *YES!?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My letter to Princess Celestia is almost overdue, and I haven't learned anything about friendship!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, thank goodness. I thought something really awful had happened.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [strangled noises] Something awful *has* happened! If I don't turn in the letter on time, I'll be tardy! TARDY!

speaker: Applejack
text: No offense, sugarcube, but it looks like somepony's gettin' themselves all worked up over nothin'.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is not nothing. This is everything. I need you guys to help me find somepony with a problem I can fix before sundown! *My whole life depends on it*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [giggles] Oh, Twilight, you're such a crack-up! [laughs]

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on now. Have a seat and stop sweatin' the small stuff.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wow. I've never seen Twilight so upset before.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, what a drama queen. Mm. Relatively speaking...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Clock is ticking, Twilight. Clock. Is. *Ticking*. Keep it together. If I can't *find* a friendship problem... I'll *make* a friendship problem!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hi, girls! [twitch, twitch]

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh, hi, Twilight. How's it go--

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Gr-eat. Just great. You three look like you're doing great too! Looks like three good friends who obviously don't need the help of another good friend. This is Smarty Pants. She was mine when I was your age, and now I want to give her to you!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Uhh... she's... great.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah. Great.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I really... like her... mane.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She even comes with her own notebook and quill, for when you want to *pretend* she's doing her homework!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: That's... um... great.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah... great.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I really like her... mane?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I just hope the fact that there are three of you and only one of her doesn't become a problem! I'd hate to cause a rift between such good friends. So, who wants to play with her first?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Uh... You should play with her first, Sweetie Belle. Y'know, 'cause you like her mane so much.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Nonononononono. I think Scootaloo should get to play with her first.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: I'd love to, but, um, you take her, Apple Bloom.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Applejack says it's important to share.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [thinking] I gotta think of something! Thinkthinkthinkthinkthink Twilight, think! [gasp] That's it! [normal] Ooh, you're going to *like* Smarty Pants. And you're going to like her more than *anything*.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [gasp] I want it.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I *need* it.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I really like her mane!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The 'want it, need it' spell. Works every time. Okay, okay, let's break it up. I think we can all see that there is an important lesson to be learned here about-- Ugh! C'mon, girls, we're all friends here, right? Don't you think you ought to share?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No way!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [annoyed groan] Big McIntosh! Thank goodness! You've gotta help me get that doll away from those girls!

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, thank you so much. Now if you could just give her to me?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Nnnope.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Give her back!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: What's all the commotion about?

speaker: Orange Swirl
text: They're fighting over that doll!

speaker: Bon Bon
text: That incredible, amazing doll!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Can't... get... a clear shot! [grunting]

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Gimme!

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Nope.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, what have I done?!

speaker: Applejack
text: Y'all hear that? What in the name of all things oats 'n apples is goin' on here?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't look at it!

speaker: Rarity
text: Don't look at what?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My Smarty Pants doll! I enchanted her and now everypony is fighting over her!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Why would you enchant your doll?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I had to do something! I had nothing to report to Princess Celestia! I thought if I couldn't *find* a problem, I'd *make* a problem! The day is almost over!

speaker: Applejack
text: Not almost!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Twilight Sparkle!

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoa nelly.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Meet me in the library.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Goodbye, girls. If you care to visit, I'll be in magic kindergarten, back in Canterlot.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Magic kindergarten?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Canterlot?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We're never gonna see Twilight again!

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, what are we gonna do, y'all?

speaker: Rarity
text: Of all the worst things that could happen, this is *THE. WORST. POSSIBLE. THING!* What? I really mean it this time!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But...but... I'm supposed to send you a letter about friendship every week. I missed the deadline. I'm a bad student! I'm... tardy!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You are a wonderful student, Twilight. I don't have to get a letter every week to know that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Really?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You can't punish her!

speaker: Applejack
text: It wasn't her fault!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I'm listening.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Please, your Highness. We all saw that Twilight was upset.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But we thought that the thing she was worrying about wasn't *worth* worrying about.

speaker: Applejack
text: So when she ran off all worked up, not a single one of us tried to stop her.

speaker: Rarity
text: As Twilight's good friends, we *should* have taken her feelings seriously and been there for her!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Please don't take her away from us just because we were too insensitive to help her.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Looks like you all learned a pretty valuable lesson today.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Rarity
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Very well. I'll forget Twilight's "punishment" on one condition.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: From this day forth, I would like you *all* to report to me your findings on the magic of friendship when, and only when, you happen to discover them.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Celestia, wait! How did you know I was in trouble?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Your friend Spike made me aware that you were letting your fears get the best of you. I commend him for taking your feelings seriously. Now, if you will all excuse me, I must return to Canterlot. I'm expecting some mail.

speaker: Applejack
text: Y'all heard the Princess. Spike, take a letter.

speaker: Applejack
text: [clears throat] *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Applejack
text: *We're writin' to you because today we all learned a little somethin' about friendship.*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *We learned that you should take your friends' worries seriously.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Even if you don't think that she has anything to worry about.*

speaker: Rarity
text: *And that you shouldn't let your worries turn a small problem...*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *...into an enormously huge entire-town-in-total-chaos Princess-has-to-come-and-save-the-day problem.*

speaker: Applejack
text: *Signed, your loyal subjects.*

speaker: Spike
text: *P.S. Obviously Spike did not have to learn a lesson, because he is the best, most awesome friend a pony could ask for. Unlike everypony else, he took things seriously, and-* Eheh... uh... yeah... I'll just, um...

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh, come on, Twilight. We're gonna be late for the Nightmare Night festival. Huh? Are you that one kooky grandpa from Ponyville Retirement Village?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm Star Swirl the Bearded! Father of the amniomorphic spell? Did you even read that book I gave you about obscure unicorn history?

speaker: Spike
text: Uh.. [knocking] That sounds important. [yelp]

speaker: Fillies
text: Nightmare Night! What a fright! Give us something sweet to bite!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hi, everypony. Great costumes. Happy Nightmare Night, Granny Smith.

speaker: Granny Smith
text: I should have been asleep five hours ago.

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Pipsqueak the pirate, at your service. It's my very first Nightmare Night.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Since you moved here from Trottingham?

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: No, my very first Nightmare Night ever!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [chicken squawk] Enough chitchat! Time is candy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie, aren't you a little old for this?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Too old for free candy? [chicken squawk] *Never.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [bell jingles] Do you like it?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah! Great costume, Twilight! You make a fantastic weirdo clown!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A clown? Look at the borders on these robes. These are hoof-stitched!

speaker: Spike
text: It's a great costume! Huh! Grandpa!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Star Swirl the Bearded is only the most important conjurer of the pre-classical era.

speaker: Background ponies
text: Yeah! Whoo-hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: He created more than two hundred spells! He even has a shelf in the Canterlot library of magic named after him. Maybe I should start up a pony group to teach ponies about history. I bet everypony would love it! Don't you, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: [chewing candy] Mm-hmm! [eating sounds] *I* love it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey look, we're here already! Should we get something to eat?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight, Twilight! Look at our haul! Ah! Can you believe it? And then, we went to Cheerilee's house, and got a bunch more goodies. Didn't we, Pip?

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Sure did!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And then, we had to stop and wait for Granny Smith, and -–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash, that wasn't very nice.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Lighten up, old-timer. This is the best night of the year for pranks!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Look what you did to Spike!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It's all in good fun. Oh! Oh! There's another group over there!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Happy Nightmare Night, Applejack!

speaker: Applejack
text: Howdy, Spike! Hey, Twilight! Nice costume.

speaker: Spike
text: Thanks! I'm a dragon.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She means *me*, Spike.

speaker: Applejack
text: With that beard, I reckon you're some sorta country music singer.

speaker: Applejack
text: While y'all are here, ya' feel like bobbin' for an apple?

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Thank you, everypony, and welcome to the Nightmare Night festival!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Now, all the little ponies who have been out collecting sweets should follow our friend Zecora to hear the legend of... *Nightmare Moon*! [laughter]

speaker: Spike
text: Spooky voice might work better if she wasn't dressed like that.

speaker: Zecora
text: Follow me, and very soon, you'll hear the tale of Nightmare Moon.

speaker: Zecora
text: Listen close, my little dears, I'll tell you where you got your fears of Nightmare Night, so dark and scary. [blows] Of Nightmare Moon, who makes you wary.

speaker: Zecora
text: Every year, we put on a disguise, to save ourselves from her searching eyes.

speaker: Zecora
text: But Nightmare Moon wants just one thing: to gobble up ponies in one quick swing!

speaker: Zecora
text: Hungrily, she soars the sky. If she sees nopony, she passes by. So if she comes and all is clear, Equestria is safe another year!

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Uh, Miss Zecora, if we wear costumes to hide from Nightmare Moon, so she won't gobble us up, how come we still need to give her some of our candy?

speaker: Zecora
text: A perfect question, my little friend. For Nightmare Moon you must not offend. [blows] Fill up her belly with a treat or two, so she won't return to come eat you!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [screaming] Everypony! Just dump some candy and get out of here!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] It's Nightmare Moon! Run!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [awestruck] Princess Luna!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Citizens of Ponyville! We have graced your tiny village with our presence, so that you might behold the real Princess of the Night! A creature of nightmares no longer, but instead a pony who desires your love and admiration! Together we shall change this dreadful celebration into a bright and glorious feast!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Did you hear that, everypony? Nightmare Moon says she's gonna feast on us all!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [normal voice] What? No, children, no! You no longer have reason to fear us! Screams of delight is what your princess desires, not screams of terror! [stomps hoof] Madame Mayor, thy Princess of the Night hath arrived.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: What is the matter with you? Very well, then. Be that way. We won't even bother with the traditional royal farewell.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm gonna go talk to her.

speaker: Spike
text: You can't talk to her! She's Nightmare Moon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, she's not. I saw the Elements of Harmony change her back to good. But it seems like she's having some trouble adjusting after being gone for a thousand years.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Luna? Hi, my name is -–

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Star Swirl the Bearded. Commendable costume! Thou even got the bells right.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank you! *Finally!* Somepony who gets my costume! Uh, I just came to welcome you to our celebration! My actual name is -–

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Twilight Sparkle. [booming voice] It was thou who unleashed the powers of harmony upon us and took away our dark powers!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And that was a good thing, right?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [normal voice] But of course. We could not be happier. Is that not clear?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, you kinda sound like you're yelling at me.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: But this is the traditional royal Canterlot voice! It is tradition to speak using the royal "we", and to use [booming voice] this much volume when addressing our subjects!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You know, that might explain why your appearance was met with... *mixed results*. I think if you just changed your approach a bit, you might be met with a warmer reception.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Change our approach?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Lower the volume?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [normal voice] Ohhh. We have been locked away for a thousand years. We are... not sure we can.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't worry, Princess. Fluttershy can give you some great pointers. She's delicate and demure with the sweetest little voice.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Go away! No candy here! Visitors not welcome on Nightmare Night!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [nervous laughing] Fluttershy, it's me, Twilight!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It is you. Ah, and Nightmare Moon. [gasp] Nightmare Moon? [yelps]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [nervous laughter] Wait right here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy... you remember *Princess Luna*?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Charmed.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [timidly] Likewise.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Twilight Sparkle hath spoken of the sweetness of thy voice. We ask thou teachest to us to speak as thou speakest.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [very quiet] Okay.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Shall our lessons begin?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [whisper] Okay.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Shall we mimic thy voice?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [quiet] Okay.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] How is this?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [hurriedly] Perfect, lesson over!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A little quieter, princess.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] How is... [loud voice] this?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Better. Right, Fluttershy?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [nervous, dazed laughter] Yes.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [loud voice] How... about... now?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now you're getting it.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [normal voice] And... how about now?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes! Well done.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] I thank thee, dear Fluttershy! Our normal speaking voice shall surely win us the hearts of thy fellow villagers.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Fluttershy! You've gotta hide us! Nightmare Moon is here and... [chicken squawk] Ah! She stole Fluttershy's voice so she can't scream when she *gobbles her up*!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] Nay, children, wait! [normal voice] I mean... nay, children, no, wait.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come on, princess. Time for plan B.

speaker: All
text: Hurray!

speaker: Sassaflash
text: Aah!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: It is of no use, Twilight Sparkle. They have never liked us and they never shall.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My friend Applejack is one of the most likable ponies around. I'm sure she'll have some ideas.

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Heee...!

speaker: Applejack
text: Whoop. Careful there, partner. [whimper]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh... Applejack, the princess is looking for a little advice on how to fit in around here.

speaker: Applejack
text: "Fit in"? Really?

speaker: Applejack
text: I mean... that's easy! All you gotta do is have the right attitude. Loosen up a bit, be positive, play a few games, have some fun.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Fun? What is this "fun" thou speakest of? Pray tell, what purpose do these serve?

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Try to land the sp-sp-spiders on the web.

speaker: Applejack
text: You can do it, princess!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Ha! Your princess enjoys this "fun"! In what other ways may we experience it?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fire away, princess!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Ha ha! The fun has been doubled!

speaker: All
text: Hurray! [cheering]

speaker: Applejack
text: Why don't you try bobbin' for apples? We got the best apples in Equestria here, princess.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: I ask that thou call us... me... Luna, fair Applejack. Hear me, villagers! All of you! Call me Luna!

speaker: All
text: Luna... [approving chatter]

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Show me to these bobbing apples.

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Whoa! [splash]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, gals. Anypony seen Pip? We lost him the last time we had to run– [chicken squawk] Aaah! Nightmare Moon is gobbling Pipsqueak! Everypony run!

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Help! My backside has been gobbled!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: 'Tis a lie! Thy backside is whole and ungobbled, thou ungrateful whelp! [hoof stomp, thunder] Fair villagers, please do not back away. Let us join together in... fun!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Not enough fun for you? What say you to *this*!?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Huzzah! How many points do I receive?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Do not run away!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: As your princess, we command you!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [deafening voice] *Be still!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess, remember! Watch the screaming!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [booming voice] No, Twilight Sparkle! We must use the traditional royal Canterlot voice for what we are about to say. Since you choose to fear your princess rather than love her, and dishonor her with this insulting celebration, we decree that Nightmare Night shall be canceled! Forever!

speaker: Applejack
text: [sigh] Shoot. We had everything goin' our way. Luna was happy, everypony in town was happy, now look at 'em.

speaker: Noi
text: [crying] But I wanted to be a zombie next year.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's not over yet.

speaker: Applejack
text: What are you gonna do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm going to do what I do best. Lecture her!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Leave me be, Twilight Sparkle.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess, I'm sorry it hasn't worked out how we wanted. But you have to believe me when I tell you that Nightmare Night is one of the most popular celebrations we have.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Yes. I can tell. By all the adoring shrieks of the children as they *run away*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No! No shrieking. No screaming or squealing either. Okay?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [muffled] Okay.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There's something I want you to see. And I promise that it's safe, but you really, really, really can't shriek. Do you promise not to shriek?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mm-hmm. [chicken squawk]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie, you remember Princess Luna, right?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Ah. The ringleader of the frightened children. Hast thou come to make peace?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nightmare Moon! [chicken squawk]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She's changed, Pinkie! She's not evil or scary anymore! And she definitely doesn't want to gobble you up!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, duh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I know that. Sheesh, Twilight. I'm almost as big as her, how's she gonna gobble me up?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So why do you keep running away and screaming?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Sometimes it's just really *fun* to be scared!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Fun*? Pinkie Pie, you're a genius!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, I'm not. I'm a chicken. [chicken squawk]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Luna! I've finally figured out why you're having so much trouble being liked!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [deadpan] Forgive me if I withhold my enthusiasm.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come with me. I'll explain everything on the way.

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Gosh. I never thought my very first Nightmare Night would be my very last.

speaker: Zecora
text: Come, little Pip. Now don't you fret. Nightmare Night's not over yet. We still have candy left to give, so Nightmare Moon might let us live.

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Yes. Come on, little ponies. What's Nightmare Night without the annual candy offering? You don't want Nightmare Moon to gobble you up, do you?

speaker: Spike
text: Aw, the rainbow wig just kills it for me.

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on, kids! Doesn't that sound like fun?

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Goodbye, Nightmare Night. Forever.

speaker: Nightmare Moon
text: [booming voice] Citizens of Ponyville! You were wise to bring this candy to me. I am pleased with your offering. So pleased that I may just eat it... instead of eating *you*!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: [spit] I am not certain that did what you meant for it to do, Twilight Sparkle.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Just wait.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: For what? For... for them to scream some more?

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Um... Princess Luna. I know there's not gonna be any more Nightmare Night, but do you suppose maybe you could come back next year and scare us again anyway?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Child. Art thou saying that thou... *likest* me to scare you?

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: It's really fun! Scary, but fun!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: It... is?

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Yeah! Nightmare Night is my favorite night of the year.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Well then. We shall have to bring [booming voice] Nightmare Night back!

speaker: Pipsqueak
text: Whoa! You're my favorite princess ever! [to foals] She said yes, guys!

speaker: Foals
text: YAY!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See? They really do like you, princess.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Can it be true? [thunder, booming voice] Oh, most wonderful of -- [normal voice] I mean... Oh, most wonderful of nights.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *When you first sent me to Ponyville, I didn't know anything about friendship. I met somepony tonight who was having the same problem -- your sister, Princess Luna! She taught me that one of the best things you can do with friendship is to give it to others, and help them find it themselves! And I'm happy to report that all of Ponyville has learned that even if somepony seems a little intimidating, even scary, when you offer them your friendship, you'll discover a whole new pony underneath. And even if my Star Swirl the Bearded costume didn't go over, this still turned out to be the best Nightmare Night ever!*

speaker: Rarity
text: [mumbling in sleep] Oh... Are those sweet... carrot... pancakes I smell? [gasp] Mmm, how divine, num num num num. The aroma... spiced warm apple cider. [sniff] Ahh, and, the smell of... smoke... *smoke*? Smoke?! [screams]

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Rarity! Rrgh, you ruined the surprise! I was gonna serve you breakfast in bed!

speaker: Hondo Flanks
text: Well! G'mornin', Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: Father! Mother!

speaker: Hondo Flanks
text: I'll have you know that Sweetie Belle here cooked this yummy lookin' breakfast all on her own.

speaker: Rarity
text: I... figured. [sniffs] I didn't know you could burn juice.

speaker: Cookie Crumbles
text: I've been giving her lessons. I wouldn't be surprised if she's got a cutie mark in fancy cooking by the time we get back from our vacation.

speaker: Rarity
text: Vacation? Is that this week? As in 'starting this very instant' this week?! Uurh. Let me guess: apple sauce?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Nope. Toast! We're gonna have the bestest time two sisters could ever have! I'm gonna go grab my stuff from Dad's wagon.

speaker: Rarity
text: So, now, when you say 'a week'... is that, um, seven whole days?

speaker: Cookie Crumbles
text: And six nights, I know! Such a short time to spend with your little sis.

speaker: Hondo Flanks
text: You gonna eat that?

speaker: Rarity
text: But I've got such a long to-do list. Oh well, I suppose 'spend time with your sister' will just have to be added to the list.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Just a few necessities.

speaker: Rarity
text: Now, let's get that kitchen all cleaned up.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Cleaned up? But we haven't even eaten yet.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well now, Sweetie Belle, I appreciate the gesture, but we simply can't eat *this* breakfast; it's burnt.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: It's not *that* burnt.

speaker: Rarity
text: Never fear, my dear, I'll get a proper breakfast going.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Can I help?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, er, of course, er, in one moment, Sweetie Belle. Let me just get things started.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Rarity! I thought you said I was gonna help!

speaker: Rarity
text: You are! You... can... put the garnish on the plates.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You mean this parsley?

speaker: Rarity
text: Okay, now, easy! It has to be just right! No need to rush. No! That's too slow. Careful! Back up! Looking for perfection here...

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Whoa, whoa!

speaker: Rarity
text: Not... bad.

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] There are some things I must attend to. Can you take the dirty towels to the laundry room?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: No problem, I'll make myself useful!

speaker: Rarity
text: Sweetie Belle!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I told you I'd make myself useful. Surprised?

speaker: Rarity
text: Am I? You washed my incredibly expensive one-of-a-kind designer crocheted wool sweater! Do you know how hard these things are to come by?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: What's the big deal?

speaker: Rarity
text: The big deal is that in the heat of the sun, wool... shrinks.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh. Sorry.

speaker: Rarity
text: Nng... Well. Back to work. I must create.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Sorry?

speaker: Rarity
text: Huh. Stay out of trouble, okay? *Please*?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I just wanted to do something nice for my sister.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Raargh, I'm so bored! When is Rarity gonna finish her work?

speaker: Rarity
text: [in Sweetie Belle's mind] Stay out of trouble, okay?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I never got in trouble for drawing. Hmm. This needs something...

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Hi, Rarity! I made a special drawing for y–

speaker: Rarity
text: [screams] Oh no! Did you use these gems?!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well, yes, but I know you'll have more in your work room...

speaker: Rarity
text: But, but these are extremely rare baby blue sapphires! I need them for an outfit for an extremely important client!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh. Sorry.

speaker: Rarity
text: [sigh] Sweetie Belle, what am I going to do with you?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh! We could paint together, we could ride bikes, play chess, sing a song, catch frogs, pillow fight–

speaker: Rarity
text: That's not what I meant!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh.

speaker: Rarity
text: Now I have to go and find some more of these gems!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I'll go with you and help!

speaker: Rarity
text: No! No thank you. You can help by picking up these papers and stacking them, neatly. Put the pens and pencils back exactly where you found them, and please find something to do that doesn't create a large mess for me to clean up!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Geez Louise, can't I do anything right?

speaker: Rarity
text: Sweetie Belle! I'm back! Sweetie Belle? [gasps in shock]

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Surprise!

speaker: Rarity
text: My- ee- bleh- My inspiration room! What did you do? What did you do?!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: When I saw the big mess in your room, I thought I'd clean it up for you.

speaker: Rarity
text: This wasn't a mess! It was organized chaos! I was just about finished planning my new fashion line, and, and you, you, you went and, and you– and you put everything away!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But every time I make a mess, you get upset!

speaker: Rarity
text: But this was *my* mess in *my* house! And now I have to start from scratch!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But, I thought it would make you happy!

speaker: Rarity
text: Happy?! Happy?! I– [grinds teeth] I just need some time alone. Hm!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: How's the sleepover at Rarity's goin'?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [mimicking Rarity] Why, it's smashing!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Huh?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I just wish we could do something special together that didn't include me goofing anything up.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: The Sisterhooves Social! Applejack an' I do it every year! You an' Rarity can compete against other sister teams in all these neat events!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: That sounds like the perfect way for us to hang out! Rarity will think it's an excellent idea.

speaker: Rarity
text: What a ridiculous idea. A contest at Sweet Apple Acres? It doesn't sound... very... clean.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: So, what, now you're back to hating messes?

speaker: Rarity
text: Sweetie Belle, watch your tone! I am still your big sister.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Right! And any sister who cares about her sister goes!

speaker: Rarity
text: Sweetie Belle...! Honestly! Playing silly little games in the dirt is just... uncouth! With or without a sister.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well then! Maybe, maybe I'll try the Sisterhooves Social without a sister! In fact, I think I'll try the rest of my*life* without a sister!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] Oh, *I'm* the one who's ruining *your* life?! Really?! Have you looked around this place?*I'm* the one who'd be better off with no sister!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well it looks like we finally agree on something! Neither of us needs a sister!

speaker: Rarity
text: Deal!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Deal! Goodbye, un-sister!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmph!

speaker: Applejack
text: 'Uncouth'? She said the Sisterhooves Social was 'uncouth'?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah! Uncouth? [belch] Wait. What's uncouth?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: It's not just the Social. She thinks *I'm* uncouth.

speaker: Applejack
text: Honey, Rarity thinks everything's uncouth.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [with mouth full] What's uncouth?

speaker: Applejack
text: It means uncivil. Y'know, bad mannered?

speaker: Applejack
text: Exactly. Sweetie Belle, just give Rarity some time. She'll come around. Sisters always do.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Not sisters like Rarity.

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on, now. Apple Bloom and I got some chores to finish up on. Maybe you can help!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You sure you want me to help? I just mess everything up!

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, come on, that's just stinkin' thinkin'. Watch!

speaker: Applejack
text: Good catch there, Apple Bloom! Whoo!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: This is a chore?

speaker: Applejack
text: Since we can't sell the bruised apples, we gotta collect them all for the pigs to eat.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: It's a lot of work, so we make a game of it. Wanna try?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Um, okay. Ow! You're right, it is hard work.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: That's why we do it...

speaker: Applejack
Apple Bloom
text: Together!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Huh, Rarity never wants to do chores together.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh, all that work ruined, thanks to Sweetie Belle. Oh my. It's usually a big mess in here. [gasp] Id-ee-a! This is genius! I shall call it 'full spectrum fashions'! If Sweetie Belle hadn't– [clears throat] Well, no matter. She still shouldn't have touched my things without permission. Hm!

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom! You're up!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You're... making... grape juice? Rarity would call the fashion police on me if I got grape juice anywhere *near* her precious outfits.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Well, that's silly!

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom...

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Please, Applejack, she didn't mean–

speaker: Apple Bloom
