text: Whoa! [laughing]

speaker: Applejack
text: How d'you like them grapes, y'little whippersnapper!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: That tickles! [laughing]

speaker: Rarity
text: Now to get these fabrics washed for my fabulous new line. Ooh, my favorite sweater... I just can't believe that Sweetie Belle.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, Opal-wopal! It's as if Sweetie Belle knew the sweater was perfect for you. And Sweetie Belle should consider herself perfectly lucky that this thoughtless mishap turned out all right. Hm.

speaker: Applejack
text: Apple Bloom!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Got it, sis!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Wow. It's as if they were just one pony.

speaker: Applejack
Apple Bloom
text: Yee-haw!

speaker: Applejack
text: Way to corral some critters, sis!

speaker: Sheep
text: You coulda just a-a-a-asked.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Rarity never high-hoofs me.

speaker: Rarity
text: Perfect! Just one more, and this ensemble is *fini*! Rrgh, Sweetie Belle! Where's her silly little arts and crafts project?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, Sweetie Belle! My one and only sister! What have I done? All the time I could have spent with you was wasted complaining and wishing you were gone! [crying dramatically] Woe is me! No! I must get her back! I must! As Celestia is my witness, I shall never be sisterless again!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] Sweetie Belle! Oh, I have been galloping all over looking for you. I–

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh hello, un-sister. What are you doing here? Better be careful, you might get some dust on you.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, Sweetie Belle, I want to apologize. I am *not* better off without a sister.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I'm not better off without a sister either. Spending the day with Applejack and Apple Bloom made me realize that.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, Sweetie, you don't know how happy I am to hear–

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: And that's why I'm adopting Applejack as my big sister!

speaker: Rarity
text: What?!

speaker: Applejack
text: What?!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: What?!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: A sister is someone who loves and takes care of another sister. Applejack's a *real* sister.

speaker: Applejack
text: H-Hold on, Sweetie Belle. Don't get ahead of yourself here.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Besides, she's *my* big sister!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah, um–

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [to Rarity] Or maybe she should be *your* sister, so she could teach you what a good sister is supposed to be!

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh, um, actually, I–

speaker: Rarity
text: But I don't need lessons on being a good sister, I-I promise! Listen! I'll show you how to cook my favorite quiche! Or, or, I'll show you the proper way to beautify your mane. Won't that be fun? Hm?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Hm! You want me to go home with you, so *we* can do what *you* wanna do?

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh... yes?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Just forget it!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: We're still sisters, right?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, that apology went swimmingly. Applejack, why do you have to be so *good* and make me look so *bad*?

speaker: Applejack
text: [chuckles] Oh Rarity, once again you're thinkin' about yourself. Bein' sisters is a give and take. You've been doin' a whole lotta takin', but you haven't been doin' a whole lotta givin'.

speaker: Rarity
text: But of course I give. I give lessons. Reasonable demands.

speaker: Applejack
text: But ya never give *in*. Bein' sisters is like... apple pie. You can have amazin' apples, and you can have a wonderfully crispy crust, but only together you can have a perfect apple pie.

speaker: Rarity
text: But apart, all we are is just a pile of mush and some crumbly dry mess... [gasp] I know what I need to do! I just hope it isn't too late!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well, I guess it's a good thing Rarity isn't here. Do I see 'uncouth' written all over this contest?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Look at the size of that pig!

speaker: Applejack
text: He sure is a cutie.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: That's the last word Rarity would use. [mimicking Rarity] Oh my, what a repulsive monstrosity! This thing needs a head to toe makeover!

speaker: Applejack
text: It's almost time!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well, you two have fun. Sure wish I had a sister to run the race with. Huh?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: You do now!

speaker: Applejack
text: AB and I figured since we do this every year...

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I'd let you borrow my sis so you can give it a try!

speaker: Applejack
text: Sister for a day.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: No way!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: One. Day. One. Day.

speaker: Granny Smith
text: Is this thing on? [to Big McIntosh] I don't think this thing is on. [to the megaphone] Hello! [Big McIntosh whispers into her ear] What is the- e- oh. You have to say so. Confangled modern doohickeys. Now, the event you've all been waiting fer! The Sister Soci- The Socialhooves- Oh, dabnabbit, you know, the big race! We have five teams this year fer the event! So y'all head on up to the finish line, y'hear? [Big McIntosh whispers into her ear] [to Big McIntosh] Eh? [to the megaphone] The *start* line! [to Big McIntosh] That's what I said.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: That's us.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: One. Day. Good luck!

speaker: Granny Smith
text: And may the best sisters win! On your marks... get set... Gooooo!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You okay, Applejack?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Applejack, help!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You can do it, sister!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Ooh, so close! You almost won!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Thank you, Applejack! You were amazing! I don't even care that we didn't win. This was so much fun! Huh? Rarity?! Wait, where's Applejack?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I don't get it.

speaker: Applejack
text: [chuckles] We switched places over at the very first mudhole.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: So, we did the whole competition... together?

speaker: Rarity
text: That we did, little sister. Well, except for the start line.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: But you finished together!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You mean... you were all in on it?

speaker: Applejack
Rarity
Apple Bloom
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You did this for me?

speaker: Rarity
text: Us. I did it for us. You see? We *are* apple pie!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Huh?

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh, I'll explain later. For now, I think we deserve a celebration!

speaker: Applejack
Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
text: Yeah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Where?

speaker: Rarity
text: The spa, of course.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, Rarity.

speaker: Rarity
text: No, I-I-I'm serious.

speaker: Rarity
text: Very well then, what should we write to the Princess?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I'll start. *Having a sister is just about the bestest thing in the world. But it sure isn't the easiest.*

speaker: Rarity
text: *I agree that being sisters is a wonderful thing, but it takes teamwork. Sometimes it's about compromising. Sometimes it's about accepting each others' differences. But mostly, it's about having fun together. Even if it means getting your hooves a little bit dirty.*

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: A lot dirty.

speaker: Rarity
text: A little bit dirty.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: A lot dirty.

speaker: Rarity
text: A little bit dirty!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: A lo–

speaker: Spike
text: Hold it, hold it! How about "a medium amount of dirty, not too little, not too much, just right"?

speaker: Rarity
Sweetie Belle
text: Deal!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Today's the day, Cutie Mark Crusaders! I can just feel it! Today's the day we are all gonna get our cutie marks in... bowlin'!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Whoo-hoo!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [muffled] Whooo! [spits out bag] I mean, yaay!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Why, after today, we won't even be the Cutie Mark Crusaders anymore! We'll be the... the Three Strikes!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: That makes us sound like we've struck out.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Mmm. How 'bout the Pin Twins?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But there are *three* of us.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Okay then... Um... the Bowlin' Dolls!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: The Bowling Dolls! That's it!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Perfect!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: All righty then! Let's bowl 'em over!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Phpoo!

speaker: Sea Swirl
text: Cool! A bowling cutie mark!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I did it! I did it! Blank?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: But... but... what about my ball?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: That bowling sure was fun, even if all I got was gutter balls.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah, at least you were able to keep your ball in your lane. I don't think Mr. Kingpin is ever gonna let me play again! Hey, maybe I could get my cutie mark in demolition!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Aw, come on, Apple Bloom.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I know just what you need to put the bloom back on your apple.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: A treat from Sugarcube Corner will cheer you up.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No, it won't.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A party will cheer you up!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No, it won't.

speaker: Rarity
text: A lovely new chapeau will cheer you up.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No, it *won't*.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Come on, Apple Bloom, it's just a cutie mark!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Or lack of a cutie mark!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Shh! That's not helping! Apple Bloom! Where are you going?! Apple Bloom, come back!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Whoa! Ah! Ooh! Ow! Nnnn...

speaker: Zecora
text: Well, who is it that we have here? Why, it's Apple Bloom, my dear!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Ow...

speaker: Zecora
text: What has happened to you, youth? Ah, you've gone and chipped your tooth. Come with me, I have just the trick that will fix you up quite quick.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [with a lisp] I've tried everything, Zecora, and still no cutie mark! Well, I'm gonna be as old as Granny Smith and still have a blank flank!

speaker: Zecora
text: Your frustration is well understood, but one must be patient for all things good.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [with a lisp] Ugh, I've heard that from every pony I know! And now from every *zebra* I know! I'm just too impatient to be patient. I just want my cutie mark and I want it now!

speaker: Zecora
text: For your cutie mark, you will have to wait. We must fix that tooth before it's too late. Now drink down every little drop, and this mixture will mend that chip on top!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [glug, glug] Oh my star apples, you did it, Zecora! Golly, you have tonics that heal all sorts of ailments. Bad bones, bad back, bad breath...

speaker: Zecora
text: Yes little one, it is true, I have many a healing brew.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: And not only stuff that fixes the bad, but stuff that brings the good! Good health, good hair... good heavens! Hmm... I bet you can mix up a brew to fix... *anything*.

speaker: Zecora
text: There are many mixtures in this room, but none for what you want, dear Apple Bloom. A magic potion does not hold the key. For a cutie mark, time is the only remedy.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Fine. Whatcha got goin' on there?

speaker: Zecora
text: I am brewing up another mix for a rooster and his chicks. [muffled] It seems the rooster has lost his crow, [normal] making mornings very slow.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Hey, I've seen that flower bloomin' in Ponyville! What is it?

speaker: Zecora
text: It is one we call 'Heart's Desire'. A dash will ignite the rooster's fire. With Heart's Desire, his talent comes into view, and he'll give a mighty cock-a-doodle-doo!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Zowie! Heart's Desire, huh?

speaker: Zecora
text: Ay me, but what is this? I have run out of amethyst. I must go get this purple flower for my brew to have full power!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah, you go, you go.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I'm so hungry.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah, I can't wai--

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Scootaloo
text: Aah! Apple Bloom! You got your cutie mark!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Um, Apple Bloom... what is it?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah! Is it an 'o'? Is your talent spelling?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Or is it a ring? Are you a jewelry maker?

speaker: Twist
text: Or is it a powdered donut? 'Cause that sounds delicious.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No, it's a loop-de-hoop!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [gasp] A what now?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: A loop-de-hoop! 'Least, that's what I always called it. Applejack made it for me from an old rain barrel when I was littler! Who woulda thought that loop-de-hoop would end up bein' my special talent?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Wow, Apple Bloom, that's amazing!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: That's it? That's your talent?

speaker: Silver Spoon
text: Spinning a hoop around your waist? Puh-lease.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh, you ain't seen nothin' yet.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Apple Bloom, you're super-duper-loop-de-hooper!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Thanks, everypony!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: All right, my little ponies, time for class!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Apple Bloom?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yes, Miss Cheerilee?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: I want you to take your loop-de-hoop into the yard... and give us all a lesson in your amazing loop-de-hooping!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Don't worry, gals. Keep at it and you might get to be half as good as me!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
Silver Spoon
text: Grr...

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Great job, girls!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You're too kind, Apple Bloom.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah, we stink.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Nah, you just need a little practice. Soon you'll be able to... hoop and bop! Hoop and hop! [muffled] Hoop and skip! [normal] And hoop and flip!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: [laughs] Show us some more, Apple Bloom.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Well, all right, just a few more tricks. But be warned! These are *advanced* moves, not for beginners. Got that, Diamond Tiara?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I call this one the hoop-la! [makes helicopter noises] Huh? Oof!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: *Another* cutie mark? Hah! I guess that last trick was a lot of hoopla. Those cutie marks are fake!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: What? No they're not!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Miss Cheerilee, have you ever heard of a pony with *two* cutie marks?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: I must say that I never have, but maybe Apple Bloom has two special talents!

speaker: Silver Spoon
text: Oh yeah? Then let's see you do that!

speaker: Snips
text: Spin plates!

speaker: Snails
text: Yeah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: *Two* cutie marks?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: *Two* talents?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Aw yeah!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Our friend is the most...

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Scootaloo
text: ...special pony ever!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Alright, everypony, You ready for a *real* show?

speaker: Applejack
text: Yee-haw, little sis! Congratulations on gettin' not just one, but *two* cutie marks! We're mighty proud of you, right, Big McIntosh?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup.

speaker: Applejack
text: I've never seen anythin' like it. Have you, Big Mac?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Nnnope.

speaker: Granny Smith
text: Why, the way you were a-hoopin' and a-hoppin' and kickin' and spinnin' reminded me of when I was a spry young filly. Guh, charley horse, charley horse! Ooh, that's better.

speaker: Applejack
text: Why, Apple Bloom, I think you're ready to hit the rodeo circuit right now!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Actually, I'm ready to hit the hay right now. I'm plum tuckered. I'll see y'all in the mornin'. Night!

speaker: Applejack
text: Night! Oh my, little Apple Bloom has finally blossomed, hasn't she, Big Mac?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup!

speaker: Applejack
text: [grunting] What in tarnation is that? Apple Bloom, what is all that awful... tapping? [gasp] *Three* cutie marks?!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Help me!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Help me!

speaker: Applejack
text: C'mere, you! Ow! Ow! Whoa!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I'm sorry, Applejack! I dunno how to make it stop!

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, I know somepony who might!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Three cutie marks. Three talents. I've never seen anything like it! I was just reading something about unusual equine illnesses. What was it?

speaker: Spike
text: "Perplexing Pony Plagues", perhaps?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, Spike, you're amazing!

speaker: Spike
text: Yes, well, I do have *some* talents.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hay fever... the trots... [gasp] Cutie pox!

speaker: Applejack
Spike
Apple Bloom
text: Cutie pox?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cutie pox. This puzzling pony plague afflicted a population of ponies back in the Paleopony Period!

speaker: Spike
text: Heh, say that ten times fast!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Random cutie marks appeared all over the ponies' bodies, causing them to perform all the talents that came with them!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Just like me!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yes, but what's the cure? What's the cure?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It says here there's no known cure!

speaker: Applejack
Spike
Apple Bloom
text: No known cure?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The cause of the breakout was never discovered, and the cutie pox disappears as mysteriously as they arrived!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh no! Sacrebleu! Plus de marques de cutie! [gasp] Qu'est-ce c'est?! Je parle français?! *(Oh no! Darn it! More cutie marks! [gasp] What's this?! I speak French?!)*

speaker: Applejack
text: My sister's speakin' in fancy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She needs help!

speaker: Applejack
text: I know she needs help! We can't just wait for this to go away! We gotta find somepony to mix up a cure! And fast!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Tout de suite! *(Now!)*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not some pony... some *zebra*!

speaker: Applejack
text: Zecora!

speaker: Applejack
text: Hurry, hurry!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Dépêchez-vous! *(Hurry!)*

speaker: Lily Valley
text: She's cursed!

speaker: Rose
text: Hexed!

speaker: Daisy
text: Enchanted!

speaker: Spike
text: No, she's not.

speaker: Spike
text: She just has some weird mysterious disease with no known cure called cutie pox.

speaker: Everypony
text: Cutie pox?! [screaming]

speaker: Pony
text: She's got the cutie pox!

speaker: Zecora
text: I thought I had removed their fear the last time that I visited here. But doors are barred and shutters shut. Guess I should've stayed inside my hut.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Zecora! Apple Bloom has cutie pox! We were just on our way to see if you had a cure!

speaker: Applejack
text: But magically you're here! Was your zebra sense a-tinglin'?

speaker: Zecora
text: My 'zebra sense' did not bring me round, it was a special flower that I needed found. I thought I picked enough to fix all the potions I had to mix, but after my visit from Apple Bloom, some had mysteriously left my room. Apple Bloom! What do you say? Did this flower just walk away?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I, um...

speaker: Zecora
text: A cutie pox cure I have forsooth, for healing power is in the Seeds of Truth.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, well then give 'em to her! Quick!

speaker: Zecora
text: These seeds must be planted in the ground. With the truth, they'll grow, and the cure is found.

speaker: Applejack
text: Come again?

speaker: Zecora
text: The Seeds of Truth *do* hold the cure, but one must speak words, true and pure.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well then let's get to it! Alright, they're planted, now somepony tell the truth!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!

speaker: Applejack
text: Somepony! Anypony!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yesterday I told Mrs. Cake that I ate two corn cakes, but I really ate three! Okay, six! I ate six corn cakes! [cries] Make it stop! Oh, make it stop!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Wah, I can't stand it any more! It's me! I admit it! I didn't earn my cutie mark! They're all fake! I figured the Heart's Desire would help me get what I wanted most! So when Zecora left her hut, I mixed up a special potion and put the rest of the Heart's Desire in it!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [chomps, chews and swallows] Ahh.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Apple Bloom!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Are you okay?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I'm great, and I've never been happier to be a blank flank. But I'm awful sorry I lied, 'specially to you gals. I was so desperate for my cutie mark, I just got carried away. And I'm really sorry I snuck those flowers from you, Zecora. Why, I wouldn't blame you if you never wanted me to come by again.

speaker: Zecora
text: Now, Apple Bloom, do not be silly. You are always welcome, my little filly. With each mistake you learn something new, growing up into a better you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Apple Bloom, would you mind writing to Princess Celestia and telling her what you've learned?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I'd be happy to, Twilight! Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: Ready!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: *Waiting for what your heart desires can be really hard. So, you may try to take a shortcut. But this dishonesty never works, because you didn't*earn*what your heart desired. The only cure is being honest with yourself and others. And that's something every heart desires.*

speaker: Applejack
text: I sure am proud of you, sis. Seems like you finally learned the importance of patience.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yup! All good things come to those who wait. Well! I've waited long enough.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Actually, that was *way* too long.

speaker: Applejack
text: *What*?!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: So what are we gonna do today to earn our cutie marks?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Well, I was thinking, for a pony who's never mixed up a potion before, you sure stirred up something fierce.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Yeah! So what if your talent is potion making?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh my gosh, totally! Let's go talk to Zecora, now!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Yeah!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Woo-hoo!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ha-ha! Whoo-hoo! Yeah! [laughs] Whoa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who? Oh, it's you, Owlowiscious. C'mon, try and keep up! [laughs]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Winona? I mean... Winona's *head*?! Um, is this weird, or is it just me? Angel? Gummy?! Okay, this is officially beyond weird now and right on down to freaky town.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasp] Yaaaaah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whaa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Phew.

speaker: Applejack
text: Let's get this thing started!

speaker: Rarity
text: Sincerest apologies, Rainbow, if our pets were bothering you.

speaker: Rarity
text: Say you're sorry, Opal.

speaker: Rarity
text: She's... sorry.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What are you all doing out here?

speaker: Applejack
text: Why, we always round up our critters for a regular ol' Pony Pet Playdate in this park.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, you do?

speaker: Applejack
text: Same time every week.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I thought you knew. You didn't know? She didn't know?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, we had initially planned on inviting Rainbow, of course, except–

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We were *totally* gonna invite you, Rainbow, then Twilight remembered that you don't even have a pet, and Rarity remembered that you really like to take naps in the afternoon, so Applejack figured you wouldn't be missing out on anything anyway, and Fluttershy and I nodded our heads in agreement like this.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, please don't be mad at us.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, I'm not mad. You all are right. Not much point of a Pony Pet Playdate for me if I'm a pony without a pet, right?

speaker: Applejack
text: Eeexactly. So, if'n you'll excuse us...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, now wait a minute! Just because I don't have a pet *now* doesn't mean I *never* want a pet!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ohh! Y, y, Oh, really? You really want a pet? Really? 'Cause I've got so many wonderful choices at my house! Oh, and I know you'll just love them! And they'll love you! Oh, and you'll be best friends forever and ever! Oh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
Now, Rainbow, my dear, I cannot express my delight
It's abundantly clear
That somewhere out here
Is the pet that will suit you just right

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
I can't wait to get started, but first let me set a few rules
It's of utmost importance
The pet that I get
Is something that's awesome and cool

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I have so many wonderful choices, just wait, you will see

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I need something real fast like a bullet to keep up with me

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
Sure! How 'bout a bunny?
They're cutesy and wootsie and quick as can be

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Cutesy? Wootsie? Have you even met me?

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
Rainbow, have faith
You see, I will bet you
Somewhere in here is the pet that will get you

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Come on, the sky's the limit!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sky is good. I'd like it to fly.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Really? Because I think this widdle puddy tat has your name written all over it. Yes, he does. Aww, look, he likes you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pass.

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
I have so many wonderful choices for you to decide
There are otters and seals
With massive appeal

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Otters and seals do not fly.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Maybe not, but I've seen this particular seal catch ten feet of air when he breaches the water!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's it. I'm outta here.

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
Wait! There must be a pet here
That will fit the ticket
How 'bout a ladybug, or a cute cricket?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Bigger. And cooler.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Bigger, cooler. Right.

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
I've got just the thing in that tree, Dash
Meet your new fabulous pet, Squirrely!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It's just a squirrel.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Not just any squirrel. A *flying* squirrel!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: ...Yeah. So, like I was saying...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
Fluttershy, pal, this won't cut it
I need a pet to keep up with me
Something awesome, something flying
With coolness that defies gravity!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sensing you want an animal that can fly.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ya think?

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
I have plenty of wonderful creatures who soar in the sky
Like a sweet hummingbird or a giant monarch butterfly

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Better, but cooler.

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
I see. How 'bout an owl, or a wasp, or a toucan?
There's so many wonderful creatures the likes of that
There are falcons and eagles
They are both quite regal
Or perhaps what you need is a dark and mysterious bat?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Now you're talking! But instead of just one standout, now that's too many.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So many choices, and such riches aplenty

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Not a bad problem to have, if you ask me.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
The bat would be awesome, but the wasp I'm digging too
Do you have something in a yellow striped bat?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I've got a hot pink flamingo, just dying to meet you

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
What to do, what to do? [gasp]
A prize! That's it! There's really just one way
To find out which animal's best
Hold a contest of speed, agility, and guts
That will put each pet to the test

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Don't forget style, that should be considered

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Then we'll know for sure who's best of the litter

speaker: Fluttershy
text: The one who is awesome as cool

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
Just like me
Can't settle for less, 'cause I'm the best

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So a contest we will see

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who's the number one, greatest, perfectest pet

speaker: Fluttershy
text: In the world for me!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: May the games

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Begin!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And may the best pet win!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [blows whistle] Shh! [to assembled animals] So! You all think you've got what it takes to be my pet, do ya? Well, we'll just see about that! If any of you don't think you can handle it, bow out now before you humiliate yourself in front of your peers. This competition isn't for the weak. You'd better be prepared to step up your game! You call that flapping?! That's better. There's only room on Team Dash for one of you, and my future pet needs to be able to take it to the extreme! Any questions?

speaker: Applejack
text: I got one. Does she understand what a pet really needs?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, like care and attention, love and affection– Ugh! And breath mints!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now, you just pay attention, and try your best, and–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Seriously, Fluttershy! The turtle? What did you bring that thing here for?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Technically he's a tortoise, and he's always dreamed of being somepony's pet. He just wants a chance to compete, he won't get in the way. You won't even know he's here.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: No.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, just let him try.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh, but there's no way he can possibly keep up. Look at him!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It won't hurt to let him try.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But–

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Just let him try?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Grrgh, ugh, fine! But don't say I didn't warn you! This isn't a game, you know! Alright, now these games will determine which one of you has the most important qualities I'm looking for in a pet. Speed. Agility. Guts. Style. Coolness. Awesomeness. And radicalness.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aren't those all the same thing?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You would think that, Twilight. And that's why you would never qualify to be my pet.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Speed! On your marks...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Get set... [blows whistle] Sorta speedy... not speedy... pretty speedy... could be more speedy...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah! That's speed!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [to the tortoise] Tsk-tsk. That's just sad.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Agility! Sorta agile... not agile... pretty agile... could be more agile... [to the tortoise] Wanna know the opposite of agility? That.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, baby, now that's what I call agility! [sing-song voice] Don't leave me hangin'! I'm gonna have to shave a point off your score for that.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay! Which of you has the guts to try and get Opal's favorite toy away from her?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Now *that* takes guts!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Style! Any pet of mine's gotta look good, 'cause you gotta make *me* look good!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Coolness!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sorta cool.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not cool.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pretty cool.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Could be cooler.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not what I had in mind. I can't hear you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Eugh.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Now *that's* a cool sound!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [to bat] Sorta awesome. [to toucan] Not awesome. [to flamingo] Could be more awesome. [to owl] Ho ho ho, yeah, that is *awesome*! [to tortoise] Uh, you did that already. That's pretty much all you can do, huh?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa! That was truly awesome! But I'm afraid this is the radicalness competition, so I'm gonna have to take some points off.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sigh] Listen, turtle...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Tortoise.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whatever! You've had your fun, but I think you and I both know who made the cut and who didn't.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You didn't.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I mean... 'A' for effort and everything, you gave it your best shot, maybe I've got a gold star sticker around here somewhere you can have, but, seriously, go home. You're starting to creep me out. So, anyway, you're all outstanding competitors, but there can only be one of you who's number one. So the final tie-breaking contest is going to be... pause for dramatic effect... a race against... me! Through Ghastly Gorge! Dun dun dun!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Gesundheit.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Actually, Ghastly Gorge isn't scary. It's fun. Heh. I've flown through it a million times myself, so obviously I'll be at the front of the pack. But whichever of you make it across the finish line with me will have proven you can keep up with me, and will have earned the honor and glory of getting to be my pet! Ready? Setgo!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Woo-hoo! Haha! Try to keep up!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Can't catch me, ha-ha!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: C'mon, slowpokes! You wanna win, don't ya?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh! I forgot to tell you! Watch out for the Quarray eels! They don't like it when you get too close to their nests, like *this*. Whoa.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Easy, peasy, one-two-threesy! Right, guys?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: AVALANCHE! Hey! Whoaaaa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: C'mon... No! Wait! Come back! Don't leave me! I'm the one who's supposed to win! I don't wanna end up stuck here... forever! Oh no, nonono, th-this can't be happening. Forever is *way* too long to be trapped in Ghastly Gorge. I mean, it's like, forever! Somepony! Anypony! Help me!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wahoo! My prayers have been answered! Oh, thankyouthankyoutha– *You*?! Oh no! Now I'm not only going to be stuck here forever, I'm gonna be stuck here forever with the most *annoying* turtle in the world! Gyh, I'm doomed. DOOMED, I tell you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hm, something's not right here.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Where's Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Applejack
text: Great galloping galoshes! There's been an avalanche in there!

speaker: Spike
text: Rainbow!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait! Look!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's the turtle!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Tortoise!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, whatever...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And he's carrying something on his back...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ahh! It's Rainbow Dash! It's her! It's Rainbow!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Maybe we'd better go meet him halfway.

speaker: Spike
text: Huh. Way to go, little guy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, thank goodness you're not hurt, Rainbow!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Just my pride.

speaker: Rarity
text: I certainly hope all of this dreadful dust was worth it! [sneezes]

speaker: Applejack
text: It sure was, if'n it means Rainbow gets to have her own little critter just like the rest of us from now on.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh... thanks. What you did... I owe you one.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Rainbow! Your new pet is over here waiting for you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh... Right... Yeah... That.

speaker: Spike
text: What's the matter?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You got your perfect pet, right?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: The best of the best like you wanted, remember? It can fly and it's not a squirrel! Should we sing about it again?

speaker: Applejack
text: A falcon sure looks good on ya, Rainbow.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Easy, fella. Nothing to be afraid of. The falcon sure does looks cool... He's absolutely everything I wanted in a pet. [sigh]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yay?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But I said whoever crosses the finish line *with* me gets to be my pet.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You did! You did say that! She did say that, that was the rule!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And the only racer who crossed the finish line with me was the one who stopped to *save* me when I needed help. The tortoise!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But what about the–

speaker: Applejack
text: Wouldja look at that? He even smiles slow.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Spike, take a letter. *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *I used to think that the most important traits to look for in a pet, or any best friend, were all physical competitive abilities. But now I can see how short-sighted and shallow that was.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Today I learned what the most important quality really is. A certain kind of spirit. A stick-to-it-ive-ness. A never give up, can-do attitude that's the mark of a real winner. And this tortoise has it.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Tenacity.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Gesundheit. You just can't stop that little guy. He's like a... like a... Tank!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But Rainbow! You didn't want a pet that couldn't fly because it would keep you grounded and hold you back, remember?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hmm...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. C'mon, Tank! We're gonna be late for our very first Pony Pet Playdate!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Attention, everypony! Attention! The official Rainbow Dash Fan Club will come to order. Let's get right down to our first order of business. I motion that Rainbow Dash be declared the most awesome pony in Ponyville.

speaker: Snails
text: I second the motion, and might I add that if you looked up the word 'awesome' in the dictionary, there would be a picture of Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Snips
text: I object!

speaker: Snips
text: I think the word 'awesome' is played out! Rainbow Dash deserves better! I motion that we declare her the most *stupendous* pony!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: 'Stupendous'? Is that the best you've got? I motion that we declare her... wonderiffic!

speaker: Snips
text: Astonishing!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Breathtaking!

speaker: Snips
text: Astounding!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Bedazzling!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What about super-ultra-extreme-awesomazing?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: All in favor of declaring Rainbow Dash the most 'super-ultra-extra-uh-whatever you said' pony in all of Ponyville, say 'aye'!

speaker: Fan club
text: Aye! [cheering]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sigh] What a beautiful day. There's nothing like a dip in the clouds to make a Pegasus feel super relaxed.

speaker: Aura
text: Help! Help! Help! Help!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Looks like my sky swim will have to wait! I'm Rainbow Dash, and I'm here to rescue you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wow. What's with this crowd? Uh, thanks, everypony. It was really no big deal.

speaker: Aura
text: To me it was! You're my hero, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: That Rainbow Dash sure is something.

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Something special.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasps] Oh no! There's something wrong with the baby!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: She's not cheering for everypony's favorite hero, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: There just aren't enough words in the dictionary to describe Rainbow Dash's awesomeness.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can think of a few new words.

speaker: Applejack
text: And I bet 'modest' is not one of them.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, but she is kinda awesome.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Never fear, your friendly neighborhood Rainbow Dash is here!

speaker: Pony 1
text: We'd be lost without you!

speaker: Pony 2
text: You're our hero, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Crowd
text: Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I can't hear you!

speaker: Crowd
text: Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash! Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Call me silly, but I think this whole hero thing might be going to Rainbow Dash's head.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You may be right...silly.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And then I zoomed into the well. I knew it would be dark and dangerous, but I didn't let that stop me. Danger's my middle name. Rainbow 'Danger' Dash. Thinking back on it, I acted pretty awesomely heroic that day.

speaker: Spike
text: That day.

speaker: Applejack
text: Awesomely heroic that day and awesomely *arrogant* ever since.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Pinkie Pie
text: Mm-hm.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, Applejack. How'd you like to be *immortalized* as my friend?

speaker: Applejack
text: Immorta-what?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Are you taking notes?

speaker: Spike
text: Yup! I've been hoof-picked by Rainbow Dash herself, to write her autobiography!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Umm, autobiographies are supposed to be written *by* the pony they are about.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Maybe for your normal, run-of-the-mill ponies. But I'm *far* too busy saving lives to stop and write. That's why I hired Spike as my ghost writer.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [yelps] Spike's a ghost!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: ...Anyway. Spike here writes down everything I say. Don't you, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: Don't... you... Spike. Got it!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This way, I can stay focused on performing those acts of bravery that nopony else has the guts to perform. Yep, it takes guts. But it also takes brains. And sometimes a big lunch and a nap. Being a hero is surely not for everypony, but I'm up to the challenge.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [grunts] There you go.

speaker: Lemon Daze
text: Someday, I wanna be just like you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aim high, kid, but don't aim for the impossible.

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Help! Help!

speaker: Snips
text: Uh, don't you think you should go and help?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [muffled] Yeah, yeah. I've got a good ten seconds to spare. Just a couple more.

speaker: Spike
text: The tension is unbearable. Will Rainbow Dash make it on time?

speaker: Pony
text: Holy turnips, that pony came outta nowhere!

speaker: Daisy
text: I've never seen such bravery in all my life!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: That's right! Ponyville has a new hero. A mysterious mare that has done well by our fair city today. I dub this new masked hero 'The Mysterious Mare Do Well'!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Mare Do Well, huh? Well that *mare* would *do well* to stay outta my way! Ponyville's only got room for one hero, and that hero is me!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [clears throat] Never fear, your friendly neighborhood Rainbow–

speaker: Globe Trotter
text: Excuse me, uh, do you think you could skip your catchphrase and just hurry up and save us?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh, fine! Picky, picky. Whoaaaa! Aah!

speaker: Wisp
text: Oh, thank you, Mare Do We– e...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I can't believe it. Mare Do Well is stronger than *me?* Well, a hero is more than just muscle, and she's gonna learn that the *hard* way.

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Huh?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh? Never fear, your friendly neighbor– Whoa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Never fear– Uh! I'm coming! Hold on! Whoa!

speaker: Jack Hammer
text: Look!

speaker: Jim Beam
text: Look out for the– Watch out for falling– On your left! Agh! Your other left!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Here ya go, safe and sound.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, Mare Do Well, or should I call you Mare Do *Slow*? You're gonna have to pick up the pace if you wanna compete with me, 'cause I move like lightning.

speaker: Rivet
text: Actually, she saved all of us! We owe her our lives!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [growls] Okay. She's strong, fast, and somehow knows what's gonna happen ahead of time. I've gotta step up my game.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasps] If the dam breaks, the whole town will be flooded! Looks like Ponyville needs a hero! Easy peasy.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: My game is officially back on. If only somepony were here to pat me on the back. Eh, guess I'll have do it myself– [yelps] [screams] Help! [spits] Help! You?! I suppose you want me to thank– You *gotta* be kidding me...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Lemme get this straight. She's strong, she's agile, *and* she's magic? Ughhh! How do I compete with *that*? Wait a minute. I do have a leg up on her. And that leg is... wings! Hah! Take that, Mare Do Well!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, for the love of Pete.

speaker: Applejack
text: Gotta hand it to the girl, that Mare Do Well sure can pull off some pretty heroic feats.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I must say, I was impressed by that spell she used to fix the dam. Seems like something like that would take quite a bit of study.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She really cares about everypony's safety.

speaker: Rarity
text: Have you *seen* her costume? It is to die for! If you ask me she's a hero of fashion.

speaker: Applejack
text: *And* she's modest *and* humble. She lets her actions speak for themselves. Gotta admire that.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I *don't* have to admire that! I don't think she's all that great!

speaker: Spike
text: She's... great.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I didn't say that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sounds like somepony's jealous.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who, me?

speaker: Spike
text: Rainbow Dash is jealous.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't write that, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: Correction: Rainbow Dash is *very* jealous.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Fine! Laugh all you want, but I'll be the one laughing when I prove to you all that I'm just as good– no, that I'm a *better* hero than Mare Do Well!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh, no sign of trouble here. Darn it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Buses and baby carriages are *always* careening down this hill. Where is an out-of-control vehicle when you need one?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rrgh, there are absolutely no freak natural disasters going on anywhere! How am I supposed to prove myself when everything's so normal and safe? [gasps] Hold it right there, Granny Smith! You don't have to pretend with me. I can see that you're in way over your head here.

speaker: Granny Smith
text: Eh, what's that?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You're putting on a brave face, I get it. But you don't have to anymore. I'll help you cross the street!

speaker: Granny Smith
text: [grunting] Actually, I can cross the street just fine!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't worry! You're in extremely... capable... hooves!

speaker: Granny Smith
text: [panicked grunts] Back off!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [pants] Here we are! Safe and sound. A good and heroic citizen deserves a little recognition, *don't you think*?

speaker: Granny Smith
text: I didn't wanna cross the street in the first place! [complaining and squeaking]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasps] Somepony's in trouble!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You'd better let me handle this, ma'am! For your own safety, I must ask you to stand back!

speaker: Amethyst Star
text: Oh, brother.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ta-da!

speaker: Amethyst Star
text: Uh... thanks.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: How would you describe what I just did? Would you say I was amazing?

speaker: Amethyst Star
text: Aren't you milking this a bit?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Please, just answer the question! Was I, or was I not, amazing?

speaker: Amethyst Star
text: Oh, you're amazing alright. An amazingly–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, look!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Another great feat of heroism! I have just saved that grass!

speaker: Pine Breeze
text: From what?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: From weeds! Weeds that were attempting to eat this lawn!

speaker: Liza Doolots
text: Lame...

speaker: Pony
text: Whatever.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aww, who am I kidding?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: All anypony talks about is Mare Do Well this and Mare Do Well that! What about *me*? How could everypony forget about me so easily? I mean... have I changed? Same sleek body. Same flowing mane. Same spectacular hooves. Nope, I'm still awesome. *They're* wrong. But... then... why am I all alone? I hate being all alone.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Hey, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I knew it! No need to apologize, squirt. Anypony could make that mistake.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Mistake? What mistake?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait a minute. Why are you here?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: To invite you to join us! We're heading off to the thank you parade for Ponyville's greatest hero, Mare Do Well.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: No! No way! Can't you see I-I wanna be alone? I *love* being alone.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Oh, okay. See you later then.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, *right,* like I'm gonna thank *her.* [mockingly] Thank you, Mare Do Well, whoever you are, for ruining e– [normal] Hey, squirt! Wait up!

speaker: Mayor Mare
text: Welcome to Ponyville's first, but surely not last, thank you parade, in honor of our city's greatest hero, the mysterious Mare Do Well!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The mysterious Mare Do Well, huh?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So what are you hiding? Let's see how mysterious you are without that mask!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What the hay?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Grrr... I got you now! Alright, Miss Mysterious! Mystery... solved! [yelps] P-p-p-p- *Pinkie*?! Whudda- hud-d-duh- hud-d-duh- *huh*?! Twilight?! Applejack?! There were *three* of you?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yup, we all played Mare Do Well at different times.

speaker: Applejack
text: *I* stopped the carriage bus with these babies, Bucky McGillicuddy and Kicks McGee.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I saved the construction workers with my Pinkie Sense. [twitches]

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Sorry!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's alright.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And *I* used my magic to fix the dam.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ooh, ooh! And I did the flyby afterwards.

speaker: Rarity
text: *I* made the costumes. Fabulous if I do say so myself!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I don't understand. *Why?* Don't you want me to be a hero?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of *course* we want you to be a hero.

speaker: Applejack
text: But a *real* hero doesn't brag.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, I guess I did start to brag a little.

speaker: Other main cast
text: A little?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, a lot.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Celebrating your accomplishments is natural. But...

speaker: Applejack
text: ...Rubbin' them in everypony's face is not.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah, the only thing that should be rubbed in anypony's face is chocolate cake. [slurp]

speaker: Applejack
text: I think we're getting off topic here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What we're trying to say is, *it's great to be really good at something, but it's important to act with grace and humility.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ohhhh. That makes *loads* more sense. Yeah. You're right. *And I guess I should've also acted with grace and humility when others outshine me.* Like Mare Do Well.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sounds like you've got a letter to write to Princess Celestia.

speaker: Spike
text: Already got it covered. As your ghost writer, I've already penned a letter to the Princess.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's nice of you, Spike, but I really wanna write this letter myself.

speaker: Spike
text: Aww, *come on*, I wrote the whole thing already!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, let's hear it.

speaker: Spike
text: [clears throat] *Dear Princess Cel*-

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Look out! It's a *real* ghost!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] Here? I get to stay *here*?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Twilight Sparkle said you were coming to Canterlot for a visit, and asked if I might accommodate you.

speaker: Rarity
text: Thank you so much, Princess.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You're very welcome.

speaker: Rarity
text: No, *really*. This is so nice of you.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: It's nothing, really.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, but it isn't nothing, it's everything! I, I just don't know what to say but thank you, thank you! [kiss] Thank you! [kiss] Thank you! [kiss] Thank you, thank you, thank you! [more kisses]

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You are very we–

speaker: Rarity
text: Thank you!

speaker: Bags Valet
text: [pant] Your luggage, mademoiselle?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I'll leave you to get settled.

speaker: Bags Valet
text: Your highness.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Enjoy your stay.

speaker: Rarity
text: Thank you!

speaker: Bags Valet
text: [straining] Where would you like me to put these?

speaker: Rarity
text: That's perfect.

speaker: Rarity
text: Opal, do you know what I love about Canterlot? [sip] Ahh. Everything! I may have been born in Ponyville, but I am a Canterlot pony at heart. [sip] Now, I know that we are here to pick up some fabrics for the shop, but Twilight was such a dear to get me that suite at the castle, I simply must make her something to express my gratitude. Hmm... ooh! An outfit for her birthday party this weekend! Perfect! Don't you just love it here, Opalescence?

speaker: Jet Set
text: Please excuse our interruption. I'm Jet Set, and this is my wife Upper Crust. We saw you from across the cafe and just *had* to find out...

speaker: Upper Crust
text: ...Where did you get that simply *marvelous* chapeau?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, this old thing? Oh, it's just something I–

speaker: Hayseed Turnip Truck
text: Rarity! Hey, Rarity! Whoo! It's me, Hayseed Turnip Truck! We met at the big hoedown in Ponyville last month?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, yes, of course... how are you?

speaker: Hayseed Turnip Truck
text: Good! Real good!

speaker: Jet Set
Upper Crust
text: Hmm...

speaker: Jet Set
text: You're from... Ponyville?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, yeah, yes, but–

speaker: Hayseed Turnip Truck
text: She sure is! She's a real big-time fancy pants dressmaker there! Probably made that real purty thing she's got on her head!

speaker: Upper Crust
text: I thought it looked a little *country*.

speaker: Jet Set
text: I told you it wasn't something you could get here in Canterlot, dear.

speaker: Jet Set
Upper Crust
text: Hmph!

speaker: Hayseed Turnip Truck
text: Well, they seemed real nice.

speaker: Rarity
text: "Looked a little country". "Not something you can get in Canterlot". I'll show you something worthy of Canterlot!

speaker: Rarity
text: [panting] I have to get started right away. This new design is very ambitious, and I've already written to Twilight to let her know she'll have something beyond fabulous to wear to her party. [gasps] Fancy Pants!

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: I say, that's one way to make an introduction.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, goodness, I am so sorry. I didn't see you there. I've just got so many bags and I was trying to get back to my suite at the castle and–

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: You're staying at the castle?

speaker: Rarity
text: Wh– The Princess invited me to stay in one of the suites.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: You know the Princess?

speaker: Fleur Dis Lee
text: Hmm, a pony with expensive tastes, I see.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, it's for an ensemble I'm making for a friend. Her birthday is in a few days. [pants] Again, I am really sorry I bumped into you.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: I'm not! Heheh, you are obviously somepony worth bumping into! Listen, I have a VIP box reserved at the Wonderbolts Derby this afternoon. Would you, would you be so kind as to join me and a few of my companions there?

speaker: Rarity
text: Me?

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: But of course, my dear.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, I'm, uh, ah- no- sure.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: We'd love to see you there, uh...?

speaker: Rarity
text: Rarity.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Rarity.

speaker: Rarity
text: Pro: Seeing the Derby from a VIP box is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. Con: Going to the Derby cuts into the amount of time I have to finish Twilight's outfit. Pro: Fancy Pants is *the* most important pony in Canterlot. His stamp of approval could mean big things for me here. Con: Twilight's party might not be as sophisticated as the Derby, but that doesn't mean I shouldn't put all of my energy into creating her birthday ensemble. My Ponyville friends will appreciate my hard work more than anypony. I'd hate to let them down. And I won't. Opal, I am going to the Wonderbolts Derby as a guest of Fancy Pants! [excited giggling]

speaker: Rarity
text: Pardon me. 'Scuse me, 'scuse me!

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Rarity, jolly good to see you! So glad you could make it.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Everypony, this is Rarity. She's staying at Canterlot Castle.

speaker: Announcer
text: Fillies and gentlecolts, welcome to the Wonderbolts Derby! The competitors are taking their places at the starting line, and the race will begin momentarily!

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: I'll be rooting for Rapidfire, of course. He's sure to take home the grand prize.

speaker: Rarity
text: I don't think he has a chance against Fleetfoot.

speaker: Announcer
text: And it's Fleetfoot by a nose!

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Bravo, Rarity! I say, how did you know Fleetfoot would be victorious?

speaker: Rarity
text: My friend Rainbow Dash talks about her all the time. She says what Fleetfoot lacks in size, she makes up for in speed.

speaker: Silver Frames
text: And who is this 'Rainbow Dash'?

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh... [gulps] Why... she's... she's the... the Wonderbolts' trainer, of course.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Staying at Canterlot Castle, *and* she knows the Pegasus training the Wonderbolts. I told you all this was an important pony.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Three cheers for Rarity, my new favorite party guest!

speaker: Ponies
text: Hip hip, hooray! Hip hip, hooray! Hip hip, hooray!

speaker: Rarity
text: ...And then I said, "Puh-lease, that isn't a hat, darling, that's a natural disaster that somehow landed atop your head!"

speaker: Silver Frames
text: Oh, you are a delight, Rarity, an absolute delight. You simply must attend my art gallery opening this evening. [laughs]

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, I'd love to, but I–

speaker: Golden Gavel
text: And let's not forget my charity auction tomorrow morning.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, that sounds wonderful, but I–

speaker: Swan Song
text: And of course there's a seat for you at my dinner party tomorrow night.

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm flattered, really. It's just I have a project I really need to get started on, and-

speaker: Silver Frames
text: Oh, but Rarity! I may as well close down the whole gallery if *you* can't attend!

speaker: Golden Gavel
text: My auction is for charity, dear. For *charity*...

speaker: Swan Song
text: And my dinner party will be a disaster if you don't come.

speaker: Rarity
text: ...of course I'll be there.

speaker: Silver Frames
text: Wonderful!

speaker: Golden Gavel
text: Oh, thank goodness!

speaker: Swan Song
text: Disaster averted!

speaker: Rarity
text: Looks like we'll be spending a few more days here, Opalescence. Turns out bumping into Fancy Pants like that was the best thing that's ever happened to me. Of course, finishing Twilight's dress in time for her birthday party is still my top priority, but I can't possibly disappoint the Canterlot elite by rejecting their invitations now, can I?

speaker: Rarity
text:
I'll be the toast of the town, the girl on the go
I'm the type of pony every pony, every pony should know
I'll be the one to watch, the girl in the flow
I'm the type of pony every pony, every pony should know

speaker: Rarity
text:
Becoming as popular as popular can be
Making my mark, making my mark in high society
I'm the belle of the ball, the star of the show, yeah
I'm the type of pony every pony, every pony should know

speaker: Rarity
text:
See how they hang on every word that I speak
My approving glance is what they all seek
I'm the creme de la creme, not just another Jane Doe
I'm the type of pony every pony should know

speaker: Rarity
text:
At home, at the opera, on a fancy yacht
Becoming the talk, the talk of all of Canterlot
I'm the creme de la creme, not just another Jane Doe, yeah
I'm the type of pony every pony, every pony should know

speaker: Rarity
text:
Because I'm the type of pony
Yes, I'm the type of pony
Yes, I'm the type of pony every pony should know

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, I hope I haven't forgotten anything.

speaker: Bags Valet
text: Me... too...

speaker: Rarity
text: We'd better get going.

speaker: Rarity
text: I must get back to Ponyville with enough time to finish Twilight's ensemble.

speaker: Rarity
text: For me? *Dearest Rarity, your presence is requested at the Canterlot garden party tomorrow afternoon. Yours, Jet Set and Upper Crust*! [gasps] The Canterlot garden party! Why, next to the Galloping Gala that is *the* premier event in Canterlot! [squeals] Oh, but if I go, I'll miss Twilight's birthday... But if I don't go, my new reputation in Canterlot as a Very Important Pony might be ruined! I might never be invited to another high society event again! Friend's birthday... Very Important Pony... [winces] It's just too important. [takes deep breath] *My dear Twilight, I am afraid I won't be able to make it to your birthday party tomorrow, because... because poor Opal is quite ill, and she is in no condition to make the long journey back to Ponyville! I do hope you understand. Your friend, Rarity.*

speaker: Bags Valet
text: I suppose this means you don't need me to bring down your bags?

speaker: Rarity
text: No. But, I will need some help unpacking them.

speaker: Bags Valet
text: Oomph!

speaker: Rarity
text: What do you think? Too much? You're right. Too little. Ah, garden party, here I come!

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Twilight Sparkle
text: Surprise!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [fades in] Swoosh! And right before she hit the ground, shoom, she– Hi again!

speaker: Rarity
text: What are you– how did you– Why are you–

speaker: Applejack
text: Listen to her. She's so excited to see us, she can hardly talk.

speaker: Rarity
text: What I mean to say is, what are you all doing here?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: When I got your letter saying you were stuck in Canterlot, I asked Pinkie Pie if it wouldn't be too much trouble to move my birthday party here, so you wouldn't have to miss it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Balloons are super easy to pack.

speaker: Rarity
text: Wow... First you get me a suite at Canterlot castle and now *this*. I don't know what to say, Twilight.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: How about you start by saying what you're doing in that fancy getup?

speaker: Rarity
text: This? Uh- well, I- I always put on something a little fancy when Opal's feeling under the weather... Cheers her right up. [laughs nervously]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, poor Opal. Where is the sick darling?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, uhh, she's... Hold on a minute.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Rarity
text: I am so sorry about this.

speaker: Rarity
text: She's resting on the bed.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Poor baby.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She looks awful.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is... that my dress?

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's so... simple. So practical. So *me*! It's the perfect dress for my birthday party! I love it!

speaker: Rarity
text: [sighs in relief] You don't know how glad I am to hear you say that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: When I told the Princess that I was moving the party to Canterlot, she was kind enough to offer us the Canterlot castle ballroom!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Isn't it fancy pants?

speaker: Rarity
text: Fancy Pants?! Where?! Ahh, I mean, *where* did you find the time to put up all these decorations? Ha-ha. [whimper]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, I never leave home without my party cannon!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ta-da!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I thought about having my birthday outside, but they're having another party on the castle grounds today.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Let's party!

speaker: Rarity
text: Mmh... No reason I can't at least make an appearance...

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm here!

speaker: Upper Crust
text: Darling, I'm so glad you made it.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Rarity! So happy to see you here.

speaker: Rarity
text: I wouldn't have missed this for the world.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: [sniffs] I say, what is that scent you're wearing? It smells like... [sniffs] Is that cake frosting?

speaker: Rarity
text: ...Yes, I always dab a little frosting behind my ears before I go out. [laughs nervously] After all, who doesn't like the smell of cake frosting?

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: I know I do.

speaker: Upper Crust
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Rarity
text: [sighs] Well, all this talk about cake has made me hungry. Think I'll go and see what's on the hors d'oeuvre table. If you'll excuse me...

speaker: Rarity
text: I think I left the bathwater running in my suite.

speaker: Rarity
text: I really should go check on Opal...

speaker: Rarity
text: Is that Princess Celestia?

speaker: Rarity
text: [hushed] I need to use the little fillies' room!

speaker: Rarity
text: Can I get anypony more punch?

speaker: Rarity
text: I... have to go to do the... thing with the... stuff... you know...? [trails off]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, what's with the croquet mallet?

speaker: Rarity
text: [muffled] What croquet mallet?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Duh, the one in your mouth!

speaker: Rarity
text: [laughs nervously] Ooh, *that* croquet mallet. I- well I, you know, the truth is... the truth is...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Were you at that other party in the garden?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity, I'm surprised at you.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight let me explain! I–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I hadn't realized you were such a savvy businesspony!

speaker: Rarity
text: You must understand! I–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: All of those ponies look so posh. And with the Grand Galloping Gala coming up, I bet you could totally get some of them to buy your dresses. Very smart!

speaker: Rarity
text: Woo, wwwhy yes, I-I didn't want you to think I was being rude, so that's *exactly* the reason I didn't tell you. The one and only reason. [laughs nervously]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, well, you didn't have to do that. You should totally go over there and mingle!

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight, you really are the best friend a pony could ever ask for. I don't know why I ever thought you wouldn't understand.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Understand what?

speaker: Rarity
text: Nothing. See you girls later!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, wait up! We're your friends! I'm sure they won't mind if we check out the party too! C'mon, you guys! Let's show them how to party Ponyville style!

speaker: Rarity
text: *Oh no*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm!

speaker: Applejack
text: How come y'all aren't doing any gardening? This is a *garden* party, isn't it?

speaker: Jet Set
text: Can you believe what that pony is wearing?

speaker: Upper Crust
text: It's just so plain.

speaker: Rarity
text: [nervous laugh] Yeah.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Excuse me, might I ask where you got your ensemble?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why, yes! Yes, you may. A very, *very* close friend of mine from Ponyville made it for me.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Ponyville? You don't say?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I *do* say. Her name is–

speaker: Rarity
text: Fancy Pants! Come with me! I'd like to show you this, er, thing that's over there. On the other side of the room.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: In a moment, my dear. This lovely filly from Ponyville was just about to tell me who made her charming dress.

speaker: Rarity
text: That dress? Oh come now, who cares, it's just a plain old–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, don't be so modest! This dress you made is beautiful!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We all think so!

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: [to Rarity] You know these ponies?

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes. Yes, I do know them. They may not be as sophisticated as some of you Canterlot ponies, but they are my best friends. And they are without a doubt the most important ponies I know.

speaker: Jet Set
text: Important ponies? These ruffians?

speaker: Upper Crust
text: Don't make me laugh!

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: I, for one, find them charmingly rustic.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: And I think the dress you made for your friend is lovely. [chuckle] I dare say every mare in Canterlot will be wanting one.

speaker: Upper Crust
text: Oh, I'd like to place my order *right now*.

speaker: Jet Set
text: I think you should get two.

speaker: Fancy Pants
text: Er, yes, now then. How about you introduce me to your friends?

speaker: Rarity
text: With pleasure!

speaker: Rarity
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Rarity
text: *I wanted to tell you about the important lesson I learned during my visit.*

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Now that I would like to hear.

speaker: Rarity
text: *I learned that no matter where you go in life, you should never forget that you are the product of your home and your friends. And that is something always to be proud of, no matter what.*

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Hm, a very valuable lesson to have learned.

speaker: Bags Valet
text: It certainly is! But... might I ask that we hurry things up a bit?! Oh no!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No distractions. Today is too important. Re-shelving day! *Understanding Medieval Equestria* goes in Pony History. *Modern Spellcasting*. That's Classics. *The Art of the To-Do List*... Actually, I kinda wanna read that again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! What are you laughing at?

speaker: Spike
text: This little beauty is my birthday present to myself! It's a fire ruby! I've been aging it for months, and it's almost ripe!

speaker: Spike
text: [giggles] Hey, you took my advice! Just use the whole floor as one big shelf.

speaker: Rarity
text: [muffled] Hellooo? [normal] Anypony home? Twilight? [gasps] Is that a *fire ruby*?! Huh, that must be at least twenty carats! No inclusions, pristine facets...

speaker: Spike
text: And totally delicious.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uhh... if you guys don't mind?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, uh, of course. I just came by to see if you had any books on historical fashion... [to Spike] Did you say... delicious?

speaker: Spike
text: Sure did! Next week's my birthday, and this is my birthday dinner.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Start with this one.

speaker: Rarity
text: Thanks, Twilight. I've got a feeling ruffled taffeta capes are going to make a huge comeback this season, and I want to be ahead of the game... [to Spike] I hope it's as tasty as it is beautiful, Spike. I've never seen anything quite so stunning before.

speaker: Spike
text: Gosh... You really like it, huh?

speaker: Rarity
text: Like it? It's *magnificent*.

speaker: Spike
text: [sighs] Then you should have it. This beautiful gem was meant to be with you.

speaker: Rarity
text: I don't know what to say... This is so thoughtful. Oh, my little Spikey-wikey! [kisses] Thank you *so* much!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, Spike, that's one of the kindest, most generous things you've ever done. I've never seen Rarity so happy!

speaker: Spike
text: I will never wash this cheek again. [sighs and laughs]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Just about finished, Spike? Everypony will be here soon.

speaker: Spike
text: There. Perfect! Everything looks perfect!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not quite everything.

speaker: Spike
text: A washcloth? I don't get it. Ah, no way, Twilight! I said I wasn't gonna wash the cheek that Rarity kissed, and I meant it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's over, Spike! I'm cleaning that cheek!

speaker: Spike
text: [gasps for breath] It's mine! Stop it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Never!

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight...!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [blows party hooter] Happy birthday!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Party time, woo-hoo!

speaker: Spike
text: Are those... for me?

speaker: Applejack
text: You bet they are, birthday boy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Happy birthday, Spike.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't you know you get presents on your birthday?

speaker: Spike
text: Well, actually, this is my first birthday in Ponyville... I usually just get one present... from Twilight. A book.

speaker: Rarity
text: Speaking of presents, this is from my new line of taffeta capes. I'm going to make one for each of you!

speaker: Rarity
text: I've been inspired by the generosity of my little Spikey-wikey, who gave me this beautiful fire ruby, one of the kindest acts I've ever experienced. Mmm.

speaker: Spike
text: Applejack, I can't thank you enough for this great blanket. I really needed a new one.

speaker: Applejack
text: C'mon, Spike, you already thanked me fifteen times. I'm startin' to get a little embarrassed.

speaker: Spike
text: I know I keep thanking you guys, but I'm just so grateful. I wish this party could last forever.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Duh! The party *can't* last forever 'cause you have to go to Sugarcube Corner, 'cause the Cakes said they have a special surprise for you, 'cause it's your birthday!

speaker: Spike
text: No way!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I said the party couldn't last forever, but it doesn't need to end right now!

speaker: Spike
text: Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Cake!

speaker: Mr Cake
text: There's the dragon of the hour! Happy birthday, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: Thanks!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: When we found out it was your birthday, we couldn't resist trying out a new recipe: sapphire!

speaker: Spike
text: Wow!

speaker: Spike
text: Thank you so much! Man, first I get a bunch of great presents from my best friends, and now an amazing sapphire cupcake! Hohoh, what a day! Whoa! Oh my gosh! I'm so sorry, Cheerilee!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: That's okay. What's got you so excited?

speaker: Spike
text: [chomps] [muffled] Pinkie Pie told me I should come see the Cakes, so they could give me a cake 'cause it's my birthday today.

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Well, happy birthday, Spike! I wish I had something to give you! Uh... Oh! Here you go!

speaker: Spike
text: Wow, really?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Sure! Everypony should get fun gifts on their birthday! Have a great birthday, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: I wish every day was my birthday...

speaker: Spike
text: Pinkie Pie mentions my birthday to the Cakes, and I get a cupcake. I mention it to Cheerilee, and I get this great hat.

speaker: Spike
text: Hmmm, I wonder... Hey there, Lickety Split! That's a pretty cool ball you got there! Did you know it's my birthday?

speaker: Spike
text: [laughs] This is unbelievable! [chuckles] Hey, Junebug! It's my birthday!

speaker: Junebug
text: Happy birthday, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: Aren't you gonna give me something? You know, like a birthday present?

speaker: Junebug
text: Um, I... I don't have anything.

speaker: Spike
text: Well, how about those flowers? I'll take those–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike! Uh, sorry, Junebug, I think Spike might've gotten a little carried away.

speaker: Junebug
text: Uh, no problem... H-Happy birthday, Spike!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What are you doing? You're out here demanding gifts now?

speaker: Spike
text: Wow, you're right, Twilight. I don't know what got into me. Thanks for snapping me out of it. I'd better go give Cheerilee her hat back.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No problem. See you at home later?

speaker: Spike
text: Sounds good! Bye! [chuckles] Who *else* has a present for 'Spikey-wikey'? [hisses]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, what a rough night's sleep, Spike. I had the weirdest drea–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can't believe you! Where'd you get all this– [gasps]

speaker: Spike
text: [yawns/hisses] What happened?

speaker: Spike
text: What's happening to me, Twilight?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know! Think back to last night. Did something happen? Spike? What did you do after I saw you?

speaker: Spike
text: I went to talk... to...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Spike*!

speaker: Spike
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You went to talk to who?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, um... I don't remember. Hey, can I have that globe? You're not using it, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Spike
text: What about this book?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike, I'm worried about you. You're usually not so... grabby!

speaker: Spike
text: My arms aren't usually [voice drops] this long either. What's happening to me?

speaker: Doc Top
text: Well now, what seems to be the problem?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is Spike. [slaps] And something's wrong with him. [slaps] He used to be half this size! And he keeps trying to take things that aren't [slaps] his!

speaker: Doc Top
text: All right then, let's just have a look see, shall we? Widdle guy not feewing too good? Who's a brave widdle boy, huh? Who's a brave one?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So? What do you think, Doctor?

speaker: Doc Top
text: Well, I think I know what the problem is. He's a dragon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's not the problem. He's always been a dragon.

speaker: Doc Top
text: Oh. Well, that would explain it. Listen, I don't know anything about dragons, I know about baby ponies. Maybe you should try a vet.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sighs] Okay. Thank you, doctor.

speaker: Mane Goodall
text: Hm, well, I'm flummoxed. Y'bring me a dog, I've got it diagnosed in seconds. Snake even faster, but... to be honest, I've never seen a real live dragon before.

speaker: Mane Goodall
text: Who's a good boy? Who's a good boy? Sit.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks anyway. C'mon, Spike.

speaker: Zecora
text: Ooh, he is starting to mature. Of this fact I am quite sure.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mature? So he's just... growing up? But that doesn't explain why he keeps grabbing things.

speaker: Zecora
text: A dragon's heart is prone to greed, a steady diet to make growth speed. Then, the resulting bigger size only makes their hunger rise. If this trait should go unchecked, if Spike continues to collect, more growth will certainly occur – he is going to turn into a monster.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasps] You mean the more things a dragon collects, the bigger and greedier he gets? But how do we stop him before he's completely out of control?

speaker: Zecora
text: If his monstrous ways you wish to impede, you must prevent him from practicing greed.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Get away from her, you brute!

speaker: Spike
text: Spike want!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: You're not getting my scooter!

speaker: Spike
text: Spike want!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey, Spike! Check out this *amazing* broom!

speaker: Spike
text: Spike *want*! [hisses] [roaring]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sing-song voice] C'mon, big boy! Look at this incredible broom!

speaker: Spike
text: *Spike want*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fight all you want, I'm not letting you out! Oh, Spike, I just re-shelved this room!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [groans] What now?

speaker: Applejack
text: Now who in Ponyville would steal my apples? For that matter, who would steal my leaves?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
