text: Happy day-after-your-birthday, Zecora!

speaker: Zecora
text: What a lovely hi, Miss Pinkie Pie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And Miss Matilda, happy birthday to you... in one hundred and thirty two days!

speaker: Matilda
text: Pinkie Pie! How do you remember everything about everypony?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: 'Cause everypony's my friend and I love to see my friends smile!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
My name is Pinkie Pie (*Hello!*)
And I am here to say (*How ya doin'?*)
I'm gonna make you smile and I will brighten up your day
It doesn't matter now (*What's up?*)
If you are sad or blue (*Howdy!*)
'Cause cheering up my friends is just what Pinkie's here to do

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
'Cause I love to make you smile, smile, smile
Yes I do
It fills my heart with sunshine all the while
Yes it does
'Cause all I really need's a smile, smile, smile
From these happy friends of mine

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
I like to see you grin (*Awesome!*)
I love to see you beam (*Rock on!*)
The corners of your mouth turned up is always Pinkie's dream (*Hoof bump!*)
But if you're kind of worried
And your face has made a frown
I'll work real hard and do my best to turn that sad frown upside down

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
'Cause I love to make you grin, grin, grin
Yes I do
Bust it out from ear to ear let it begin
Just give me a joyful grin, grin, grin
And you fill me with good cheer

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
It's true some days are dark and lonely
And maybe you feel sad
But Pinkie will be there to show you that it isn't that bad
There's one thing that makes me happy and makes my whole life worthwhile
And that's when I talk to my friends and get them to smile

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
I really am so happy
Your smile fills me with glee
I give a smile I get a smile
And that's so special to me

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
'Cause I love to see you beam, beam, beam
Yes I do
Tell me what more can I say
To make you see
That I do
It makes me happy when you beam, beam, beam
Yes it always makes my day

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Come on every pony smile, smile, smile
Fill my heart up with sunshine, sunshine
All I really need's a smile, smile, smile
From these happy friends of mine

speaker: Pinkie Pie
Choir
text:
Come on every pony smile, smile, smile
Fill my heart up with sunshine, sunshine
All I really need's a smile, smile, smile
From these happy friends of mine

speaker: Pinkie Pie
Choir
text: Smile, smile, smile, smile, smile

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Come on and smile
Come on and smile

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I've never seen you before.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Kid, you're smarter than you look.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Thanks! I'm Pinkie Pie. What's your name? "Property of C.D.D." I'm guessing that last "D" is for "Donkey".

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Quick as a whip, kid.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Now, how 'bout that "C"? Hmm... Calvin? Calhoun? Caleb? Carl? Carmine? Carlo? Charlie? Chester? Chico? Claudio? Cletus? Clifford? Coraline? Cornelius? Cortez? Crank? Christopher–?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: *Cranky*! It's Cranky, alright?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And your middle name?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: [mumbles] Doodle.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm sorry?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: [quickly] Doodle.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: One more time...!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: [sighs] Doodle.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasps] So you're a Cranky Doodle Donkey?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
You're a Cranky Doodle Donkey guy.
A Cranky Doodle Donkey.
I never met you but you're my new friend
and I'm your best friend Pinkie Pie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: C'mon now, Doodle, give a smile!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: *Nopony calls me Doodle*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What just happened? Meet somepony new, check. Introduce myself, check. Sing random song outta nowhere, check. Become instant best friends... uncheck. I don't get it. How can somepony not become instant best friends with me? Was it something I said? Was it something I sang? This is no time for the blame game, Pinkie! There's somepony new in town, and you need to win him over! 'Try everything you can to make Cranky smile and be your friend'... Check!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Alright, Pinkie. If you're gonna win Cranky's friendship, you're gonna have to bring your A game! Let's do this. Howdy-doody, Cranky Doodle! So, uh, are you moving to Ponyville, Cranky?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: What gave you the hint there, kid? The cart full of stuff, maybe?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, I'd be happy to show you around. It's the least a new friend can do.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Listen, kid, I traveled around Equestria my entire life. I've made many friends. I don't need any more.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Gosh! I could never have too many friends!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Well, why don't you go and make some more?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But I don't need to *go* when I can *stay* and make friends... with *you*.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Look, kid, y–

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, Cranky, you can call me Pinkie. All of my *friends* do.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Look, *kid*, I came to Ponyville for some peace and quiet and privacy, to be alone with my memories. All I want is to get to my new home and unpack my stuff.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, what does *this* bauble do?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Don't touch that!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooooooh, what's this?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Please, don't!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oooh, look at these!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Eeeheeeheee!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: *Pinkie*! Keep your hooves off my wagon!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okay, Cranky. [gasps] [quickly] I promised not to touch your wagon, so I brought one of my own! I use it to welcome folks!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Who'd'a guessed?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Maybe we can be wagon buddies! Well, you've gotta at least let me give you the special welcome that comes with it... [whimper]

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: [groans] Let's get this over with.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's the spirit!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Welcome welcome welcome
A fine welcome to you
Welcome welcome welcome
I say how do you do?
Welcome welcome welcome
I say hip hip hurray
Welcome welcome welcome
To Ponyville today

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait for it!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Noooo!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, silly me! I must've put the confetti in the oven and the cake in the confetti cannons! Again! [giggles] [chomps] Mmm, still delicious! Try some, Cranky, it's sure to make you smile.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Oh, where is it, where is it?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Where's what? [yelps] Spider! Big hairy spider!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Stop, stop, stop!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh. Was that your wig?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I can fix this, I can fix this! [through megaphone] Hey, everypony! Does anypony have a toupee?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This donkey is *really, really, bald*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [through megaphone] What's so funny? This is serious business, everypony! Cranky needs a new wig to cover his hairless head!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: I have had enough!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, you're losing him, Pinkie. Wait, Cranky! Please, let me make it up to you!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Please! Oh, please please please... [fades out]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ladies, this is a spa emergency. Cranky needs help, STAT.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hi, Cranky! I have a gift for you!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: The spa treatment was gift enough.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's not going to explode or anything. Promise. Just open it! It's a new toupee! I had my friend Rarity make it. She calls it the "dreamboat special".

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: This is wonderful. Thanks, kid.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: He's starting to warm up, but still no smile. Hmmm.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey! Whatcha doing there, ol' buddy ol' pal?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: What's it look like?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Looks like a yard sale. I'll give you two bits for this!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: I'm not selling, kid. I'm unpacking.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, why didn't you say so?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: I thought I had.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This is so pretty! Where'd you get it?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Manehattan. Now put it down, gently.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Really? What were you doin' there?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Trying to find a friend.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oooh, I'm always trying to find friends, and today I found you. See how good I am at it?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: This was a special friend.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Like me?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No, you're *extra* special, kid.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [to herself] Yes! I'm in! [to Cranky] Woow, where in Equestria did you get this, Cranky?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Fillydelphia.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's awfully pretty.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Yes, she was.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: I mean, it was– I mean, it is. Yes, it's pretty. Now put it down!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I wonder where Cranky got this. Huh. Will you look at that? Hey, Cranky! Can I ask you about–

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh no!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: What did you say-ayayayayay! What have you done?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: There! Uh, all better?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No, not all better, *all soggy*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm sorry, Cranky!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Oh, you're sorry! Well, then, everything is fine!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: ...It is?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: *No*! It isn't! Listen to me, kid, I will *never* be your friend!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Never, or never-ever?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Never, ever, ever, ever, ever!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's four 'evers'. That's like... forever!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I just can't believe it. Cranky said he would never *forever* be my friend. It was horrible.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know this is hard for you, Pinkie, seeing that you're friends with everypony, but you just have to accept that Cranky is gonna be an exception. He just... doesn't want to be bothered.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, he doesn't want to be bothered by your over-the-top super-hyper antics.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, no, it's okay, Twilight. I get what you're saying. What you're both saying. And I guess... I can leave Cranky alone. ...Right after he accepts my apology!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Cranky!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No! No! Leave me alone!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait! I understand that you don't want me as a friend!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No, I don't!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So I just wanted to say 'I'm sorry'!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Fine! You said it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But do you accept my apology?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, Cranky! Please accept my apology! Please!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But I'm really, really, really...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: ...really, really...

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Phew!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: ...really, really, really... ...really, really, really... ...really, really, really... ...really, really, really, really... [continues saying "really", speed increases until] ...*sorry*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Cranky, please, *please* accept my apology! I'd do anything to make it up to you!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: But there's nothing you can do! You ruined my book! You destroyed all I have to remember her by!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Her? Her who? The special friend?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: *Go away, Pinkie*! [sighs]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [muffled] Cranky? It's me again. I understand that you don't wanna be my friend or accept my apology... Before I leave you alone forever, I have something to at least *try* to make up for ruining your book.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: No, I don't want it, kid! Anything you would give me is sure to lead to some sort of disaster!

speaker: Matilda
text: [muffled] Goodness, you really *are* cranky.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: It can't be... Is it really you?

speaker: Matilda
text: It can, and it is.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Matilda! But how?

speaker: Matilda
text: Pinkie.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: But... I never told you about her!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You didn't have to. I put two and two and two together and it added up to Matilda.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: What?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, when you were talking about your souvenirs, you said something about trying to find a special friend! And y'know, I wasn't just born yesterday. Nuh-uh! My birthday isn't for another seventy five days!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Huh?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And then, in your scrapbook, there was a flower, an old ticket, and a menu from the Grand Galloping Gala! And I knew I recognized all these things.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: But how could you have ever seen them before?

speaker: Matilda
text: Because I also have them in *my* scrapbook.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And I'd seen them in Matilda's book!

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Oh, Matilda. The night we met at the Gala was the most magical night of my life.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: [voiceover] I couldn't wait to see you again. But when I came to your room the next day, you were gone.

speaker: Matilda
text: [voiceover] Didn't you get my note?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: [voiceover] No, I never got it. Ever since that day I've gone from town to town to town, searching all over Equestria for you...

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: ...Until finally I gave up. I came to Ponyville to retire from my search.

speaker: Matilda
text: I was living in Ponyville the whole time. I always hoped that some day you would come and find me... Doodle.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Uh. Matilda? Nopony calls him Doodle.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Nopony... but Matilda. Mmm.

speaker: Matilda
text: Oh, Doodle, I'm so happy to see you. [kisses]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So does this mean that you accept my apology?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Yes, Pinkie, I accept your apology, and I am honored to call you my friend.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [explodes like a firework] Woo-hoo! This is just fantastic! Ooh, now we can hang out together and chat and sing songs and [gasps] *party*! Oh, I have to throw you guys a *big* party! It'll be called the 'Welcome to Ponyville/I Found My Lost Love/I'm BFF's with Pinkie Pie' Party! ...Or maybe something less over-the-top and not so super-hyper.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Pinkie, we're eternally grateful to you. But... Matilda and I just want to spend some time together in peace and quiet.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh. Um, but we're still friends?

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Pinkie, you went way, way, *way* out of your way to make me happy. Of course we're friends.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Great!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *There are many different kinds of friends, and many ways to express friendship. Some friends like to run and laugh and play together. But others just like to be left alone, and that's fine too. But the best thing about friendship is being able to make your friends smile.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
He had a Cranky Doodle sweetheart
She's his cranky doodle joy
I helped the Cranky Doodle boy, yeah!
I helped the Cranky Doodle boy!

speaker: Matilda
Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Pinkie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Whoops, privacy. Sorry.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Lunch time! Who's hungry?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Plenty for everypony. Slow down, sweetie. [giggles]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Here you go, Angel bunny.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Okay, Mister Picky-pants, you win. Carrots, lettuce and apples, yum-yum-yum!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What? But... Well then, what *will* you eat? I'm not sure I can even make that. Well... I don't want you to starve... Oh, are you sure I can't tempt you with a nice crisp piece of–

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sighs] I'll make your special recipe.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hmm, let's see. Asparagus. Excuse me, um, I think you just stepped in front of me? Excuse me, I think you made a mistake? You see I was actually here first and–

speaker: Unicorn
text: Sorry, didn't notice you there.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I know.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, pardon me, sir–

speaker: Geri
text: Yes, what?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I think you just cut in front of me.

speaker: Geri
text: A cut of celery? But– this is the asparagus stand!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I said [into ear trumpet] I think you just cut in front of me.

speaker: Geri
text: Ohoh, no need, dearie, I'm already in front!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I noticed.

speaker: Turf
text: [fades in] ...And I was like, 'Oh, wow.'

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hey!

speaker: Turf
text: Would you mind moving back? You're in my personal space.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But–

speaker: Surf
text: Seriously, do you need your asparagus so badly? Get a life.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, okay. There's no rush.

speaker: Rarity
text: Fluttershy, you mustn't let them treat you that way.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, it's-it's really no big deal...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's bigger than big. It's double big. You are a pony with a *problem*.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What problem? Oh, go right ahead, Pinkie Pie. You first.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Right there! *That's* the problem.

speaker: Rarity
text: You've got to stop being such a doormat.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: A doormat?

speaker: Rarity
text: A pushover, darling. You've got to stand up for yourself, promise us.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, okay. I promise. Oh! Good!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, that's okay, I don't mind.

speaker: Rarity
text: Watch and learn. Hold it right there, Mister small and handsome.

speaker: Gizmo
text: Uh, who, me?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, of course you. Nopony ever called you handsome before?

speaker: Gizmo
text: Uhh, that'd be a big no.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, well, they should! How about flexing some of your muscles for me? [gasps] Oh, my heavens! Do you think a strong, handsome stallion such as yourself could give my friend the last asparagus?

speaker: Gizmo
text: [mumbles] Nuhh.

speaker: Rarity
text: See, that's not so hard, is it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um... I guess not.

speaker: Rarity
text: Alright then! What else is on your list?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Let's see... I also need tomatoes.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Here you go.

speaker: Roma
text: [clears throat] That'll be *two* bits. Not one.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, but last week, it was only one bit.

speaker: Roma
text: That was then, this is now.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, okay. I don't wanna argue about it.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What do you think you're doing?

speaker: Roma
text: Mindin' my own business, maybe you should try it.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Two bits for tomatoes is outrageous. One bit is the right price.

speaker: Roma
text: I say it's two bits.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: One bit.

speaker: Roma
text: Two bits!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: One bit!

speaker: Roma
text: Two bits!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *One bit*!

speaker: Roma
text: *Two bits*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Two bits*!

speaker: Roma
text: *One bit*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Two bits*!

speaker: Roma
text: *One bit*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *I insist it's two bits or nothing*!

speaker: Roma
text: *One bit and that's my final offer*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Have it your way, one bit it is!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: See? Asserting yourself can be fun!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I guess you're right!

speaker: Rarity
text: So, Fluttershy, do you feel like giving it a try?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um... okay. [to self] I need that cherry. [to Crafty Crate] Boy, am I glad you have one cherry left. You see, I'm making this special meal for my bunny Angel. He's a very picky eater, and the recipe calls for a cherry on top.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Here you go.

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: So, you say you need this cherry 'very badly'.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, yes, I'm desperate for it!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Then it'll be ten bits!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Ten*?! Oh, hey, mister handsome, I know you wanna do the right thing because you're handsome and strong, and big, handsome, strong guys are always nice to everypony, right?

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Ten bits for the cherry.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ten bits for one cherry's outrageous! I insist on paying you... *eleven* bits!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Eleven bits?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Umm...I mean, nine bits!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Er, now wait a minute.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Okay, twelve bits, but that's my final offer!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: I think you're confused.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It's twelve bits, take it or leave it.

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Okay, I'll take it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Don't give him your money! One cherry is *not* worth twelve bits!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But... I was only doing what you did.

speaker: Rarity
text: It was a valiant effort, but you should refuse to give him your business and just walk away.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But... I can't let Angel starve! He won't eat it unless I make it just right! I need that cherry no matter what it costs!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: In that case, twenty bits!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Twenty*?! Oh, but, I don't have that much!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Then why're you wasting my time?

speaker: Lemon Hearts
text: I'll give you two bits for that cherry!

speaker: Crafty Crate
text: Sold! Eh, tough break, kid. Next time, don't be such a doormat.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ta-da! Here you go, Angel. Sorry there's no cherry on top, but the rest of it is exactly what you wanted. Angel? [sighs] Look at me... I really *am* a doormat. "The incredible Iron Will turns doormats into dynamos. Assertiveness seminar today, hedge maze centre." As Celestia is my witness, I'm never gonna be a pushover again!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh! Ah! Uh... excuse me! [squeaks]

speaker: Iron Will
text: [kissing] Welcome, friends! My name is Iron Will, and today is the first day of your new life! I wanna hear you stomp if you're tired of being a pushover!

speaker: Iron Will
text: Stomp if you're tired of being a doormat!

speaker: Iron Will
text: Stomp if you wanna pay nothing for this seminar!

speaker: Iron Will
text: That's no joke, friends. Iron Will is so confident that you will be *one hundred percent satisfied* with Iron Will's assertiveness techniques, that if you are *not* one hundred percent satisfied, you. Pay. Nothing. But I pity the fool who doubts Iron Will's methods! You don't doubt me, do you?

speaker: Meadow Song
text: Uh-uh, no sir...

speaker: Iron Will
text: That, my friends, is your first lesson. "Don't be shy; look 'em in the eye."

speaker: Iron Will
text: Now, to demonstrate that Iron Will's techniques will work for anypony, I'm gonna need a volunteer.

speaker: Iron Will
text: You in the back row!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Who, me?

speaker: Iron Will
text: Yes, you! Iron Will wants you onstage!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gulps] Uh, well...

speaker: Iron Will
text: Now!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [whispering] Okay.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Whoaa! He's blocking your path. What are you gonna *do* about it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, politely walk around him?

speaker: Iron Will
text: No.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Gingerly tip-toe around him?

speaker: Iron Will
text: No!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Go back home and try again tomorrow?

speaker: Iron Will
text: *No!* "When somepony tries to block, show them that you *rock!*"

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh! Sorry.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Don't be sorry! Be assertive! "Never apologize when you can criticize." [clears throat] *why don't you watch where you're going!?* Now, you try.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh... next time, get out of the way before... I bump into you, 'cause... I *totally won't be sorry when I do!*

speaker: Iron Will
text: You see my friends!? If my techniques can work for this shy, little pony, then they can work for *anypony!*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Okay, I feel good. I feel ready to "attack the day", as Iron Will says.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Excuse me, Mr. Greenhooves, but I-I think you might be over-watering my petunias...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: ...again.

speaker: Mr Greenhooves
text: Let the professional handle it. [humming]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: "Treat me like a pushover, and you'll get the once over."

speaker: Mr Greenhooves
text: Hm? Hmm... [coughs and sputters] Well, perhaps that *is* enough water.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Thank you. [excited giggle] I can't believe it worked!

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Showpony business is tough.

speaker: Bon Bon
text: Go ahead, try one of your jokes out on me. I laugh at everything.

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Okay, okay, okay. A donkey and a mule are stuck on a desert island...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [clears throat] Excuse me? Would you mind moving your carts so I can pass?

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Yeah yeah, in a minute, I just wanna finish up this story. And so the donkey says to the mule–

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *A-hemmmm*, can you move? You're blocking my path.

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Yeah yeah, in a *minute*! So the donkey says to the mule... [fades under] (Why don't we build a boat to get off this island?)

speaker: Fluttershy
text: "When somepony tries to block, show them that you rock!"

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: ...and the mule says–

speaker: Cherry Berry
text: Ugh! Easy does it, lady. We're moving, okay?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Good!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Who's next please? And *what* can I get for you today?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What do you think you're doing?! Didn't you see me?

speaker: Shoeshine
text: Uh, I guess maybe.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: 'Maybe'? "Maybes are for babies!" [growling] *Now go to the back of the line where you belong*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Heyyy*, look at *you*!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, your attitude is *so* feisty, it's fabulous.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Looks like that monster's workshop really paid off!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Iron Will's not a monster. He's a minotaur, and a true inspiration. His techniques really work.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, they've certainly made a difference in the way you carry yourself. You truly are a whole new Fluttershy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes I am. And new Fluttershy feels pretty stoked about new Fluttershy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, old Pinkie Pie feels really proud of new Fluttershy. Proud as pink punch. Want some? [giggles]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: "*You laugh at me, I wrath at you!*"

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Bye, girls. What a day. Taxi! Oh no you don't. "Cut in line, I'll take what's mine!"

speaker: Royal Riff
text: Aieeeeee! Ow...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Nopony pushes new Fluttershy around! [screams] *Nopony*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Old Pinkie Pie is not so sure new Fluttershy is such a good idea *after* all.

speaker: Rarity
text: Old Rarity agrees.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You got this, new Fluttershy! This day is *yours*! And nopony's gonna take it away from you! Am I *right*?! Right! What?! He's delivered the wrong mail, *again*!

speaker: Mr Zippy
text: Oh–

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And new Fluttershy does not want the wrong mail delivered to her cottage.

speaker: Mr Zippy
text: Ohh, did I mix 'em up again? Sorry about that.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: "You apologize, I penalize!"

speaker: Mr Zippy
text: Oh!

speaker: Globe Trotter
text: Excuse me, do you know how to get to the Ponyville tower?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [muffled] Sure, you just– [gasps]

speaker: Globe Trotter
text: Oh, that's a shame.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [growls] "*You make me lose, I blow my fuse!*"

speaker: Globe Trotter
text: Hey!

speaker: Rarity
text: Fluttershy! What *are* you doing?! That's no way to behave!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Didn't you see what he did to new Fluttershy? And he thought new Fluttershy was a pushover!

speaker: Rarity
text: No, sweetie, he didn't. We saw the whole thing. We think that you've taken your assertiveness training a little too far.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *What*?! You just want *new* Fluttershy to be a doormat like *old* Fluttershy! But old Fluttershy is *gone*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: New Fluttershy? Old Fluttershy!?

speaker: Rarity
text: What happened to *nice* Fluttershy? We want *that* Fluttershy back.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No, you want *wimp* Fluttershy. You want *pushover* Fluttershy. *You want do-anything-to-her-and-she-won't-complain Fluttershy*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nyaaaaah! Too many Fluttershys to keep track of! Make it stop!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Things getting too complicated for your simple little brain, Pinkie Pie?

speaker: Rarity
text: Now, stop right there! Let's not let things descend into petty insults!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Why not? I thought 'petty' was what you're all about, Rarity. With your 'petty' concerns about *fashion*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hey, leave her alone! Fashion is her passion!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, and what are you passionate about? Birthday cake? *Party hats*? I can't believe that the two most frivolous ponies in Ponyville are trying to tell *new* Fluttershy how to live her life when they are throwing their own lives away on pointless pursuits that *nopony else gives a flying feather about*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [starts crying] Looks like *nasty* Fluttershy is here to stay!

speaker: Rarity
text: [starts crying] I cannot believe what that monster Iron Will has done to you!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Iron Will's not a monster, *he's a minotaur*! [growls] [whimper] *I'm* the monster.

speaker: Rarity
text: [knocks, clears throat] Fluttershy, are you in there?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's Pinkie Pie and Rarity!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [muffled] Go away! Go away before *nasty* Fluttershy strikes again!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, sweetie, we all said things that we regret.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We did?

speaker: Rarity
text: Shh.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [muffled] Pinkie's right. I'm the only one to blame. [normal] But don't worry, I'm never coming out of my house again. Everypony will be a lot safer with me and my mean mouth locked away.

speaker: Rarity
text: [muffled] Sweetie, [normal] Pinkie Pie doesn't blame you, nor do I. You just received some bad advice from that Iron Will character.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah! *He's* the one that made you act super-duper nasty. What I mean is, there are other ways to assert yourself besides yelling at everypony.

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes! [muffled] You can stand up for yourself without being unpleasant about it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I-I'm not sure I can. I'm too far gone. Whenever I try to assert myself, I become a monster.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, sweetie, you're not a monster.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, but he is.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Iron Will's my name, training ponies is my game.

speaker: Rarity
text: What a *darling* little catchphrase.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Your friend Fluttershy *loved* Iron Will's catchphrases. Word on the street is that she doesn't take no guff from nopony! So, Iron Will is here to collect Iron Will's fee.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Fluttershy is in no shape to deal with *that* creep!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] I'm sure a big, brave, powerful, and rich monster– I mean, minotaur like you doesn't need that money right away. You can afford to come back later.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Are you kidding? Fluttershy is overdue as it is. Iron Will collects *now*.

speaker: Rarity
text: *Do something*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We're not even sure Fluttershy is home right now. Uh, she might be off frolicking with some woodland creatures. Uh, why don't you give us some time to track her down for ya?

speaker: Iron Will
text: Iron Will does have some grocery shopping to do. Iron Will will come back this afternoon.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But that's only half a day. We need one full day at *least*.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Iron Will will delay for half a day and no longer!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A full day!

speaker: Iron Will
text: Half day!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Full day*!

speaker: Iron Will
text: *Half day*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Half day*!

speaker: Iron Will
text: *Full day*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *We need half a day and no more*!

speaker: Iron Will
text: *Well, you'll get a full day and no less*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okie-dokie. See you tomorrow.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Wait, what?

speaker: Iron Will
text: *Huh*, sounds like the search won't be necessary. Iron Will collects *now*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But we had an agreement! You gotta come back tomorrow!

speaker: Iron Will
text: "When somepony tries to block, show them that you *rock*!"

speaker: Iron Will
text: Your payment is overdue, Fluttershy! [knocks]

speaker: Iron Will
text: [snorts] You were nothing but a doormat, and Iron Will turned you into a lean, mean, assertive machine! Now, pay Iron Will what you owe Iron Will!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, no.

speaker: Iron Will
text: *What did you say*?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Ohhh, I'd hate to be you right now, because Iron Will is gonna to rain down a world of hurt unless Iron Will gets his money *pronto*! [snorts]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: As I recall, during your workshop you promised one hundred percent satisfaction guaranteed, or you pay nothing. Well, I'm not satisfied.

speaker: Iron Will
text: What do you mean you're not satisfied?! *Everypony has always been satisfied*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, I guess I'm the first then. But since I'm not satisfied, I refuse to pay. It's as simple as that.

speaker: Iron Will
text: Ohh, are you... sure you're not just a little bit satisfied? B-because maybe... we could cut a deal. I-I mean we're both reasonable creatures, aren't we?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sorry, but no means no.

speaker: Iron Will
text: No means no, huh? Nopony's ever said that to me before. Huh... I gotta remember that one. That's a good catchphrase for my next workshop.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You were amazing, Fluttershy! You totally stood up to that monster!

speaker: Rarity
text: In fact, you didn't change at all! You were the same old Fluttershy that we've always loved!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: The one we missed!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Don't worry, old Fluttershy's back for good. I'm sorry I took the whole assertiveness thing too far. Friends?

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Friends.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Sometimes it can be hard for a shy pony like me to stand up for myself, and when I first tried it, I didn't like the pony I became. But I've learned that standing up for yourself isn't the same as changing who you are. Now I know how to put my hoof down without being unpleasant or mean.*

speaker: Spike
text: [sighs] I made it for you, Rarity. Why, yes, it is an ice cream house. Chocolate fudge shingles... rocky road garage...

speaker: Spike
text: Huh? Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, hi, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: It's the middle of the night! Why are you pacing like this?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Frankly, I don't know how *you* can sleep at a time like this!

speaker: Spike
text: Three A.M.?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's awful, it's horrible, it's tragic!

speaker: Spike
text: Eh... I don't understand. What's wrong?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Here. Now do you see what's wrong?

speaker: Spike
text: We forgot to celebrate Arbor Day?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, the problem is I just finished planning my schedule for the month, but I forgot to leave time to plan for *next* month! Don't you see? There's no time in my schedule to put together another schedule! I could move my meeting with the Ponyville Hay Board to the following Tuesday, but then I have to reschedule my lunch with Pinkie Pie, and you know what a nightmare she is with scheduling. This is an absolute disaster. My whole year could be thrown off!

speaker: Spike
text: And I woke up from an ice cream dream for this...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, my gosh, I think I did it! If I can find a way to read "The Art of Invisibility Spells" and "Thornhoof's Brief History of Canterlot" at the same time, that could leave me a half-hour scheduling window! Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's going on? [yelps]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Twilight, you've got to listen to me!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Who are you? I mean, you're me, but I'm me too. How can there be two me's? It's not scientifically possible. *You* are not scientifically possible!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Twilight, please! I have a very important message for you from the future!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're from the *future*?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's right, now listen–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What happened to you? The future must be awful.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Please! I don't have much time!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is there some sort of epic pony war in the distant future or something?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Actually, I'm from next Tuesday morning, but that's not important right now!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can't believe time travel is really possible! How did you, I mean, *I* figure it out?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The time spells are in the Canterlot archives. But that's not–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Really? Where? I've never seen them.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They're in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing. Now, you have to listen to–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is time travel fun, or does it hurt? I have so many questions– [muffled voice]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I have something extremely important to tell you about the future, and I only have a few seconds, so you've *got* to listen! Whatever you do, don't–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Future Twilight? Oh no! What was she trying to warn me about? Her clothes, her mane, that scar... Oh, what a mess she is! ...I mean, I am... or I *will* be... [gasps] She must want me to prevent whatever horrible thing happens in the future! [gasps]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: C'mon, Fluttershy! The party can't start until the party supplies get there!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [grunts] Happy to... help... but... can I carry... the balloons next time?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Listen, everypony! I've got something really important to say!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is no laughing matter! We have a crisis on our hooves!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've just been visited by myself from the future!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This isn't a joke! My future self tried to warn me about a horrible disaster that's going to occur sometime before next Tuesday morning!

speaker: Applejack
text: What kind of disaster?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know! I got sucked back into the future before I could explain!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Run for your liiiiiiiife!*

speaker: Rarity
text: What *ever* should we do, Twilight? How do we stop the disaster if we don't know what it is?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We'll just have to work together to make sure we're safe. Rainbow Dash, you and the other Pegasi spread out over Equestria, and look for any kind of problem that could lead to a disaster, and I mean *anything*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You got it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Everypony else–

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [screaming] Anypony else wanna panic with me? No? [resumes screaming]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Everypony else, time to disaster-proof Equestria!

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Done, and done, and done. Applejack, what about the Everfree Forest?

speaker: Applejack
text: The perimeter's clear.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Great.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And my team gave the all clear from Fillydelphia to Las Pegasus.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Excellent. Well, we've done everything on the list, but still... Future Twilight looked like she'd been through a horrible ordeal. I just have this nagging feeling we should be looking for something bigger than loose bolts and leaky pipes.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okay, everypony, follow my lead. [screams]

speaker: Spike
text: What is that thing?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's Cerberus! He's supposed to be guarding the gates of Tartarus. But if he's here, then all the ancient evil creatures that have been imprisoned there could escape and destroy Equestria!

speaker: Spike
text: *Destroy Equestria*?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah! Isn't it great? Hey, Cerberus! You look like you could use some obedience training! *Magic* obedience training!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Who's the cute widdle three-headed dog?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, I knew you were good with animals, but this is amazing!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Aww, he's just a big furry guy who got out of his yard, that's all. Right, Cerberus? Who's a good boy? Who's a good boy?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [stops screaming] Yes, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Do you have a ball I can borrow?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I have balls stashed all over Ponyville, in case of ball emergency.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sing-song voice] Hey, Cerberus! Look what I have!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'll be back as soon as I've returned him to the gates of Tartarus. Once he's back at home, there'll be no disaster.

speaker: Spike
text: [yawns] I wish Twilight would go on epic adventures more often. Best night's sleep I've had in weeks.

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, Twilight. How'd it go with Cerberus?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Great. I got him back before any of the evil creatures could escape.

speaker: Spike
text: Hurrh... hu– [belches]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [yelps] Oh no!

speaker: Spike
text: What's the big deal, it's just a 'lost dog' flyer. I guess the Princess hasn't heard we found Cerberus yet.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's not that, it's this!

speaker: Spike
text: A paper cut? Come on, Twilight, you really need to toughen up. Just clean it out and you'll be fine.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The cut's in the exact same spot as the scar on future Twilight's cheek! We haven't changed the future at all! The disaster is still coming!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If the disaster wasn't caused by Cerberus getting loose, then what could it possibly be?

speaker: Spike
text: [laughs] I dunno, but maybe you ought to give the pacing a rest. You've worn a groove into the floor!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't have time for another one of your lectures, Spike! This is serious!

speaker: Spike
text: *My* lectures?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I did everything I could think of to change the future. But it didn't work. So maybe it's not what I *do*... Maybe it's what I *don't* do!

speaker: Spike
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If I stand right here and don't move a muscle until next Tuesday, I can't possibly do whatever it is that future Twilight wanted to warn me not to do!

speaker: Spike
text: Really? So... no matter what happens, you're not gonna move a muscle, huh? Then maybe you won't mind if I... eat an entire tub of ice cream!

speaker: Spike
text: Mmm! [muffled] So good! [eating noisily]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [through gritted teeth] Spike, stop! Think of the stomach ache!

speaker: Spike
text: [chuckles] Stomach ache, huh? That's future Spike's problem.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, Twilight, another Pegasus just got back from Baltimare with an all-clear and– [laughs] What's going on? Aren't you gonna stop him?

speaker: Spike
text: She sure isn't! In fact, she's not gonna move 'til next Tuesday! She thinks it'll prevent the disaster from happening!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [laughs] Oh, this is too rich. [gasps] Hey, Twilight! There's a mouse right behind you!

speaker: Spike
text: Wait, wait, wait, let me try! Whoa-oa– [belches]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh no!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What happened?

speaker: Spike
text: I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to! It was a total accident!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Show me.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uhhh... I'm not so sure that's a–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Show me! Oh no! This is the same mane cut as future Twilight!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Y'know... it really doesn't look *too* bad...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't care how it looks! It's just another sign that the future hasn't changed! *Not* doing anything didn't work either! Oh, I wish there was a way to know what was going to happen so I could stop it!

speaker: Spike
text: You wanna see the future? I might know somepony who can help!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's this?

speaker: Spike
text: It's Madame Pinkie's place.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Madame Pinkie*?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [spookily] Come... Enter the chamber of Madame Pinkie Pie... For the answers you seek, let us consult the mystical orb of fate's destiny... [normal] Do you like my mystical orb of fate's destiny? I just got it. Cool, huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, uh... best one I've seen.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [spookily] Look deep into the crystal ball... for soon it will reveal all! Ah, yes, I see something... It is a vision of the future... I see... you, Twilight. You will get a really cool birthday present next year...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, and?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Are you sure?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yep. Cool birthday present.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, I need your Pinkie Sense to tell me what the impending disaster is that future Twilight was trying to warn me about!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, my fortunetelling has nothing to do with my Pinkie Sense, silly. It's only good for vague and immediate events.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Like that, see? Where did that even come from?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Lalalalalalala, lalalala... Gosh, I haven't seen Twilight since the flowerpot incident. Hope she still isn't mad. Uhhhh...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Off by point zero two from yesterday. Carry the fifteen... Negative azimuth on the fourteenth moon...

speaker: Spike
text: Hey Pinkie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight's really serious about finding out about that cool birthday present, isn't she?

speaker: Spike
text: Who cares? As long as I can keep eating ice cream. Sorry, future Spike.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [to Twilight] Are... you okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ah, Pinkie, I'm glad you're here. Can you help me recalibrate the apertures on the nine-and-quarter catadioptric telescopes?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Sure!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So I was thinking, after I came to see Madame Pinkie and the flowerpot landed on my head—see the bandage? Just like the bandage from the future...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nice!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I had an epiphany after that flowerpot. Doing things didn't work, *not* doing things didn't work, and I couldn't predict the future either, so I only had one other choice. Monitor *everything*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Makes sense to me!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That way no matter what happens in the future, I'll be ready! I thought I saw something last night in the Horsehead Nebula, but after staring at it for three straight hours I realized, I was wrong!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Three hours? But when did you sleep?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I didn't sleep. I haven't slept since future Twilight was here. There are only three days left until next Tuesday, I can sleep all I want after that!

speaker: Spike
text: You've been awake too long, Twilight.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah. Tuesday's not three days from now, Tuesday's *tomorrow*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasps] Pinkie, did you finish recalibrating the apertures on the nine-and-quarter-inch catadioptric telescopes?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I have no idea!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ah! My eye!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Don't worry, Twilight, I have eye patches stashed all over Ponyville, in case of eye patch emergency. There! Now you look like a pirate! A sleepy pirate, with a really weird mane cut.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The eye patch...! Another sign! Nearly all the signs have come true! I haven't done a thing to prevent the catastrophe! If Tuesday's tomorrow, and the disaster happens by Tuesday morning, then there's only one solution. I'll just have to... *stop time*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Okay, the Canterlot archives are right over there. Let's move!

speaker: Spike
text: Uhh... I don't think we need to sneak around, Twilight. It's not illegal to walk around Canterlot.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Guard! C'mon, you guys! [exhales] That was close.

speaker: Spike
text: I dunno why we have to wear*these* things, either.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aren't we wearing them for fun?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] No, there's nothing *fun* about this!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh... Are you sure?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Focus, guys! The only way to prevent this disaster is to stop time! Time spells are kept in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing, the most secure section of the archives. *That's* why we're sneaking around!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Awesome! That sounds fun!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] No, it's *not* fun!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aww.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I still don't understand how sneaking into the archives is gonna help her find out about her birthday present.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] The coast is clear. Now slowly lift me into the window so we can– AH!

speaker: Spike
text: [sighs] Let's get this over with.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Okay, if my calculations are correct, the Star Swirl the Bearded wing should be right... here.

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] What is it, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: Isn't this where we came in?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Cool! Can we climb in the window again? That was super fun!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't understand. It's supposed to be right here... How are we supposed to find it now?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Maybe we should ask somepony in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh. How'd I miss that? Look at all those priceless magic scrolls. There are more than I ever imagined!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight, the guard!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasps] What do we do, what do we do?!

speaker: Guard
text: Hey, Twilight, haven't seen you in a while. Let me open that for ya.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [chuckles nervously] Thanks!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no!

speaker: Spike
text: Oof!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Look! I look just like future Twilight... The last sign has come true!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And that's bad, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come on! It's almost Tuesday morning! The disaster could happen at any moment!

speaker: Spike
text: But how do we find the time-stopping spell? There must be a million scrolls here!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I. Don't. Know!

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, it's over! It's officially Tuesday morning.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nnngh, no! Tuesday morning, the disaster! *Incoming*!

speaker: Spike
text: I dunno, Twilight. I don't see any disasters. Looks like a pretty nice day.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Good morning, Twilight. Love the new hairstyle. Well, happy Tuesday!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why isn't anypony surprised to see me sneaking around in here?! Is it possible there never was a disaster? That I've just been making myself frantic over nothing?!

speaker: Spike
text: I don't get it. If future Twilight wasn't warning you about a disaster, then what was she trying to tell you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [giggles] I don't know. But I do know one thing. I look *ridiculous*.

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah, you do!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And it's all because I couldn't stop worrying and let the future handle itself! Well, not anymore. *From now on, I'm gonna solve problems as they come, and stop worrying about every little thing!*

speaker: Spike
text: That's great! Does that mean there won't be any more late night pacing?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No more late night pacing. If only I had learned this lesson a week ago, we wouldn't have had to go through all this.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight, Twilight, I found something! It doesn't stop time, but it lets you go back in time. It says you can go back once, and it only lasts for a few moments. Does that help?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, you're a genius!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Woo-hoo!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now I can go back and tell past Twilight that she doesn't need to go berserk with worry about a disaster that's never gonna come!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Twilight, you've got to listen to me!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Who are you? I mean, you're me, but I'm me too. How can there be two me's? It's not scientifically possible. *You* are not scientifically possible!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Twilight, please! I have a very important message for you from the future!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're from the *future*?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's right, now listen–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What happened to you? The future must be awful.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Please! I don't have much time!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is there some sort of epic pony war in the distant future or something?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Actually, I'm from next Tuesday morning, but that's not important right now!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I can't believe time travel is really possible! How did you, I mean, *I* figure it out?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The time spells are in the Canterlot archives. But that's not–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Really? Where? I've never seen them.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They're in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing. Now, you have to listen to–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is time travel fun, or does it hurt? I have so many questions– [muffled voice]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I have something extremely important to tell you about the future, and I only have a few seconds, so you've *got* to listen! Whatever you do, don't–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: –waste your time... worrying... about... Ugh! I can't believe I just did that!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Did you tell her about the cool birthday present?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Remember last week when future Twilight came to warn me about something? That was *me* trying to warn *myself* not to worry so much! Now I'm gonna spend the next week freaking out about a disaster that doesn't even exist! Ugh...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ah, don't worry about it. It's past Twilight's problem now.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [giggles] Huh, I guess you're right, Pinkie.

speaker: Spike
text: [stomach growls] Ohhh... my stomach... I, I think it's all that ice cream... I thought the stomach ache would be future Spike's problem... but now I *am* future Spike. Ohh...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Come on, future Spike. Let's get you home.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: C'mon, Fluttershy, it'll be fun!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: There's nothing fun about dragons! Scary, yes! Fun, no!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But Fluttershy, the great dragon migration happens only once in a generation! Do you really wanna pass up a chance like that?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Now that you put it that way, *yes*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aw, Fluttershy, we just don't want you to miss out.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Miss out on what? Dragons? Big, scaly, fire-breathing dragons?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well... yeah!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Thanks, but... no thanks!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Look, Fluttershy, I watched that boring butterfly migration with you, so now it's your turn to watch the dragon migration with me! You owe me!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I... said... *no*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeaagh! Ugh!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, I guess I'll let you off the hook this time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] I don't see any dragons.

speaker: Applejack
text: [hushed] Me neither.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Me neither neither.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Shoot! You don't think we missed them, do you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] No, I don't think so. We're just a little early, and I'm glad we are. This way, we can watch every moment of the migration without bringing any unwanted attention to ourselves!

speaker: Rarity
text: *Yoo-hoo*! Well?

speaker: Rarity
text: What do you think? Am I the toast of the trench or what?

speaker: Applejack
text: [hushed] You'll be toast alright, when the dragons see you parading around in that getup.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] You look very nice, Rarity, but could you maybe look nice down here in the trench with us?

speaker: Rarity
text: Nice is an understatement. I look *fabulous*! Who says camouflage has to be drab?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [hushed] Ahoy, maties! Dragons ho!

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: Oooh... Ahhhh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, amazing!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pfft, pretty lame move. Is that all they've got?

speaker: Applejack
text: [hushed] What do ya think of *that* 'move', Rainbow Dash? Still think they're lame?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [hushed] Uh, not so much. The word 'fierce' comes to mind.

speaker: Rarity
text: [hushed] And 'formidable'.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [hushed] And 'super-duper scary'!

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah. Us dragons are definitely a force to be reckoned with.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [laughs] Yeah, right, Spike. That's one of the *scariest* aprons I've ever seen!

speaker: Spike
text: What's wrong with wearing an apron? *You* won't be laughing when *you* spill blueberries all over *your* scales. Feathers. That's one tough stain!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: One *tough stain* against one *lame* dragon. [laughs]

speaker: Rarity
text: You leave him alone, Rainbow Dash! Spike's style is unique. He doesn't have to look like other dragons.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Or act like them.

speaker: Rarity
text: My little Spikey-wikey is perfect the way he is.

speaker: Spike
text: I don't act like other dragons?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, not even close!

speaker: Applejack
text: But why would you want to, Spike?

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes. You've got something those dreadfully fierce dragons can only dream of.

speaker: Spike
text: What's that?

speaker: Rarity
text: The cutest widdle chubby cheeks! Ooooo!

speaker: Spike
text: Cute?! Dragons aren't supposed to be cute! Right?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, sweetie, you are turning the most delightful shade of red. It is most becoming.

speaker: Spike
text: Rrrgh!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, isn't he adorable when he waddles off in anger?

speaker: Spike
text: *Waddle*?! Rrrrrggggh!

speaker: Spike
text: What am I? Where am I from? Who am I supposed to be?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uuugh! I don't know! For the last time, Spike, you were given to me as an egg. I don't know who found you or *where* they found you.

speaker: Spike
text: Seriously? That's all you know?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sorry, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: That doesn't tell me anything about who I am! I need answers! I feel like I'm... I'm looking at a complete stranger. Oh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, Spike. Why don't we do some late-night research? See what we can find out.

speaker: Spike
text: Really? You'd do that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course! I'm sure we can find something.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nothing. Nothing in this one either!

speaker: Spike
text: Nothing at *all* about dragons? This is getting ridiculous!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know! It's hard to believe, but ponies know next to nothing about dragons. Apparently they're too rare and too scary to try to talk to or study!

speaker: Spike
text: I wonder if dragons cry...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Aw, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: It's okay, Twilight. I'm gonna discover who I am if it's the last thing I do!

speaker: Rarity
text: Yoo-hoo!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, guys!

speaker: Spike
text: Waugh!

speaker: Rarity
text: Good morning!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ya wanna join us for breakfast?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That sounds great. I'm famished.

speaker: Spike
text: Count me out. I've gotta get an early start!

speaker: Rarity
text: An early start?

speaker: Spike
text: Yes! I'm going on a quest of self-discovery! I need to learn what it means to be a dragon! And the only way I'm gonna do that is to join the dragon migration!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: *What*?!?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Spike, that's nonsense talk! I know that you're a dragon, but *those* dragons mean business! They're big, and tough, and scary...

speaker: Spike
text: And I'm small, and meek... and I like to wear aprons. See? This is exactly why I need to spend time with them.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: All I'm saying is that you could get hurt.

speaker: Rarity
text: Darling, this time I really do have to agree with Rainbow Dash. I don't want those big, ugly, nasty dragons to hurt one little scale on your cutesy-wutesy head!

speaker: Spike
text: I'm sorry, but I've made up my mind.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, uh, quick, do something! Stop him before it's too late!

speaker: Spike
text: Ngh! Hey! Give it back!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hold it!

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aaagh!

speaker: Spike
text: *Really*?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't tell me you think he should go?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, Spike. I couldn't answer your questions. My books couldn't either. I understand why you want to look elsewhere. I truly believe you need to go on this quest. And we have no right to stop you.

speaker: Rarity
text: I suppose not.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I still say you're nutty, but hey, I've done *lots* of nutty things.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Spike
Rarity
text: We know.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [under her breath] Rrgh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well then, I guess this is goodbye, Spike. We can't wait to hear about it when you return.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, we hope your trip–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Quest.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: –your quest answers some of your pesky "Who am I?" questions.

speaker: Spike
text: Thanks, everypony. I know it will.

speaker: Rarity
text: Goodbye, Spikey-wikey!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Go get 'em, big guy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We have faith in you!

speaker: Rarity
text: [through her grin] We're following him, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [through her grin] Of course.

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh!

speaker: Spike
text: Nngh...

speaker: Spike
text: Alright, teenage dragons! Now that's more my speed. And size.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm telling you, we'll never pass for a real dragon!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, pish-posh! This costume is fabulous, one of my finer creations.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Shh! [hushed] We'll never pass if they hear *three* voices coming out of *one* dragon! Now come on, let's go!

speaker: Spike
text: Um, excuse me? Uh, hi. I'm Spike.

speaker: Fume
text: You sure your name is Spike and not *Shrimp*?!

speaker: Spike
text: No, it's Spike! I'm not, I mean, I'm sure about that...

speaker: Clump
text: You look more like *Peewee* to me.

speaker: Garble
text: Hey guys, c'mon, seriously. Leave him alone or he might fly away. That is, uh, if he had any wings! [laughs]

speaker: Clump
text: You fly in on your mommy's back during the migration?

speaker: Spike
text: Not exactly...

speaker: Fume
text: No, no, can't you see baby Spike just hatched? I bet he still sucks his claw at night!

speaker: Spike
text: No, I haven't sucked my claw in months!

speaker: Garble
text: Well, if you weren't just hatched, how come we haven't seen you around before?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, well, y'see, I live in Ponyville and–

speaker: Garble
text: Hahaha! Ponyville? That explains it! I knew there was something vaguely pony-ish about you! If I didn't know any better, I'd say you were part pony!

speaker: Spike
text: Who, me? I'm not part pony! I'm all dragon, see? Raar!

speaker: Garble
text: Or maybe you're a pony in a *dragon costume*.

speaker: Fume
text: A pony in a dragon costume...! [laughs]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [deep voice] Aheh... yeah... hilarious.

speaker: Spike
text: Nnh, I *am* a real dragon!

speaker: Garble
text: Oh, yeah? Prove it.

speaker: Spike
text: Well... how?

speaker: Garble
text: By acting like one! Who's up for a little belching contest?

speaker: Garble
text: You think you can beat that, Peewee?

speaker: Teenage dragons
text: Huh?

speaker: Garble
text: *From the desk of Princess Celestia. Dear Spike, please te–* Ha! Get this, guys! Spike's pen-pals with a namby-pamby pony princess!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasps] How can he just throw that away?! That letter could be something important!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We can't worry about that now, Twilight. We're here to help Spike!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know, I know!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There's no reason to disrespect Princess Celestia that way!

speaker: Garble
text: Maybe tail wrestling is more your speed.

speaker: Spike
text: Uh...

speaker: Teenage dragons
text: Yeah!

speaker: Garble
text: Ready... go!

speaker: Garble
text: The winner!

speaker: Spike
text: Good old tail wrestling...

speaker: Rarity
text: We can't let little Spikey-wikey wrestle one of them! He'll get clobbered!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Let's go! [deep voice] I challenge Spike to a tail wrestle!

speaker: Garble
text: Who's this weirdo?

speaker: Fume
text: I think he's Crackle's cousin.

speaker: Crackle
text: BWAAGH!

speaker: Garble
text: Oh, that would explain it. Ready? Go!

speaker: Garble
text: Spike's the winner!

speaker: Garble
text: Nice going, little Spike! Maybe you are a dragon after all!

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah! Maybe I am!

speaker: Rarity
text: Rainbow Dash, I can't believe your silly plan actually worked. Ow.

speaker: Spike
text: Alright, who's next?

speaker: Garble
text: Getting a little cocky, huh? I like that. So how about you wrestle... him! Go!

speaker: Spike
text: Whooooooooa!

speaker: Garble
text: So, Spike, you haven't exactly proven yourself as a dragon yet, have you?

speaker: Spike
text: But... I get an A for effort?

speaker: Garble
text: Huh, maybe. Let's see how you do in this next contest.

speaker: Spike
text: Whaaaaa! Oof! Wha! Oah! Oof!

speaker: Garble
text: *King of the hoard*!

speaker: Spike
text: This is my chance.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not so fast!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oof!

speaker: Garble
Clump
text: Whoa!

speaker: Spike
text: *King of the ho-* whoa! Oof! Uh! Nuh! Oof!

speaker: Garble
text: Looks like this is another fail for you, little Spike. Can't wait to watch you fail at lava cannonball, too.

speaker: Garble
text: Whoever makes the biggest lava splash is the ultimate dragon! *Geronimo*!

speaker: Spike
text: Nuh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Spike's on his own this time.

speaker: Clump
text: *Cannonball*!

speaker: Spike
text: Guh!

speaker: Garble
text: What's wrong, Spike? You afraid the lava will hurt your soft pony hide?

speaker: Teenage dragons
text: Oooh...

speaker: Spike
text: Ugh... Was I... that bad?

speaker: Garble
text: No, dude. That was awesome! No pony could live through a belly flop like that! [chuckles] You're one tough little dragon.

speaker: Garble
text: Spike, by belly flopping so hard, you have proven yourself worthy. I hereby dub you 'rookie dragon', and will now perform the initiation ritual. Rrrrgh. [chuckles] Now let's party *dragon style*!

speaker: Spike
text: Man, was that a great party.

speaker: Garble
text: Great? Huh, maybe by Ponyville standards. Stick with us, Spike. We still got plenty to teach you about being a dragon.

speaker: Spike
text: I'm not going anywhere. The way I feel right now, I could hang out with you guys forever.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: Forever?!

speaker: Rarity
text: Spikey-wikey is going to stay with these awful dragons? Forever?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh no, this is terrible!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I should've stopped him back at the library when I had the chance!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, Rainbow Dash, this is all *my* fault! I encouraged him to go!

speaker: Garble
text: Y'know, Spike, I think you just might be ready for a real dragon raid.

speaker: Garble
text: There's a nest full of phoenix eggs nearby, and we're gonna swipe 'em!

speaker: Clump
text: Aren't you totally psyched to go on this raid?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh yeah, I'm excited. I mean, I'm psyched.

speaker: Garble
text: Alright then. Let's fly!

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, sorry, guys! I guess I'll meet you back here at the crater! After the whole raid thing's over? We'll totally hang then! Whoahoa!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh no, they took Spike! We've gotta go after them!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [yelps] Rainbow Dash, stop! We can't fly!

speaker: Rarity
text: And you're ruining my fabulous costume!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm sorry, but we gotta help Spike!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, we're just gonna have to hoof it!

speaker: Garble
text: Alright, Spike. Since you're our rookie dragon, you get to lure the parents away from the nest.

speaker: Spike
text: Heh... Lucky me...

speaker: Garble
text: Well go on, then!

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, Mr. and Mrs. Phoenix! I was hoping I could have a word with you? Um, I'd, um, like to ask you some questions actually...

speaker: Garble
text: [hushed] We haven't got all day, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, you bird brains! Come and get me!

speaker: Garble
text: What the...

speaker: Fume
text: The eggs have hatched.

speaker: Clump
text: What do we do now?

speaker: Garble
text: We take the hatchlings, of course!

speaker: Garble
text: Get 'em!

speaker: Garble
text: Ohh... Get them!

speaker: Garble
text: [chuckles] Nnnghh...

speaker: Teenage dragons
text: Ugh!

speaker: Garble
text: Nnngh, they got away! I hate that!

speaker: Teenage dragons
text: Oof!

speaker: Spike
text: Huh, what have we got here? What happened?

speaker: Garble
text: They got away! Hey! *You* stole an egg?

speaker: Spike
text: Uh...

speaker: Garble
text: Well, I guess the raid wasn't a total waste after all.

speaker: Garble
text: Nice going, Spike.

speaker: Clump
text: Well, what are you waiting for, Spike? Smash it!

speaker: Spike
text: Smash the egg?

speaker: Clump
text: Yeah!

speaker: Fume
text: Yeah, throw it on the ground as hard as you can!

speaker: Teenage dragons
text: Yeah! Smash it! Smash it! Smash it! Smash it! Smash it!

speaker: Spike
text: No! It's just a defenseless egg, like I was! And I'm not gonna let you hurt it!

speaker: Garble
text: What did you say?

speaker: Spike
text: I said no.

speaker: Garble
text: No one says no to me. [growls]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nopony's gonna lay a claw on him!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's right!

speaker: Rarity
text: Fighting's not really my thing, I'm more into fashion, but *I'll rip you to pieces if you touch one scale on his cute little head!*

speaker: Garble
text: Ooh, scary, hehe! Spike, are these namby-pamby ponies your friends?

speaker: Spike
text: Yes, they are. And they're better friends than *you* could ever be. Now, if you don't back off, you'll see what us *ponies* do when confronted by a huge group of *jerky* dragons.

speaker: Garble
text: Oh, yeah? [snorts] What's that?

speaker: Spike
text: *Run away*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Nyuh!

speaker: Spike
text: Phew, that was a close one. Thanks, you guys.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course. What are friends for?

speaker: Spike
text: You're more than friends. You're my family.

speaker: Spike
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Spike
text: *Seeing the great dragon migration made me wonder what it meant to be a dragon. But now I realize that*who*I am is not the same as*what*I am. I may have been born a dragon, but Equestria and my pony friends have taught me how to be kind, loyal, and true! I'm proud to call Ponyville my home, and to have my pony friends as my family.*

speaker: Spike
text: *Yours truly,*

speaker: Spike
text: *Spike*

speaker: Spike
text: Aww. [chuckles] Hey, welcome to the family, Peewee! Stick with me. I've got plenty to teach you about being a pony.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Calling all Pegasus ponies! Meeting tonight!

speaker: Flitter
text: [reading] "Mandatory meeting for all Ponyville Pegasi."

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Library, tonight. Be cool or be mule. No offense.

speaker: Mule
text: None taken.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: All right, go on in, find a seat. Ohh... You too, Fluttershy. Come on, let's go.

speaker: Film announcer
text: Every living thing depends on the life-giving nourishment of rainwater, and it is up to Cloudsdale to provide rain-filled clouds to every corner of Equestria. But how, one pony might ask, does Cloudsdale gather all this extra water? Tornado power! That's right, Pegasi-driven tornado power. A team of Pegasi combine their wing power to create a jumbo tornado, powerful enough to pull water out of the local reservoir and funnel it all the way up to Cloudsdale. Remember, Pegasi, your jumbo tornado must reach a minimum of eight hundred wing power to lift that water up to Cloudsdale. So, the next time you're wondering "Where does all that extra rainwater come from?", just remem–

speaker: Spike
text: Uh... intermission?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So, here's the scoop. Cloudsdale has chosen our own highland reservoir as a source of the rainwater they need for all of Equestria. And you know what that means. It means it's up to Ponyville's Pegasi to bring that water up to Cloudsdale.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not only that, but Spitfire, captain of the Wonderbolts, will be here to oversee the water transfer and record our top tornado windspeed. Now last year, Fillydelphia broke the windspeed record with a top speed of nine hundred and ten wing power. But I think we can do better. I think we can get a top speed over a thousand!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: ...*if* each and every pony trains, and trains hard to get their wing power numbers up.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That coughing better be from a popcorn kernel, Thunderlane. Nopony's getting sick on my watch. So, are we gonna train hard?

speaker: Pegasi
text: Yeah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are we gonna be strong?

speaker: Pegasi
text: Yeah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are we gonna be fast?

speaker: Pegasi
text: Yeah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Record-smashing fast?

speaker: Bulk Biceps
text: YEAH!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who's with me?

speaker: Pegasi
text: Woo-hoo! [cheering]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Fluttershy!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Stretch those glutes, Flitter! Nice flexibility, Cloudchaser. A... little too much flexibility, Blossomforth. Uh, somepony give Blossomforth a hoof. Let's see some faster trotting, Thunderlane! Good pace, Silverspeed! [blows whistle] Keep it up! We're gonna need all the wing power we can get to break that record!

speaker: Bulk Biceps
text: YEAH! [snorts]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Good work, everypony! [under her breath] Everypony except Fluttershy.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [knocking] Fluttershy? I know you're in there! You're avoiding tornado duty and I want to know why! Fluttershy, open–

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Achoo. Hi, Rainbow Dash. [coughs weakly]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Fluttershy, what happened to you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I [sniffs] I think I have [coughs weakly] the pony pox. I'm sorry. I really, really wanted to come to training day today [coughs weakly], but this pony pox has really knocked me for a loop. Achoo. [coughs weakly]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, you poor thing. You know, there's only one cure for pony pox.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I know, plenty of bed–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Cold water! Those pony pox are clearing right up.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, y'know, all of a sudden, I'm, I'm starting to feel better. [laughs nervously] I'll just get out of these robes and– *ow*! Oh, my wing, oh, ow, it's hurt. I guess I can't fly after all–

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Messed up wing, huh? Stop horsing around, Fluttershy. We've got a lot of training to do. Come on now, what's going on?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, y'see, uh, well... Oh, Rainbow Dash, I just can't do it! I can't fly!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What are you talking about? Just last week you went into that wicked nose dive to save that falling baby bird right before it hit the ground!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But that was different, that was an emergency! This whole tornado thing, it's more like a performance, and you know how I hate performing in front of others. Don't you remember flight camp? I couldn't gallop hard or fly fast, not with everypony looking at me!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It wasn't *that* bad.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You're right, Rainbow Dash, it wasn't bad. It was *horrible*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [voiceover] The other foals used to tease me, *a lot*!

speaker: Foals
text: [chanting] Fluttershy, Fluttershy, Fluttershy can hardly fly! [repeats, begins echoing, then stops]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I just can't risk that sort of humiliation again.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
