text: Suck it up, Fluttershy! This is no time for– I mean, confidence or no confidence, I'm gonna need every Pegasus to break the record, including you. I need every ounce of wing power I can get.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I-I don't think so, Rainbow Dash...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] Thanks anyway.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Wait. I'll do it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You will?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I will.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You're game?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm game.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Alright!

speaker: Cloudchaser
text: What exactly does this machine do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is an anemometer. It measures your accelerative velocity and translates it into wing power, thus gauging your cumulative H2O anti-gravitational potential. Any other questions?

speaker: Flitter
text: Yeah. [to Spike] What exactly does this machine do?

speaker: Spike
text: It tells you how fast you're flying and how strong your wings are.

speaker: Pegasi
text: Ohhhh... Okay... I see...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is that you again, Thunderlane? Please, we need to have a germ-free environment.

speaker: Thunderlane
text: It wasn't me, it was Blossomforth.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't worry, Twilight. Thunderlane's just cooking up an excuse to spend tornado day in bed. Why don't you get over here and be our first test flyer, Thunderlane?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We have 9.3 wing power.

speaker: Pegasi
text: Wow! That's fast!

speaker: Bulk Biceps
text: YEAH!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not bad, not bad. [joints cracking] [revving sounds]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: 16.5 wing power!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Now listen up! If each of you can get your numbers up to at least 10.0 wing power by the end of the week, we'll no doubt set a new tornado speed record. We'll be number one!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Impressive. Fluttershy, your turn. [blows whistle]

speaker: Foals
text: [echoing] Fluttershy, Fluttershy, Fluttershy can hardly fly...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Tell her!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [hushed] No, you tell her!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] No, you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Um... great job, Fluttershy! You measured, uh, uh, .5.

speaker: Spike
text: .5? Isn't that like... less than one?

speaker: Spike
text: Ow!

speaker: Foals
text: [echoing] Fluttershy, Fluttershy, Fluttershy can hardly fly! [repeats] [demonic laughter]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Fluttershy, wait! So some punks poked a little fun at you and you got stage fright, big deal. You aren't gonna go quit just because of that, are you?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [crying] Yes!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But I need you!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash, I just [between sobs] don't have the courage right now...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sniffles] Oh, thank you, but I'm afraid a couple of little acorns won't solve my big flying problem.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I tried, but you should've seen those ponies laughing at me...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I know it's important to have confidence in myself...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Yes, yes, I *do* remember. The river was swelling...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: ...and you were scared...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: ...yes, I *did* tell you to never give up... and to believe in yourself. You're right, my friends. I shouldn't give up. I *will* get my confidence up and show everypony that I *am* a good flyer! A *great* flyer!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's wonderful, Flitter. Much better than yesterday.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: This is *crazy* awesome! We're gonna smash that record!

speaker: Spike
text: What did he say?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Do I *look* like I speak squirrel?

speaker: Spike
text: What's *that*?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: 2.3? 2.3?! That has to be some kind of mistake! I worked so hard!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy, that's a huge improvement!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You did awesome, Fluttershy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: No, I didn't. I thought I'd gotten over my nerves, but they *still* got the best of me! There's no way I'll fly with 10.0 wing power tomorrow!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So you won't fly with 10.0 wing power. Every bit counts!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: How would *you* feel if everypony else was flying with 10.0 wing power and *you* were flying with 2.5?

speaker: Spike
text: Actually, it was only 2.3, and– ow!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, uh... I'd feel... um...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Exactly! Humiliated! [between sobs] I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash, I just can't do it!

speaker: Spike
text: It's okay, Rainbow Dash, you've still got plenty of wing power for your tornado. You'll be able to lift tons of water up to Cloudsdale!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] If only there was a way to lift Fluttershy out of the dumps.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are we ready to do this?

speaker: Pegasi
text: Yeah! [cheering]

speaker: Spike
text: Look!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Lazy Thunderlane! Where is he?! He's been trying to get out of tornado duty the whole time with his fake coughing and all. Rumble, where's your lazy brother?

speaker: Rumble
text: He's got the feather flu. He's down at Ponyville Hospital.

speaker: Spike
text: But he's not the only one.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Let's see, with those eight sick Pegasi out with the feather flu... [gasp] Oh no!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Don't tell me we won't be able to break the windspeed record?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Phew!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...You might not have enough wing power to create a tornado powerful enough to lift the water to Cloudsdale!

speaker: Spike
text: Well, should we pack up?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: No. Of course not. Forget the record. Cloudsdale still needs water! Okay, everypony! Let's give it all we've got! On the sound of the horn, we take off!

speaker: Spike
text: You think they're gonna make it to eight hundred wing power?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I sure hope so! One hundred and fifty wing power. Two hundred and fifty wing power. Five hundred wing power!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Seven hundred and fifty wing power!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Twilight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy! What are you doing here?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I figured... if I couldn't help Rainbow Dash with the tornado... the least I could do was offer moral support!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She could sure use it, considering eight Pegasi are sick with the feather flu!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh no! That's terrible news!

speaker: Pegasi
text: Whoa! [etc.]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yaa– oof!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Are you okay?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [muffled] I'm fine!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, you were so close to the eight hundred wing power minimum! I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rbbbb– We've got to try again!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But you've pushed your crew to their limit already!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If you break apart again, somepony could get hurt! You should quit, it's not safe!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: No! One more time! I've gotta know we gave it our all! If I'm going down, I'm going down flying! C'mon, ponies, let's make this happen!

speaker: Bulk Biceps
text: YEAH!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, here we go... One hundred wing power! Two hundred! Five hundred!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Stay in position! Flap those wings! Faster!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Seven hundred! Seven hundred and fifty wing power!

speaker: Spike
text: [yelps] They fell apart right after this!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I'm too nervous to look!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: C'mon! Just a little harder! I can see the water trying to funnel through!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Seven ninety five! We are so close! Fluttershy, they need you up there!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I won't make a difference!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You *can* make a difference!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: My measly 2.3 wing power is still too little!

speaker: Spike
text: It's sticking at seven ninety five! I don't know if they've got any more in 'em!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Do it for Equestria! Do it for Rainbow Dash! Do it for yourself!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's moving! She's doing it! Seven ninety eight! She surpassed her best wing power number!

speaker: Foals
text: [echoing] Fluttershy, Fluttershy, Fluttershy can hardly fly! [laughs]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *No!*

speaker: Serenity
text: What was that?

speaker: Slipstream
text: I think it was Fluttershy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She did it! She did it! They all did it!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa, girl, take it easy!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Whuh, what? Did we do it?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, we did it! *You* did it!

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
text: Ah!

speaker: Flitter
text: Great job, Fluttershy, that was awesome!

speaker: Cloudchaser
text: Yeah, we couldn't have done it without you.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Nice job, Rainbow Dash. You may not have set a new record, but you showed a lot of guts.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Thanks, but if you wanna talk guts, then you've gotta give it to my number one flyer, Fluttershy! Let's hear it for Fluttershy!

speaker: Pegasi
text: [chanting] Fluttershy! Fluttershy! Fluttershy can really fly! [cheering]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Sometimes you can feel like what you have to offer is too little to make a difference, but today, I learned that everypony's contribution is important, no matter how small. If you just keep your head high, do your best, and believe in yourself, anything can happen.*

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Can you believe Featherweight got his cutie mark? *Featherweight*! Before *us*!

speaker: Snips
text: Great cutie mark, Featherweight!

speaker: Snails
text: [chuckles] Looking good!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I give up...

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: I've got it! The answer to all our problems!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: The Foal Free Press? How's the school paper gonna get us our cutie marks?

speaker: Granny Smith
text: Move your caboose!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Uh-oh. That's Granny Smith. Gotta run!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Maybe there's something to this newspaper idea.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Guess it's worth a shot...

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Apple Bloom. Your newspaper idea was nothing but a big bust.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: We tried everything, from papier-mâché to making birds' nests, and nothing worked.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: What's so funny?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: What I meant was, we should *write* for the paper! We can get our cutie marks as journalists!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Okay, class, see you tomorrow! Oh, for those of you who want to join the newspaper staff, stay here, because we're meeting right now!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Cutie marks in journalism!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Such a good idea.

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Welcome, everypony. Now, as you know, our editor-in-chief graduated last year–

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, oh, oh, ohohohoh!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Yes?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: What's an editor-in-chief?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Good question, Sweetie Belle. I like those reporters' instincts. The Foal Free Press is a student-run paper. I'm only involved as an adviser, so the editor-in-chief is the pony in charge, from choosing the stories to making sure it gets to press on time. Now, as I said, we have a new editor this year!

speaker: Students
text: Diamond Tiara?!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Hm.

speaker: Cheerilee
text: I'll leave you alone now to discuss everypony's assignments. Have fun!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Alright, listen up. The Foal Free Press is a *joke*.

speaker: Students
text: Huh?

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Nopony at this school takes it seriously. Well I, the editor-in-chief in charge, am going to deliver us to newfound glory!

speaker: Truffle
text: Yay!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: First things first. Where's the staff photographer? Get out there and document *everything*. *I'll* decide what's important.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: The rest of you, I want hard-hitting news and interesting think pieces. No more Namby-Pamby stories like last year's editor.

speaker: Ruby Pinch
text: But Namby-Pamby was a great editor.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Well, there's a new regime now, and I want juicy stories. The juicier, the better! Now get out there and report!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Let's get out of here, girls. Maybe we can try packing boxes again.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But this could be our last chance to earn our cutie marks! If we really are supposed to be journalists, isn't it worth a little grief?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: I guess you're right. We can take a little bit of Diamond Tiara for a lifetime of cutie marks.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: C'mon! Let's go get these marks!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [voiceover] My first story's going to be an exclusive interview.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [voiceover] I saw a brand new nest of baby birds the other day. I bet our readers would eat up a sweet story like that!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [voiceover] Granny Smith has all sorts of great stories! I reckon I'll do a piece on the history of Ponyville.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: I hope you've got something, because everything so far is unusable. "*Baby Birds Born*"? "*Rarity's Hot New Hat*"? "*Ponyville: The Early Years*"!? *Oh*! I don't know what you call this, but it sure isn't news!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We just... thought...

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Get something else on my desk by the end of the day, and it better be *juicy*!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Now what? Do you know what I had to do to get that story?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Oh, you don't even wanna know what I had to sit through.

speaker: Snips
text: Oh! Get it off me, Snails!

speaker: Snails
text: Eh, you get it off *me*, Snips?

speaker: Snips
text: Aah! Stop it! You are making it worse! *Nah*! Oh, great.

speaker: Snails
text: I'll get it. [grunt]

speaker: Snips
text: Aah!

speaker: Snails
text: Get it off! *Get it off*!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [giggles] Hey, Featherweight, c'mere! [giggles] Take a few pictures of this, then meet me during lunch. Girls, I have our story.

speaker: Noi
text: "*Snips and Snails in Bubblegum Veils!* And that's when the biggest jokester in school really stuck his hoof in it – literally!"

speaker: Green Daze
text: The Foal Free Press is usually just boring news and stuff.

speaker: Cotton Cloudy
text: So funny!

speaker: Snips
text: Our mothers always told us we'd end up in the papers someday.

speaker: Snails
text: Yeah, and look! We finally got the gum out! [laughs]

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Your column is a sensation! I don't want you doing news anymore. I want more columns like *this*. Columns about ponies and their private lives, the things they do when they think they're alone. You three are my new gossip columnists! And I *love* the way you signed it! "Gabby Gums"... [sigh] That was a stroke of genius!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We couldn't fit all of our names, so we decided to create one for all three of us.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Well, I want *more* Gabby Gums! Nice work, girls.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: But we sure seem to have a gift for gossip.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: If we can write a few more of these Gabby Gums columns, we'll earn our cutie marks for sure!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Woo-hoo!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Scootaloo? Do you have *anything*?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Nope.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Apple Bloom?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [sighs] Sorry.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Let's face it, nothing very juicy happens at this school.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We're doomed.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ohh, Sweetie Belle... Was she raised in a barn or something? [gasps] Oh, you really shouldn't be snooping, Rarity... Oh, but it's so much fun, Rarity. Hello... what's this? [giggles] Gum on their bum! [laughs] Too rich!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Can you please keep it down with all the laughter? I'm trying to– hey!

speaker: Rarity
text: Bleh! I, I was just–

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Are you snooping through my saddlebag?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: How dare you!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, but this Gabby Gums column is so funny!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You actually *like* the school paper?

speaker: Rarity
text: It's so much juicier than anything in the boring old Ponyville Express. Could I borrow this to show my friends?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Your friends would wanna read the Foal Free Press?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, they'd just *love* Gabby Gums! Who is she, anyway? I've never heard of her before. Is she a new–

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We gave up too quickly, girls. Forget trying to squeeze stories out of this school. We need to expand!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: We can find all kinds of great gossip out there in Ponyville!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We'll need to tell Featherweight to start working overtime.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Sweetie Belle, you're a genius!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: "*Pound and Pumpkin Cake Trip to the Store Ends in Tears.*" Gabby Gums comes through again!

speaker: Truffle
text: [panting] The Ponyville news stand wants to carry the Foal Free Press! Ponies keep coming by and asking for it!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Send 'em twenty copies, and if they run out of those, we'll send 'em twenty more! You three are doing a great job for this paper. Keep those columns coming!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: This is great!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, this is the life, isn't it, girls? The best hooficure I've ever had!

speaker: Applejack
text: [voice vibrating] You said it, ooh...

speaker: Spike
text: [sighs] I don't know if I've ever been so relaxed.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You guys!

speaker: Spike
text: Aaah!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: The new Gabby Gums just came out! "*The Great and Powerful Trixie's Secrets Revealed!*"

speaker: Rarity
text: We already read that one, Rainbow Dash. Come on, relax, have a hooficure, it feels amazing.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [swallows] Did you forget who you're talking to? The day I get a hooficure is the day I turn in my daredevil license. Besides, *I* haven't read this Gabby Gums yet.

speaker: Spike
text: Well, do it quietly, will ya? [sigh] Some of us are trying to unwind!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I like Gabby Gums too, but don't you think she can be a little mean?

speaker: Applejack
text: She's not mean, Twilight, she's a hoot!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "*Celestia Just Like Us*"? Gabby Gums doesn't value anypony's privacy.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, lighten up, Twilight, there's nothing but harmless gossip!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah, Twilight, I mean listen to this one. "*Mayor Not Naturally Gray!*" The *Mayor* in a mane dyeing scandal? Who wouldn't wanna read that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I just can't help feeling sorry for the ponies featured in her columns. It's gotta be a little embarrassing.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are you kidding? Do you know how *awesome* it is to get your name in the paper?

speaker: Rarity
text: Rainbow, why don't you join me in one of these delicious hooficures?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It's that good, huh? Well, maybe just one little hoof.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [yelps] Forget it, I don't like ponies touching my hooves. Man... I'd love it if Gabby Gums did a story on me.

speaker: Spike
text: She did one on me.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: *What?!*

speaker: Spike
text: Aaaah!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: "Exclusive! *Local Dragon Tells All!* Spike opens up about Canterlot, naps, and his favorite jams!"

speaker: Scootaloo
text: It's our best column yet!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: More like your *worst* column yet! Gabby Gums didn't become the biggest thing in Ponyville with namby-pamby stories like this!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: [sighs] Yeah, she's right. This column is a little softer than our usual gossip.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Were you guys feeling guilty about all the gossip too? Like... maybe we could be hurting other ponies' feelings?

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Yeah, I didn't wanna say anything because everypony loves Gabby Gums so much, but... I was sorta hoping we could start writing more stories like this one.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Me too.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: If we're gonna get our cutie marks, we've got to give the ponies what they want.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Awww...

speaker: Applejack
text: "*Applejack Asleep on the Job!*" Can y'all believe this?! And this one: "*Big McIntosh – What's He Hiding?*" Who the hay does this Gabby Gums think she is?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Listen to this one. "*Twilight Sparkle: I Was a Canterlot Snob.* A well-placed scaly source close to the prissy pony says Twilight Sparkle thinks Ponyville is nothing but muddy roads and low-class rubes." Spike!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How could you say such a thing?

speaker: Spike
text: Well, I didn't! Gabby Gums made that up! I never said anything like that!

speaker: Rarity
text: Everypony, please! She's just a harmless schoolpony engaged in a little harmless gossip. You're really making too big a deal out of this.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But it's *all* lies! Gabby Gums prints whatever she wants! She doesn't care whose reputation she destroys! "*Fluttershy Has Tail Extensions!*" "*Pinkie Pie is an Out-of-Control Party Animal!*"

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *What?!* It's true! I *do* have a problem! [crying]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, look! According to *this* one, the Cakes are breaking up!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: We are?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [muffled] Well, my life is officially *over*. Gabby Gums has made it to Cloudsdale.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "*Rainbow Dash: Speed Demon or Super Softie?*"?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I grabbed as many copies as I could, but it was too late! [crying] I'm a laughing stock!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See, Rarity? Your so-called 'harmless gossip' can be very hurtful!

speaker: Rarity
text: Honestly, you ponies have no sense of humor. So she tweaks a few ponies every now and then, maybe they deser– [gasps] *I'll destroy her!* "*The Drama-Queen Diaries*"... She's reprinted my diary! How could Gabby Gums possibly get access to my private diary?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We've got to put a stop to this once and for all! Sweetie Belle's on the newspaper staff. Maybe she knows who Gabby Gums is.

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] My sister would never associate with anyone as beastly as Gabby Gums! I resent you even suggesting such a thing, Twilight! Why, she's the most innocent, most lovely–

speaker: Rarity
text: –*most evil pony in Equestria!* How could my own sister steal my private diary? How could my own sister be... Gabby Gums?

speaker: Rarity
text: *Et tu, Gabby Gums*?!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: [gasps] You know?! How'd you find out?!

speaker: Rarity
text: The gilded pages of your betrayal!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, yeah.

speaker: Rarity
text: How could you do this to me?! You stole my secret diary and published it for all the world to read! Gossip can be a very hurtful thing. It is an invasion of privacy, just like when I snooped through your saddlebag. You didn't like that much, did you?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: No...

speaker: Rarity
text: What is important is that you understand how your column makes the ponies that you're writing about feel!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I *do* understand, and we've all been feeling guilty, but we just want our cutie marks so badly!

speaker: Rarity
text: Do you really think that writing nasty things and making everypony feel horrible is your destiny?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Well, when you put it that way...

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: *No*! I *won't* let you quit!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: But the gossip we've been printing is hurting everypony's feelings!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: *Feelings*?! I don't care about *feelings*! Gabby Gums is my bread and butter, and I'm not gonna let you goody-two-horseshoes take that away from me!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We're sorry, Diamond Tiara, but we've made our decision.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Yeah, you can't force us to keep gossiping.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: When you see these... you may not want to quit after all.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: I told Featherweight to document *everything*...

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: ...And that's exactly what he did.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [gasps] Gimme those!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Sorry, girls, property of the Foal Free Press. And if Gabby Gums really does go into retirement, I'll need something to fill that empty column space. Now get out there and *bring me more Gabby Gums*!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We'll find a way out of this, girls.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Maybe Rainbow Dash will have a story for us. She's always good for some gossip.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Rainbow Dash! Hey, Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, if it isn't *Gabby Gums*!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: You heard too, huh?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are you kidding? Everypony in town knows it's you three.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Don't suppose you'd let us write a column on you, huh?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Oh, hi, Angel. Is Fluttershy home?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [muffled] Hey, what gives?

speaker: Spike
text: A-ha! [muffled] Twilight thought you might try to show your faces around here, so she put up a force field.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: Aw, c'mon, Applejack! You're not mad at us too, are you?

speaker: Applejack
text: Eeyup.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: You're not even gonna talk to us?

speaker: Applejack
text: Nnope.

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: You should be ashamed of yourself, humiliatin' your sister 'n' me like that. We don't wanna talk to any o' y'all right now so take your little gossip column and your embarrassing photographs and just *go away*!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We've ruined all of our friendships and we *still* don't have our cutie marks!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: This is the worst day ever!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Oh yeah? Wait 'til tomorrow, our most embarrassing moments are about to be published for everypony to laugh at.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: So what do we do?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: I don't know, but we're not leaving this clubhouse until we think of something!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: That's it, Gabby Gums is out of time. Run these instead. I want this paper on every street corner in Ponyville!

speaker: Shady Daze
text: Yes, ma'am!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: *Stop the presses!*

speaker: Shady Daze
text: Uh... they haven't started yet.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: We have a Gabby Gums column!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Hmph, you're lucky I'm nice.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: This better not happen again, or else.

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: [sighs] Well done, Diamond Tiara. You've averted yet another crisis with your amazing diplomatic skills. [gasps] "*An Open Letter to Ponyville by Gabby Gums*"?! What is this?! Ooh, they're not gonna get away with this! I'll publish those photos tomorrow! They messed with the wrong pony!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: *To the citizens of Ponyville,*

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: *For some time now, you've been reading this column to get the latest dirt and the hottest buzz. But this will be my final piece. We want to apologize for the pain and embarrassment we've caused.*

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: *Y'see, I'm actually*three*little fillies, Sweetie Belle, Apple Bloom, and Scootaloo.*

speaker: Scootaloo
text: *As the popularity of our column grew, we got swept up in the hype. We knew that what we were doing didn't feel quite right, but we ignored the guilt because everypony seemed to want to read what we were writing.*

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: *From now on, we promise to respect everypony else's privacy, and we won't engage in hurtful gossip any more.*

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: *All we can do is ask for your forgiveness, Ponyville.*

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: *Signing off for the very last time,*

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: *XOXO, Gabby Gums*

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Well, staff, I guess I gave a little too much authority to a first-time editor. I'm sorry, Diamond Tiara, I have to strip you of your title. [thunk]

speaker: Cheerilee
text: And for the next editor of the Foal Free Press...

speaker: Cheerilee
text: ...here's your new editor-in-chief, Featherweight!

speaker: Diamond Tiara
text: Ugh! Him? But what about *me*?!

speaker: Shady Daze
text: Here ya go! I've been promoted to staff photographer!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness. You've *really* outdone yourselves, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. This is sure to be the winning entry of this year's national dessert competition!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Oh, thank you, Pinkie!

speaker: Mr Cake
text: And thanks for transporting it all the way to Canterlot for us.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Absolutely! It's my honor and I–

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, beg pardon, but could we maybe move things along? This here cake's a mite heavy. Right, Big McIntosh?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: [grunts] Eeyup...!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Alrighty then, Big Mac! To the train depot! That's it, Big Mac, nice and slow. This is precious cargo you're carrying.

speaker: Mr Cake
text: Yes, it took months of planning and testing.

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: I would hate for it to–

speaker: Mr Cake
Mrs Cake
text: Fall!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Don't worry, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, a little pegassistance? I'll get it there safely, you'll see!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Ahahah, oh... of course, Pinkie.

speaker: Mr Cake
text: We never doubted you.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight, can I see you a second? A nice protective spell as extra insurance. [laughs] Better safe than sorry. AJ, Rarity, one last thing? All right, everypony, we're in the home stretch here.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: See, Mr. and Mrs. Cake? I got it here without a hitch! Now all we have to do is get it... in?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sigh] Thank you all for helping me get the cake safely on the dessert car.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank *you* for inviting us all to go with you to Canterlot for the National Dessert Competition.

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm sure the festivities will be just lovely.

speaker: Applejack
text: Phooey on the festivities! I can't wait to try all those tasty treats!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, the tastiest treat of all is sure to be the Cakes' Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness. All that rich *creamy* goodness of the marzipan, combined with the tart tanginess of the mascarpone, blended perfectly with the smooth, silky sweetness of the meringue. That's why I call the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness the "MMMM".

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: MMMM.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Exactly. It's the *most* delicious delectable delightful de-lovely cake in Equestria, and it's sure to win first prize.

speaker: Gustave le Grand
text: Zis is not so, for I, Gustave le Grand, do challenge your *crude* cake to a duel of delectable delicacies against *my* exceptionally Exquisite Éclairs! They will undoubtedly strike down all ze competition, winning first prize and crowning me *le champion*.

speaker: Donut Joe
text: Not a chance, le Grand.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Donut Joe! What are you doing in Ponyville?

speaker: Donut Joe
text: Picking up the final all-important ingredient for my contest entry, Donutopia! And with these super-sprinkles, my donuts are going to dunk all the other lousy desserts, steal first prize, and make my donut shop famous *forever!* [laughs]

speaker: Mulia Mild
text: Oh, Joe... [laughs] Your dippy donuts could never out-rival *me*. [laughs]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hello. What's your name?

speaker: Mulia Mild
text: I am Mulia Mild. Behold, my Chocolate Mousse Moose. It will trample all your treats, be given first prize, and make me the greatest chef in Equestria.

speaker: Gustave le Grand
text: Madame Mild, you and your mousse moose are mistaken.

speaker: Donut Joe
text: Your frou-frou éclairs will never defeat my donuts!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: The Cakes' Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness is going to win!

speaker: Mulia Mild
text: Your simple cake could never take my moose. [gasp]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, it sure looks like we're in for a delicious competition tomorrow. Maybe we should all settle in for a good night's sleep.

speaker: Donut Joe
text: Hmph.

speaker: Mulia Mild
text: Nyahh.

speaker: Gustave le Grand
text: Huh! [mumbles]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [yawns] I gotta admit I'm pretty beat.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah, I'm gonna hit the hay myself.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wait! Didn't you hear those chefs? We have to protect "MMMM".

speaker: Rarity
text: MMMM?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm-hmmm. I know for super sure that "MMMM" is the best dessert in all of Equestria, and I know that they know it too.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So... one of them is going to sabotage the Cakes' cake tonight! You have to help me stand guard!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie... you're overreacting.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah, those chefs aren't going to do your cake any harm.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But they are! I just know it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Fine! If you want to stand guard, go for it. *We're* going to bed.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'll show them. I'll stay up all night and protect you. Nothing and nopony will stop me from keeping you safe.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh? Stop, you saboteur! I have you now! Wha? A-ha! Ahh?! Oh! Thank Celestia you're okay! But one of those bakers is mixing up something bad, so I'm not leaving you again no matter what.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh? Who turned out the moon? Don't go near that cake, thief!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Stop, thief!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, are you okay, thief? [growls] Huh... Overreacting, my hoof. I knew I was going to have to keep a close eye on you, and that's just what I'm gonna do. [snores]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [snores] Huh? What? [gasp] The cake! Oh, MMMM, you look mmmm-marvelous.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Whoa!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I *know*. I think some congratulations are in order for a job well done.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, you better hold off on giving yourself an award just yet, Pinkie. Look.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Look at what? Huh? [gasp]

speaker: Applejack
text: What is it?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What happened?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It's the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness, it's been [crying] mutilated!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Now we just need to find out who done it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You mean, who *did* it.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Exactly. Who did-done-dood it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, having read many mystery novels, I know that the only way to discover the culprit is to investigate.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Exactly.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And as chief detective, that's exactly what I'm gonna do.

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, *you're* investigatin'?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes! And Twilight shall be my lowly assistant who asks silly questions with obvious answers.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fine, Pinkie. Should we start looking for clues?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Perfect silly question, my dear Twilight. Because the obvious answer is...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No! 'Cause I know who did it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, how could you possibly know?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: How could I possibly *not* know? Clearly this dastardly deed was done by the baker, who knew their dessert could not measure up to the mastery of the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness. I guess you feared your éclairs lacked flair, Gustave!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Thus, destroying the cake and the Cakes' chance of winning the National Dessert Competition.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But it makes no sense!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What do you mean, lowly assistant?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, first, if you were tied to the train tracks, how are you now here?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh... Guess that isn't a totally silly question.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And second, the cake hasn't been sliced. It's been bitten. Just look at the teeth marks!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hm... You're right, my fine fellow. Gustave le Grand is clearly in the clear, which means the "MMMM" was destroyed by another baker. A baker who's donuts are do-nots. That's right, it was Joe!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [voiceover] Or as he's known the spy world, Mane. Con Mane.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Crushing the Cakes' chances to win!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie! There is no laser beam security system! And Joe is not sleek, stealthy Con Mane! He's big, gruff, and messy!

speaker: Donut Joe
text: Hey!

speaker: Rarity
text: Although, you would look rather dapper in a tuxedo.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh... You may be right, lowly assistant.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *May* be?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Now that I'm taking a closer look at these desserts, I see that *one* simply cannot look me in the eye.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie... that moose is a mousse!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes, and the mule behind the moose panicked when she saw the mastery of the "MMMM".

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So you're saying that the culprit is...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mulia Mild!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Putting an end to the Cakes' dreams of taking first prize. Huh, I hope you're proud of yourself, *Mulia*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, stop! This is ridiculous! Look at her!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sigh] I guess you're right...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank you!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: But I was so sure that it was one of the other bitter bakers that destroyed the "MMMM". That way, their delicious dessert would reign supreme. I mean, just look at Joe's Donutopia. It's a spectacular city of donutty delight, topped temptingly in sprinklicious sprinkles. And Gustave's éclairs look incredibly edible, with glistening glaziness. But then there's Mulia Mild's Mousse Moose. [sighs] why, this mouth-wateringly marvelous mousse moose tempts the taste buds with its silky, smooth, yummy-nummy, chocolateyness. So why did this criminal devour the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness while leaving this trio of tasty treats untouched?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] Now I have *no* idea who do-doned it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: This mystery gets more mysterious every minute.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, you have to stop the wild accusations and get to the truth. Everypony go back to your cars while we do a little investigating. Okay, Pinkie, in order to *really* solve this mystery, we're going to have to find clues. Now you were here at the scene of the crime all night.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Huh! You're not accusing *me*, are you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No! But maybe you *saw* something that will help us.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I saw a silhouette in the moonlight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Good... Let's retrace your steps.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And then I chased the culprit down the train towards the caboose, but when I got there, he was gone.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hm... A-ha! Our first clue. I think I know who did it, Pinkie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Already?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, but I need more evidence to confirm. Tell me what happened next.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I heard somepony else in the dessert car and chased them up to the engine. But when I got there, all I saw was the conductor shoveling coal.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The conductor, huh? [gasp] But that doesn't make any sense. What happened next, Pinkie?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well... I went back to the dessert car.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: The curtains mysteriously closed, all on their own.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Interesting. Anything else?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I heard hoofsteps, a loud thud...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: ...and then they were gone! When I opened the curtains, I saw that the portrait by the door was all crooked.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh my, what is that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What next Pinkie?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's it. I was here guarding the cake the rest of the night. I mean... I slept by the cake the rest of the night.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And when you woke up, half the cake was gone?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Exactly.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: By Jove, I think I've got it. Call everypony back. We have a cake culprit to catch.

speaker: Mulia Mild
text: [stuttering] Why are we all here again?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I bet you're wondering why you're all here again.

speaker: Donut Joe
text: She's good.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We have discovered the true culprit of this cake carnage.

speaker: Gustave le Grand
text: But how?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, you see, when committing a crime, it's crucial that one never leaves behind clues, especially an obvious clue like... *this*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: A-ha! A blue feather! I knew it was you, Gustave le Grand!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, Gustave doesn't have blue feathers.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, 'cause he's been dyeing them!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, Pinkie. Remember how when you chased the suspect to the caboose, they suddenly disappeared? That's because they *flew away*. But the thief *did* leave a little something behind, didn't you, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I-I don't even like cake!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So Rainbow Dash did it! Case solved!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Case not solved, because when we went to the engine, I saw the conductor's hat. And inside the hat was... *this*.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So it *was* you! That pink hair came from your rainbow-colored mane!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I don't have *pink* in my mane, *Pinkie*!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So you're wearing a wig?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ow! Cut it out!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie, remember? You chased a pony to the engine, where you thought you saw the conductor shoveling coal, but that wasn't the conductor at all. It was... Fluttershy!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] Oh my.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You're goin' down, Fluttershy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie! But then another clue confounded my suspicions. You were guarding the cake when the curtains mysteriously closed. But that's no mystery, that's magic. But when the thief tried to make their great escape, they left a little addition to the portrait. Has anypony else noticed that Rarity is wearing her hair rather differently today?

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasp] What? Is it a crime to change one's style now and again? Why, I think it's a crime not to.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Really?*

speaker: Rarity
text: Fine, I'm guilty! [crying] I wear false eyelashes! Oh, and I took a bite of the cake.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So did I.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aw nuts, so did I.

speaker: Rarity
text: You just made it sound so delectable.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So tasty.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And boy was it!

speaker: Rarity
text: I only meant to take a little, lady-like bite.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And it was so good.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, I just dove right in!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But I'm really really sorry.

speaker: Rarity
text: Terribly sorry.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sorry, Pinkie.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's okay. At least this mystery is finally solved.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But it isn't. We figured out who ate the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness, but we still don't know who devoured the other bakers' goods.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You're right, Twilight. You know what we have to do?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well... Yes, I do. Do you?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Look for clues! [sniffing] Uh-huh, uh-huh, uh-huh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, Pinkie. Did you find the devourer of the desserts?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I most certainly did. It was none other than... the bakers!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: First of all, Gustave has mousse in his moustache! And Joe has éclair in his hair! And Mulia has sprinkles in her wrinkles!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What do you say, bakers?

speaker: Gustave le Grand
text: Oh, I am so sorry, Mulia, but Pinkie made your mousse moose sound... *très magnifique*.

speaker: Donut Joe
text: And Pinkie's description of your éclairs really did make 'em sound scrumptious.

speaker: Mulia Mild
text: And the way she spoke of your Donutopia, ohh, was too delectable to resist.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, everypony, we finally have the mystery solved.

speaker: Gustave le Grand
text: Yes, but now we don't have any desserts to enter into ze contest!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I think we can fix that. Come on!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Dear Princess Celestia,*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Today I learned that it is not good to jump to conclusions. You have to find out all the facts before saying somepony did something. If you don't, you could end up blaming somepony for something they never did. This could hurt their feelings, and it can make you look really foolish. So from now on, I will always make sure to get all the facts.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: How's that for a lesson, Princess Celestia?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Care for a bite?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I don't mind if I do.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmmmm.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ahh!

speaker: Rarity
text: It is *gorgeous* out. Just gorgeous!

speaker: Spike
text: Twi... light! ...I... have... Lemme just... [deep breath] [belch]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Dear Twilight, I am sure you are as excited as I am about the upcoming wedding in Canterlot.* [to the others] Wedding? [reading] *I will be presiding over the ceremony, but would very much like you and your friends to help with the preparations for this wonderful occasion. Fluttershy, I would like you and your songbird choir to provide the music.*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh my goodness! What an honor!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Pinkie Pie, I can think of no one more qualified than you to host the reception.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hip, hip, hooray!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Applejack, you will be in charge of the catering for the reception.*

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, color me pleased as punch!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Rainbow Dash–*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *...I would very much appreciate it if you could perform a sonic rainboom as the bride and groom complete their "I do"'s.*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Yes*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Rarity, you will be responsible for designing the dresses for the bride and her bridesmaids.*

speaker: Rarity
text: Princess Celestia wants me to– [unintelligible] ...wedding dress? For a Canterlot wedding... I, ah, ooh, oooh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *And as for you, Twilight, you will be playing the most important role of all: Making sure that everything goes as planned. See you all very soon. Yours, Princess Celestia.* But... I don't understand. Who's getting married?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, wait! Uh, I was probably supposed to give you this one first.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Princess Celestia cordially invites you to the wedding of Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and...* [gasp] My brother?!

speaker: Applejack
text: Your brother's getting married? Congratulations, Twilight! That's great news!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, *great* news. That I just got from a *wedding invitation*! Not from my brother, but from a piece of paper! Thanks a lot, Shining Armor. I mean, really, he couldn't tell me personally? [as Shining Armor] Hey, Twilight, just thought you should know I'm making a really big decision that changes everything. Oh, never mind, you'll hear about it when you get the invitation. [normal] Princess *Mi Amore Cadenza*? Who in the hoof is that?! [snort]

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, Twilight? Are you okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sorry, it's just that Shining Armor and I have always been so close. He's my B.B.B.F.F!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Big Brother Best Friend Forever?

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Ohhh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
When I was just a filly, I found it rather silly
To see how many other ponies I could meet
I had my books to read, didn't know that I would ever need
Other ponies to make my life complete

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
But there was one colt that I cared for
I knew he would be there for me

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
My big brother, best friend forever!
Like two peas in a pod, we did everything together

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
He taught me how to fly a kite (Best friend forever!)
We never had a single fight (We did everything together!)
We shared our hopes, we shared our dreams
I miss him more than I realized
It seems...

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Rarity
text:
Your big brother, best friend forever
Like two peas in a pod, you did everything together

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
And though he's, oh, so far away
I hoped that he would stay
My big brother best friend
Forever...
Forever...

speaker: Applejack
text: As one of your P.F.F.'s...

speaker: Applejack
text: Pony Friends Forever...

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Ohhh!

speaker: Applejack
text: ...I wanna tell you that I think your brother sounds like a real good guy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: He is pretty special. I mean, they don't let just anypony be captain of the Royal Guard.

speaker: Rarity
text: [screech] So let me get this straight. We're helping out with the wedding of not only a princess, but a *captain of the Royal Guard?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I guess we are.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh, ooh, oooh!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: A sonic rainboom? At a *wedding*?! Can you say "best wedding *ever*"?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasp] [echoing] *Best wedding ever*!

speaker: Spike
text: So you all get to help with the big fancy wedding, but *I'm* the one who gets to host the bachelor party! I have just one question. What's a bachelor party?

speaker: Applejack
text: Why the long face, sugarcube?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm just thinking about Shining Armor. Ever since I moved to Ponyville, we've been seeing each other less and less. And now that he's starting a new family with this "Princess Mi Amore Ca-whatshername", we'll probably *never* see each other.

speaker: Applejack
text: Come on, now. You're his sister. He'll always make time for you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Couldn't seem to make time to tell me he was getting married.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We're here, we're here!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa, what's with all the guards?

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm sure they're just taking the necessary precautions. Royal weddings do bring out the strangest ponies.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Aaaaaaaaa– [sneezes like a trumpet]

speaker: Rarity
text: Now, let's get going! We've got work to do!

speaker: Applejack
text: And *you've* got a big brother to go congratulate.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah. *Congratulate*. And then give him a piece of my mind.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've got something to say to you, mister.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Twily! Ah, I've missed, you, kid. How was the train ride? I–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How *dare* you not tell me in person that you were getting married! I'm your sister, for pony's sake!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: It's not my fault! Princess Celestia has requested a major increase in security. Didn't you see all the guards at the train station?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yeah, there's a big wedding coming up. Maybe you heard about it?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: It has nothing to do with the wedding. A threat has been made against Canterlot. We don't know who's responsible for it, but Princess Celestia asked that I help provide additional protection. This, you need to see.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [gasps] The burden of keeping Canterlot safe and secure rests squarely on my shoulders. Staying focused on the task at hand has been my top priority.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, okay, I get it. You've got a really important job protecting all of Canterlot with a force field only you can conjure up. But still... how could you not tell me about something as big as your wedding? Am I not that important to you any more?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Hey. You're my little sister. Of course you're important to me. But I'd understand if you didn't want to be my best mare now.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You want *me* to be your best mare?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Well... yeah.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'd be honored! But I'm still pretty ticked you're marrying somepony I don't even know! When did you even meet this "Princess Mi Amore Cadenza"?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Twily, Princess Mi Amore Cadenza is Cadance, your old foalsitter.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cadance? As in *the* Cadance? As in the greatest foalsitter in all the history of foalsitters?!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [chuckles] You tell me. She was *your* foalsitter.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ohmygoshohmygosh! Cadance is only the most amazing pony ever! She's beautiful, she's caring, she's kind...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I am so lucky to have you as my foalsitter!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: I'm the one who's lucky, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [scoffs] You're a *princess*. I'm just a regular old unicorn.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: You are *anything* but a regular old unicorn.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Princess Cadance
text: Sunshine, sunshine, ladybugs awake! Clap your hooves and do a little shake! [laughing]

speaker: Wild Fire
text: I am going for a hooficure and that is that!

speaker: Lucky Clover
text: You are not going–

speaker: Wild Fire
text: I am! I am!

speaker: Lucky Clover
text: I've already paid for three this month!

speaker: Wild Fire
text: I... no! My girlfriends are all getting their hooves done! And you said that onl–

speaker: Lucky Clover
text: Please, we've done this at least–

speaker: Lucky Clover
text: Oh! Ho, ho, ho.

speaker: Wild Fire
text: Oh, sweetie. You just did that face.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How many unicorns can just spread love wherever they go? I only know of one! And *you're* marrying her! [sing-song voice] You're marrying Cadance! You're marrying Cadance!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: I hope I'm not interrupting anything important.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cadance! Sunshine, sunshine, ladybugs awake! Clap your hooves and do a little shake!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: What are you doing?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cadance, it's me, Twilight!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [uninterested] Uh-huh.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: I've gotta get back to my station, but Cadance will be checking in with all of you to see how things are going. I think I speak for both of us when I say we couldn't be more excited to have you here. Right, dear?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Absolutely.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Well, we'll let you get to it.

speaker: Applejack
text: Cake, check. Ice sculpture, check. Best darn bite-size apple fritter you ever tasted...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mmm. Check.

speaker: Spike
text: [deep voice] I do. Do you? [high voice] I do! [kissing noises] [laughs nervously]

speaker: Applejack
text: Hiya, Princess!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Please, call me Princess Mi Amore Cadenza.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hiya, Princess Mi Amore Cadenza. You come to check out what's on the menu for your big day?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: I have!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [gulp] Delicious! I love-love-love them. [laughs nervously]

speaker: Applejack
text: Aw, shucks. Why don't you take a few to go? [squee] I know how you brides can be. So busy, you forget to get a little somethin' in your belly.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Did... you see what she...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, you should have seen how she acted back there. I don't know when she changed, but she changed! [imitating Cadance] "Please, call me Princess Mi Amore Cadenza."

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Did I hear someone say my name?

speaker: Rarity
text: Your highness! Let me just start by saying what an honor it is to play a role in such a momentous occasion. [laughs nervously]

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [unenthusiastically] Uh-huh. Is my dress ready?

speaker: Rarity
text: [stammers] Yes, of course. Um, I've been working on it ever since I was given the assignment, and I think you'll be pleased with the results! Mmm!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: I was hoping for something with more beading and a longer train.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, yes, of course.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: And those should be a different color.

speaker: Twinkleshine
text: I think they're lovely.

speaker: Minuette
text: Me too!

speaker: Lyra Heartstrings
text: I love them.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Make them a different color.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Gee, maybe her name should be "Princess Demandy-pants."

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okay, let me see. We've been over the games... [rattles dice] ...the dances...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasps] I think this reception is gonna be perfect! Don't you?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Perfect! ...If we were celebrating a six-year-old's birthday party.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasps] Thank you!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Rest, my sister. As always, I will guard the night.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Bet I can guess what you're all thinking. Cadance is the absolute worst bride-to-be ever.

speaker: Spike
text: [high voice] Who, me?

speaker: Applejack
text: Spike! That goes on the cake.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight, whatever are you talking about? Cadance is an absolute gem!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity, she was so demanding!

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, of course she is! Why shouldn't she expect the very best on her wedding day?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, did you know that after she told you how much she just 'love-love-loved' your hors d'eouvres, she threw them in the trash?

speaker: Applejack
text: Aw, she was probably just trying to spare my feelin's.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, she was just being fake and totally insincere!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She did raise her voice at one of my birds during rehearsal.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: See? Rude!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But he *was* singing really off-key.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pinkie Pie, you had to have noticed how Cadance treated–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Never mind. Rainbow Dash, you're with me, right?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Sorry, Twi. Been too busy prepping for my sonic rainboom to pay much attention to the bride's bad attitude.

speaker: Rarity
text: The princess is about to get married. I'm sure any negative behavior she might be displaying is simply the result of nerves.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And *I'm* sure it's the result of being an awful pony who doesn't deserve to even know Shining Armor, let alone marry him!

speaker: Applejack
text: Think maybe you're bein' just a tiny bit possessive of your brother?

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Uh-huh.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I am *not* being possessive, and I am *not* taking it out on Cadance! You're all just too caught up in your wedding planning to notice that maybe there shouldn't even [thumps table] *be* a wedding!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Twily! Your big brother's looking pretty good, don't you think? Huh. Everything okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We need to talk. I think you're making a big–

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Oh, uh, hi, sweetie.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She sure has a way of sneaking up on people.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Could I speak to you for a moment, dear?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Better see what she wants.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [muffled] Look, we need to talk.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [muffled] I'm here to talk.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [muffled] It's about your sister, okay?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [muffled] I– look, look, she's okay–

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [muffled] Just... listen to me, (over Shining Armor) alright? No no–

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [muffled] I'm listening, I'm listening.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [muffled] I thought I made it perfectly clear I didn't want you to wear that.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: This was my favorite uncle's.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: And?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: And I think I should wear it.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Are you disagreeing with me?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: I guess I am– Ah!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Oh, dear. Are you getting another one of your headaches?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Gyah!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Feeling better?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [grunts] Mm-hmm.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She isn't just unpleasant and rude. She's downright evil!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Twilight!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Let her go.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Huh. It seemed like she had something else she wanted to tell me.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Who goes there? Stay indoors, Twilight Sparkle.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Shining Armor's in real trouble! You have to help–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Dresses? What are you–?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Can you believe it? We're gonna be Princess Mi Amore Cadenza's new bridesmaids!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *New* bridesmaids? What happened to her *old* bridesmaids?

speaker: Applejack
text: She didn't say. But she did tell us that she would love-love-*love* it if we'd fill in for them.

speaker: Rarity
text: Seeing as we've been working so hard and everything.

speaker: Applejack
text: And you had your doubts about her.

speaker: Rarity
text: Told you she was an absolute gem!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You sure this is what I should wear? Doesn't seem all that aerodynamic.

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmm. I'll see what I can do.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Looks like I really am on my own.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Perfect, girls. No need to rush. Then of course, Cadance will enter.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I'll say a few words, and then we'll begin with the vows. Shining Armor, you'll get the ring from your best mare.

speaker: Spike
text: [deep voice] Do you? [high voice] I do!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Hey... has anypony seen Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm here! I'm *not* gonna stand next to her! And neither should you!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: I'm sorry, I... I don't know why she's acting like this.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Maybe we should just ignore her.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You have to listen to me!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, goodness! Are you okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm fine.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ya sure about that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've got something to say! She's *evil*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She's been horrible to my friends, she's obviously done something to her bridesmaids, and if that wasn't enough, I saw her put a spell on my brother that made his eyes go all [bells jangling]!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [starts crying] Why are you doing this to me?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Because you're evil!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Evil! And if I don't stop you, you're gonna ruin my brother's life!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: You want to know why my eyes went all [bells jangling]? Nuh! Because ever since I started having to perform my protection spell, I've been getting terrible migraines. Cadance hasn't been casting spells on me. She's been using her magic to *heal* me!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: And she decided to replace her bridesmaids because she found out the only reason they wanted to be *in* the wedding was so that they could meet Canterlot royalty! And if she hasn't been on her best behavior with your [stomps hoof] friends, it's because with me being so busy, she's had to make all the decisions about the wedding!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I was just trying to–

speaker: Shining Armor
text: She's been completely stressed out because it's really important to her that our big day be perfect! Something that obviously wasn't important to *you*! [gasps] Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go and comfort my bride. And you can forget about being my best mare. In fact, if I were you, I wouldn't show up to the wedding at all.

speaker: Applejack
text: C'mon, y'all. Let's go check on the princess.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I was–

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You have a lot to think about.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe I was being overprotective. I could've gained a sister. But instead... I just lost a brother.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
He was my big brother, best friend
Forever...
And now, we'll never do anything
Together...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sorry!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: You *will* be.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "Princess Celestia cordially invites you to the wedding of Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and..." [gasp] My brother?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Twily! Ah, I've missed you, kid.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How *dare* you not tell me in person that you were getting married!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: A threat has been made against Canterlot. Princess Celestia asked that I help provide additional protection.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But I'm still pretty ticked you're marrying somepony I don't even know.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Princess Mi Amore Cadenza is Cadance.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cadance is only the most amazing pony ever!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: I hope I'm not interrupting anything important.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Cadance, it's me! Twilight!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [uninterested] Uh-huh.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: And I think I should wear it.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Are you disagreeing with me?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: She's evil! I saw her put a spell on my brother that made his eyes go all [bells jangling]!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Cadance hasn't been casting spells on me. She's been using her magic to *heal* me! If I were you, I wouldn't show up to the wedding at all.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I just lost a brother. I'm sorry!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: You *will* be.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [echoing] Hello? Is anyone there?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Where am I?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: *The caves beneath Canterlot, once home to greedy unicorns who wanted to claim the gems that could be found inside. And now, your prison.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Help! Help!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [laughing] *It's no use. No one can hear you. And no one will ever think to look for you, either. Most ponies have forgotten that these caves even exist, which is why they are the ideal place to keep the ones who try to interfere with my plans.* [laughing]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Plans? What plans?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: *The plans I have for your brother, of course.*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't you *dare* do anything to my brother, you... you monster!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: *Only way to stop me is to catch me!* [laughing] *Over here!* [laughing] *Nope, over here!* [laughing]

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: No! Wait! Ugh! Please! Don't hurt me! Twilight, it's me! Please, you have to believe me. I've been imprisoned like you. The Cadance who brought you down here was an imposter.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Likely story!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Sunshine, sunshine, ladybugs awake. Clap your hooves...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Princess Cadance
text: ...and do a little shake.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You remember me!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Of course I do. How could I forget the filly I love to sit for the most?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We have to get out of here. We have to stop her!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text:
This day is going to be perfect
The kind of day of which I've dreamed since I was small
Everypony will gather 'round
Say I look lovely in my gown
What they don't know is that I have fooled them all!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text:
This day was going to be perfect
The kind of day of which I've dreamed since I was small
But instead of having cake
With all my friends to celebrate
My wedding bells, they may not ring for me at all…

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text:
I could care less about the dress
I won't partake in any cake
Vows, well I'll be lying when I say

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text:
That through any kind of weather
I'll want us to be together
The truth is I don't care for him at all

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text:
No I do not love the groom
In my heart there is no room
But I still want him to be all mine

speaker: Princess Cadance
text:
We must escape before it's too late
Find a way to save the day
Hope, I'll be lying if I say

speaker: Princess Cadance
text:
"I don't fear that I may lose him
To one who wants to use him
Not care for, love, and cherish him each day"

speaker: Princess Cadance
text:
For I oh so love the groom
All my thoughts he does consume
Oh, Shining Armor, I'll be there very soon

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text:
Finally the moment has arrived
For me to be one lucky bride

speaker: Princess Cadance
text:
Oh, the wedding we won't make
He'll end up marrying a fake
Shining Armor will be...

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: ...mine, all mine. [evil laugh]

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Mares and gentlecolts, we are gathered here today to witness the union of [muffled] Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and Shining Armor.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Oh, we're never going to save him.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We will. We just have to find... There!

speaker: Twinkleshine
Lyra Heartstrings
Minuette
text: You're not going anywhere.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Princess Cadance and Shining Armor, it is my great pleasure to pronounce you–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Stop!*

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Ugh! Why does she have to be so possessive of her brother? [sobbing] Why does she have to ruin my special day?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Because it's not *your* special day! It's *mine*!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: What? But how did you escape my bridesmaids?

speaker: Twinkleshine
Lyra Heartstrings
Minuette
text: I want it!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Hmph. Clever. But you're still too late.

speaker: Applejack
text: I-I don't understand. How can there be two of 'em?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: She's a changeling. She takes the form of somepony you love and gains power by feeding off your love for them.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [laughing] Right you are, Princess. And as queen of the changelings, it is up to me to find food for my subjects. Equestria has more love than any place I've ever encountered. My fellow changelings will be able to devour so much of it that we will gain more power than we have ever dreamed of!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: They'll never get the chance! Shining Armor's protection spell will keep them from ever even reaching us!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [chuckling] Oh, I doubt that. Isn't that right, dear?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Ah, ah, ah. Don't want to go back to the caves, now do you? Ever since I took your place, I've been feeding off Shining Armor's love for you. Every moment he grows weaker and so does his spell. Even now, my minions are chipping away at it.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [laughing] He may not be my husband, but he is under my total control now.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: And I'm sorry to say, unable to perform his duties as captain of the Royal Guard.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Not my Shining Armor!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Soon, my changeling army will break through. First, we take Canterlot. And then, all of Equestria!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: No. You won't. You may have made it impossible for Shining Armor to perform his spell, but now that you have so foolishly revealed your true self, I can protect my subjects from you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Princess Celestia!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Ah! Shining Armor's love for you is even stronger than I thought! Consuming it has made me even more powerful than Celestia!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: The Elements of Harmony. You must get to them and use their power to defeat the queen.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [laughing] You can run, but you can't hide!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Go, go!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Looks like we're gonna have to do this the hard way. How did you...?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They're changelings, remember?

speaker: Changeling
text: They're changelings, remember?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't let them distract you. We have to get to the Elements of Harmony. They're our only hope.

speaker: Applejack
text: OK, this is just gettin' weird. Real me! Real me!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [laughing] Do me! Do me! Meh, I've seen better.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: You won't get away with this! Twilight and her friends will–

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: You were saying? You do realize the reception's been cancelled, don't you? Go! Feed!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [laughing] It's funny, really. Twilight here was suspicious of my behavior all along. Too bad the rest of you were too caught up in your wedding planning to realize those suspicions were correct! [laughing]

speaker: Applejack
text: Sorry, Twi. We should've listened to you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's not your fault. She fooled everypony.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Hmm, I did, didn't I?

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text:
This day has been just perfect
The kind of day of which I've dreamed since I was small
Everypony I'll soon control
Every stallion, mare, and foal
Who says a girl can't really have it all? [evil laugh]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Quick! Go to him while you still have the chance!

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Wha– where... huh? Is...is the wedding over?

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: It's *all* over!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Your spell! Perform your spell!

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [laughing] What good would that do? My changelings already roam free.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: No! My power is useless now. I don't have the strength to repel them.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: My love will give you strength.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: [chuckling] What a lovely but absolutely ridiculous sentiment.

speaker: Queen Chrysalis
text: Noooooo!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Don't worry about me. I'm fine. You have a real wedding to put together.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Seriously, though. I get why the queen of the changelings wanted to be with you, but how did you get someone as amazing as Cadance to marry you?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: I told her she wouldn't just be gaining a husband. She'd be getting a pretty great sister, too.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Mares and gentlecolts, we are gathered here today to celebrate the union of the *real* Princess Mi Amore Cadenza–

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Princess Cadance is fine.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Hm. The union of Princess Cadance and Shining Armor. The strength of their commitment is clear. The power of their love, undeniable. May we have the rings please? I now pronounce you mare and colt!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: This is your victory as much as theirs. You persisted in the face of doubt, and your actions led to your being able to bring the real Princess Cadance back to us. *Learning to trust your instincts is a valuable lesson to learn.*

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Rainbow Dash, that's your cue.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Best... wedding... ever!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Hello, everypony. Did I miss anything?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [squee] Let's get this party started!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
Love is in bloom
A beautiful bride, a handsome groom,
Two hearts becoming one
A bond that cannot be undone because

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
Love is in bloom
A beautiful bride, a handsome groom
I said love is in bloom
You're starting a life and making room
For us (For us, For us....)

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Twilight! None of this would've been possible without you, little sis. Love ya, Twily.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Love you too, B.B.B.F.F.

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Ready to go?

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Oh! Almost forgot.

speaker: Rarity
text: IT'S MINE! Oof! Ahaha... ha.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
Love is in bloom
A beautiful bride, a handsome groom
I said love is in bloom
You're starting a life and making room
For us, (For us... For us... Aah...)

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now *this* was a great wedding.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, yeah? Just wait until you see what I have planned for the bachelor party! [laughing]
